abilities.name: Dragon Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Dragon Strike is a linear skillshot that deals physical damage and reduces the armor of enemies it passes through. When cast towards Jarvan's Demacian Standard, it pulls him to the standard, knocking up any enemies hit along his path.
abilities.original_description:
Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path. Jarvan extends his lance, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and removing {{ e2 }}% Armor for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If the lance connects with Demacian Standard, Jarvan will pull himself to it, Knocking Up those in his path for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Golden Aegis
abilities.mechanics_description: **Golden Aegis (W)** is a self-cast shield ability. Jarvan IV activates it to protect himself with a shield, the strength of which is based on how many enemy champions are nearby when cast. Additionally, it applies a brief slow to all enemies in an area around him.
abilities.original_description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies. Jarvan summons an aegis, <status>Slowing</status> nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds and granting him a <shield>{{ baseshield }} Shield</shield>, increased by <shield>{{ bonusshield }}</shield> for each enemy champion hit.

abilities.name: Martial Cadence
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Martial Cadence** is Jarvan IV's passive ability.

1.  **How to hit/use:** This ability is not directly activated, but triggers automatically on Jarvan IV's **first basic attack** against an enemy target.
2.  **How it is used:** It provides **offensive utility** by dealing bonus physical damage based on the enemy's current health, allowing for increased early-game trading and burst damage.
abilities.original_description: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Demacian Standard
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Demacian Standard (E)** is a targeted area ability that Jarvan IV throws to a target location. It deals magic damage on impact and provides an attack speed buff to nearby allied champions.

Mechanically, Demacian Standard is a **skillshot** that Jarvan IV throws to a ground target location. It is used **offensively** to deal damage and **both offensively and for utility** as it provides a crucial attack speed buff to Jarvan IV and his nearby allies, enhancing their damage output and objective taking speed.
abilities.original_description:
Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions. Passive: Jarvan gains {{ permanentattackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Jarvan throws a standard into the ground, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and granting allies near the standard {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Cataclysm
abilities.mechanics_description: **Cataclysm (R)** is a targeted dash that allows Jarvan IV to leap to a target enemy champion, creating an impassable arena of terrain around them. This deals initial physical damage to enemies within the impact zone and can be re-cast to collapse the arena. Cataclysm is primarily used offensively for initiation, locking down targets, and isolating enemies, but the terrain can also creatively act as a defensive tool by blocking enemy movement.
abilities.original_description:
Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact. Jarvan heroically leaps to an enemy Champion, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage to them and surrounding enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for {{ wallduration }} seconds.

Jarvan can Recast to collapse the terrain.

abilities.name: Breath of Light
abilities.mechanics_description: Breath of Light is a **circular area of effect skillshot** that Aurelion Sol continuously channels, dealing damage to enemies within its radius. It's primarily used **offensively** for sustained damage and can grant bonus effects and Stardust when channeled on champions.
abilities.original_description:
Aurelion Sol channels his dragon breath for a few seconds, damaging the first enemy hit and splashing reduced damage onto nearby enemies. Each second the breath is channeled directly at an enemy will deal bonus damage, which is improved by the amount of Stardust that's been collected. This ability collects Stardust if the target is a champion. Aurelion Sol breathes starfire for up to {{ maxchannelduration }} seconds, dealing {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage per second to the first enemy hit and {{ aoemodifier*100 }}% of the damage to surrounding enemies.

Each full second of breath on the same enemy deals a burst of {{ burstdamage }} magic damage plus {{ burstbonustruedamagetochamps }} max Health magic damage and absorbs {{ qmassstolen }} Stardust if they are a champion.

abilities.name: Astral Flight
abilities.mechanics_description: Astral Flight is a **skillshot dash** that allows Aurelion Sol to fly over terrain in a target direction. While airborne, his Breath of Light becomes **offensively potent and spammable**, with its damage amplified, and he can end the flight early via recast.
abilities.original_description:
Aurelion Sol flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying.

Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by Aurelion Sol.

Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range. Aurelion Sol flies in a direction. While flying, Breath of Light has no Cooldown, no max channel duration, and its flat damage is increased by {{ truedamagebonus*100 }}%.

Takedowns on champions within {{ resetwindow }} seconds of damaging them refunds {{ tooltiptakedowncooldownmultiplier }}% of this Ability's Cooldown.

Recast: End flight early.

abilities.name: Cosmic Creator
abilities.mechanics_description:
1.  **How to hit/use:** Auto-targeting. Aurelion Sol gains Stardust passively by being near dying minions/monsters and by hitting enemies with his damaging abilities.
2.  **How it is used:** Utility/Buff. Stardust permanently empowers his other abilities, increasing their damage or adding new effects, directly contributing to his offensive and scaling power.

**Concise Description:** Aurelion Sol passively gains Stardust from nearby dying units and hitting enemies with his damaging abilities, permanently empowering his other abilities with increased damage and effects. This passive fuels his scaling power by making his spells progressively stronger.
abilities.original_description: Aurelion Sol's damaging Abilities break down enemies into stacks of <font color='#3458eb'>Stardust</font>, which permanently improves each of his abilities.

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Singularity (E) - Aurelion Sol**

Singularity is a **circular skillshot** that creates a persistent damaging black hole. Enemies caught in the area are **slowly pulled towards the center** and **executed if below a certain health threshold**, with the ability's size and execution potency increasing with Stardust.
abilities.original_description:
Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, damaging enemies and slowly pulling them toward its center. This ability grants Stardust each time an enemy dies within the black hole and for each second an enemy champion is caught inside it. The center of the black hole executes enemies who are below a certain percentage of their maximum health. Stardust increases Singularity's area as well as the execution threshold. Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, dealing {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage per second and Dragging enemies towards the center for {{ duration }} seconds. Enemies in the center below {{ currentexecutionthreshold }}% max Health die instantly.

The black hole absorbs Stardust when enemies die within it and each second an enemy champion is inside.

abilities.name: Falling Star / The Skies Descend
abilities.mechanics_description:
"Falling Star" is a **skillshot** that Aurelion Sol targets on the ground. It deals damage and a stun to enemies hit, granting Stardust for each champion struck. Upon reaching enough Stardust, his next "Falling Star" becomes "The Skies Descend," a larger area-of-effect spell that deals damage, knocks up enemies, and unleashes a damaging, slowing shockwave.

**Mechanics and Usage:**

*   **Type:** "Falling Star" is a targeted ground **skillshot**. You click on the ground to designate the impact point of a falling star. The range is significant, but it's not an instant cast; there's a travel time for the star to fall.
*   **Usage:** Primarily **offensive**.
    *   **Falling Star:** Deals magic damage and stuns enemies in a small area. Its main purpose in its non-transformed state is to CC and farm Stardust off of enemy champions.
    *   **The Skies Descend:** Deals significantly more magic damage in a much larger radius, knocking up enemies, and then releasing a shockwave that deals damage and slows enemies in a wider area, originating from the edge of the impact zone. This is a powerful zoning and area denial tool, great for teamfights and punishing grouped enemies.

**Concise Description:**

Aurelion Sol targets a location on the ground with a skillshot, dealing damage and stunning champions to collect Stardust. Upon accumulating enough Stardust, his next cast transforms into a large area-of-effect ultimate that deals damage, knocks up, and unleashes a damaging, slowing shockwave.
abilities.original_description:
Falling Star: Aurelion Sol crashes a star into the earth. This impact deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits. Gathering enough Stardust transforms Aurelion Sol's next Falling Star into The Skies Descend.

The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a giant star down from the heavens with an increased impact zone and increased damage, knocking up enemies rather than stunning them. A shockwave then spreads from the edge of the impact zone, which damages and slows the enemies it hits. Stardust increases the impact area of both Falling Star and The Skies Descend. Aurelion Sol plucks a star from the heavens and crashes it into the earth, dealing {{ maxdamagetooltip }} magic damage, Stunning enemies {{ stunduration }} second, and absorbing {{ massstolen }} Stardust for each champion hit.

Gathering {{ calamitystacks }} Stardust transforms the next Falling Star into The Skies Descend.

The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a constellation's worth of fury down from the cosmos, dealing {{ r2damage }} magic damage in a larger area, Knocking Up enemies hit for {{ stunduration }} second, and unleashing a massive shockwave that deals {{ shockwavedamage }} magic damage to champions and Epic Monsters and Slows all enemies hit by {{ shockwaveslow*100 }}% for 1 second.

abilities.name: Signature of the Visionary
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Signature of the Visionary (Passive):** Hwei's abilities leave a mark on enemy champions. Hitting a 
   *marked* champion with a 
   *second* damaging spell causes a signature to spawn beneath them. After a short delay, this signature detonates, dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. This serves as a finishing mechanic, rewarding consecutive spell hits with AoE damage.
abilities.original_description:
Hwei primes enemy champions he damages with his abilities for his signature finishing touch.

Hitting an enemy with a second damaging spell completes his signature, leaving it beneath them. The signature detonates after a short delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies in range.

abilities.name: Spiraling Despair
abilities.mechanics_description: Spiraling Despair is a **skillshot** that Hwei launches at an enemy champion. If it hits, it attaches a vision that **slows and damages** enemies in an expanding area over time, culminating in a final burst of damage when it shatters.
abilities.original_description:
Hwei paints a vision of pure despair. The first enemy champion struck becomes the center of an expanding painting that slows and damages nearby enemies. The vision explodes after reaching its maximum size or when the champion dies. Hwei launches a vision of pure despair that sticks to an enemy champion for {{ duration }} seconds. The vision expands over time applying a Slow to enemies for {{ slowpercentperstack }}% stacking every 0.25 seconds, and dealing {{ damageovertime }} magic damage per second.

Upon completion, the vision shatters, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Subject: Disaster
abilities.mechanics_description: Subject: Disaster (Q) is a **stance-based skillshot** ability. Hwei cycles through three distinct spell forms: **Devastating Fire**, a fast linear skillshot that explodes on the first enemy hit; **Severing Bolt**, a long-range, delayed linear skillshot that deals bonus damage to isolated or immobilized targets; and **Molten Fissure**, a skillshot that creates a damaging and slowing area of effect. The primary usage is for **offensive damage**, ranging from single-target burst to area denial and damage over time, with bonus damage potential on Severing Bolt.
abilities.original_description:
Hwei envisions a series of disasters, allowing him to paint a devastating blow.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with damaging abilities: Devastating Fire, Severing Bolt, and Molten Fissure. Hwei paints visions of disaster that deal large damage to enemies.

Devastating Fire
Hwei launches a blazing fast fireball that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing {{ tooltip_qqdamage }} plus {{ tooltip_qqbonusdamage }}% max health magic damage.

Severing Bolt
Hwei strikes over far distances with a delayed lightning bolt, dealing {{ tooltip_qwdamage }} magic damage. Hitting an Isolated or Immobilized target increases the damage up to {{ tooltip_qwbonusdamage }} magic damage, based on the target's missing health.

Molten Fissure
Hwei unleashes a path of eruptions, dealing {{ tooltip_qedamage }} magic damage in an area and leaving behind pools of lava that Slow enemies by {{ spell.hweiqe:slowpercent }}% and deal {{ tooltip_qedamagepersecond }} magic damage per second for {{ spell.hweiqe:duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Subject: Serenity
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Subject: Serenity (W)** is a utility tool that allows Hwei to choose between three different supportive effects by pressing W and then activating one of the three subsequent abilities:

*   **Fleeting Current:** A **skillshot** that travels in a line, granting **Movement Speed** to allies it hits.
*   **Pool of Reflection:** Creates a ground-targeted **area of effect (AoE)** that grants **Shields** to allied champions within it over time.
*   **Stirring Lights:** A self-buff that empowers Hwei's next three basic attacks or abilities with bonus **magic damage** and **Mana** restoration.

Subject: Serenity is primarily used **defensively** and for **utility**, offering allies mobility and survivability, while Stirring Lights provides a minor offensive boost and resource sustain for Hwei.
abilities.original_description:
Hwei envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights. Hwei paints visions of serenity that provide utility for himself and allied champions.

Fleeting Current
Hwei launches a current of swift waters in a line that grants allies {{ tooltip_wqmovespeed }} Move Speed.

Pool of Reflection
Hwei forms a protective pool that grants {{ tooltip_wwshieldamount }} Shields over time to allied champions inside reduced by {{ spell.hweiww:tooltipallymod*100 }}% for allies.

Stirring Lights
Hwei creates three swirling lights that empower his next three Abilities or Attacks to deal an additional {{ tooltip_weonhitdamage }} magic damage and restore {{ tooltip_weonhitmanarestore }} Mana each.

abilities.name: Subject: Torment
abilities.mechanics_description:
Subject: Torment (E) is a **skillshot** ability that allows Hwei to cast one of three different crowd control spells:

*   **Grim Visage:** A linear skillshot that **Flee**s the first enemy hit, forcing them to move away from Hwei.
*   **Gaze of the Abyss:** Creates a lingering eye that shoots a homing missile at the first enemy champion to enter its radius, **Root**ing them.
*   **Crushing Maw:** Paints jaws at a target location that **Drags** enemies towards the center and **Slows** them.

This ability is primarily used for **offensive CC and utility**, allowing Hwei to initiate fights, disengage, or control enemy positioning.
abilities.original_description:
Hwei envisions a series of torments, allowing him to paint controlling visages.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with crowd control abilities: Grim Visage, Gaze of the Abyss, and Crushing Maw. Hwei paints visions of torment that control enemies.

Grim Visage
Hwei launches a terrifying face that causes the first enemy hit to Flee for {{ tooltip_eqfleeduration }} second(s) and take {{ tooltip_eqdamage }} magic damage.

Gaze of the Abyss
Hwei forms an eye that lingers and provides vision locking onto the first enemy champion that enters and launching a homing missile that Roots the first enemy hit for {{ tooltip_ewrootduration }} seconds dealing {{ tooltip_ewdamage }} magic damage.

Crushing Maw
Hwei paints a set of jaws at a target location that Drags enemies to the center dealing {{ tooltip_eedamage }} magic damage and Slowing enemies caught by {{ tooltip_eeslowamount }}% decaying over 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Runic Blade
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Runic Blade (Passive)**

Riven's abilities grant her passive stacks, called "Resonance." Each stack enhances her next basic attack to deal bonus physical damage. After reaching (or exceeding) 3 stacks, her next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal significantly more bonus physical damage. This passive is auto-targeted, applying automatically to the next basic attack after an ability is cast. It is primarily used offensively to increase Riven's burst damage during trades and all-ins.
abilities.original_description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.

abilities.name: Broken Wings
abilities.mechanics_description: Broken Wings is a **linear skillshot** ability that Riven can **reactivate twice** within a short timeframe. Each reactivation allows Riven to **dash forward** a short distance, dealing physical damage. The third reactivation also **knocks back** enemies hit, making it a tool for both offensive engagement and brief evasive maneuvering.
abilities.original_description:
Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies. Riven dashes forward, dealing {{ firstslashdamage }} physical damage. She can Recast this Ability twice. The first Recast is the same as the original, but the second has a different effect:

Recast: Riven leaps forward and slams, dealing {{ firstslashdamage }} physical damage and Knocks Up nearby enemies for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Ki Burst
abilities.mechanics_description: Ki Burst is an AOE (Area of Effect) ability that Riven can activate to damage and stun enemies in a small radius around her. It is primarily used offensively to secure kills by rooting targets, or defensively to escape by stunning pursuers.
abilities.original_description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies. Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> for {{ e5 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Valor
abilities.mechanics_description: Riven's "Valor" (E) is a **short-range dash** that can be used primarily **offensively** to reposition or **defensively** for its **sheer and damage reduction**. While it doesn't deal damage itself, the mobility and damage mitigation it provides are crucial for Riven's aggressive playstyle and survivability.
abilities.original_description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage. Riven quickly dashes and gains <shield>{{ totalshield }} Shield</shield> for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade of the Exile
abilities.mechanics_description: Blade of the Exile (R) is a **self-buff** that Riven can activate. It is **not a skillshot, point-and-click, or toggle**; instead, it provides a temporary increase to Riven's Attack Damage and auto-attack range for its duration. While this buff is active, **Riven can use the ability again (recast) to cast a linear skillshot called Wind Slash**, which deals increasing damage based on the target's missing health.
abilities.original_description:
Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once. Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy, granting her {{ bonusad }} Attack Damage and increased range on damaging Abilities and Attacks for {{ duration }} seconds. While active, she can Recast.

Recast: Riven fires a wind slash that deals between {{ mindamage }} and {{ maxdamage }} physical damage, based on their missing Health.

abilities.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
abilities.mechanics_description: **Fury of the Dragonborn (Passive):** This is a **passive** bonus that automatically applies to Shyvana. Its primary use is **defensive**, granting increasing Armor and Magic Resist as Shyvana and her allies slay dragons, making her more durable in prolonged fights and against magic-heavy teams.
abilities.original_description: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Twin Bite
abilities.mechanics_description: Twin Bite is a **point-and-click** ability that causes Shyvana's next basic attack to strike twice, dealing physical damage and granting bonus attack speed. In Dragon Form, the ability becomes a **cleave**, hitting all enemies in front of her. It's primarily used offensively for burst damage and sustained damage via the attack speed buff, with its cooldown being reduced by basic attacks.
abilities.original_description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack and grants herself Attack Speed for her next attacks. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana. Shyvana's next Attack strikes twice, dealing {{ firsthitdamagecalc }} then {{ secondhitdamagecalc }} physical damage. Her next 2 Attacks gain {{ bonusas }}% Attack Speed.

Attacks reduce this Ability's Cooldown by {{ cdreductiononhit }} seconds.

Dragon Form: The empowered Attacks hit all units in front of Shyvana.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

abilities.name: Flame Breath
abilities.mechanics_description: **Flame Breath (E)** is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage to enemies hit and marks them. Shyvana's basic attacks against marked targets deal bonus magic damage based on their maximum health. In Dragon Form, Flame Breath explodes on impact, dealing additional damage and creating a scorched area that deals damage over time.
abilities.original_description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration. Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and marks for {{ markduration }} seconds. The fireball stops on the first champion hit.

Shyvana's Attacks against marked targets deal an additional {{ percenthpdamageonhit }}% max Health magic damage.

Dragon Form: The fireball explodes once it ends, dealing an additional {{ dragonexplosioncalc }} magic damage and scorching the earth, dealing {{ dragondamagetotalcalc }} magic damage over 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Dragon's Descent
abilities.mechanics_description: Dragon's Descent is a **linear skillshot dash** that Shyvana uses to **engage or reposition**. Upon activation, she transforms into her dragon form, flying a set distance, dealing magic damage, and **knocking back** all enemies caught in her path towards her final destination.
abilities.original_description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack. Passive: Shyvana generates {{ furygainpertick }} Fury every second, and Attacks generate an extra {{ furygainonhit }} Fury.

Active: Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form, gaining {{ bonushp }} max Health and flying forward, dealing {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and Knocking enemies toward her target location.

abilities.name: Burnout
abilities.mechanics_description:
1.  **How to hit/use:** Burnout is a **toggle** ability. It creates an aura around Shyvana that damages enemies within range.
2.  **How it is used:** Burnout provides **offensive** sustained magic damage and a decaying movement speed buff. It is also used for **utility** as basic attacks extend its duration, allowing for prolonged damage and mobility.

**Description:** Burnout is a toggle that surrounds Shyvana with a damaging aura, granting her a decaying movement speed bonus. Her basic attacks refresh its duration, making it a core tool for sustained damage and chasing.
abilities.original_description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size. Shyvana summons a flame storm around her, gaining {{ finalmsperc }} decaying Move Speed and dealing {{ damagepertickcalc }} magic damage per second for {{ baseduration }} seconds.

The flame storm also causes Shyvana's Attacks to deal an additional {{ damageonhitcalc }} magic damage to surrounding enemies and extend this Ability's duration by {{ bonusdurationonhit }} second.

Dragon Form: The size of the flame storm is increased.

abilities.name: Feline Friendship
abilities.mechanics_description: Feline Friendship is a passive ability. When Yuumi hits a champion with an attack or ability, she heals herself and the next ally she attaches to. While attached, she gains a special bond with her ally, which enhances her abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Periodically, when Yuumi strikes a champion with an attack or ability, she restores health to herself and the next ally she Attaches to.

While Attached, Yuumi generates a special bond with her allies. The ally with the strongest bond enhances Yuumi's abilities while she is Attached to them.

abilities.name: You and Me!
abilities.mechanics_description: "You and Me!" (W) is an **auto-target** ability that allows Yuumi to **dash** to a target allied champion and **attach** to them. While attached, Yuumi becomes **untargetable** (except from turrets) and provides her ally with **on-hit healing**, in addition to increasing her own **Heal & Shield Power**.
abilities.original_description:
Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets. While on her Best Friend, she gains Heal & Shield Power and grants her Ally On-Hit healing. Passive: While on her Best Friend, Yuumi gains an additional {{ healandshieldpower*100 }}% Heal & Shield Power and her ally also restores {{ healthonhit }} health On-Hit %i:OnHit%.

Active: Yuumi dashes to an ally champion and Attaches to them. While Yuumi is Attached, she follows her partner's movement and is Untargetable except from towers.

Immobilizing effects on Yuumi place this Ability on a {{ ccattachlockout }} second Cooldown.

abilities.name: Prowling Projectile
abilities.mechanics_description: Yuumi's Q, Prowling Projectile, is a *skillshot* that fires a missile dealing magic damage and applying a slow. When cast while Attached to an ally, Yuumi can *indirectly control* the missile's trajectory with her cursor for a short duration, ensuring an *enhanced slow* and granting her ally bonus *on-hit damage*. This ability is used *offensively* for damage, slows, and empowering her ally's attacks.
abilities.original_description:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage and slowing first target hit. It deals bonus damage and an enchanced slow if it takes at least 1.35 seconds to get to its target. While on her Best Friend, the slow is always enhanced and grants bonus On-Hit damage to her ally.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor for a brief period. Yuumi summons an errant missile that deals {{ totalmissiledamage }} magic damage to the first enemy and Slows the target for {{ slowamount }}%.

If cast while Attached, Yuumi can control the missile using her mouse for a short period before it accelerates in a straight line. The accelerated missile deals {{ totalmissiledamageempowered }} magic damage and Slows the target for {{ empoweredslowamount }}% for {{ empoweredslowduration }} seconds, instead.

Best Friend Bonus: Prowling Projectile's Slow will always be enhanced and hitting an enemy champion also grants them {{ onhitdamagecalc }} magic damage On-Hit %i:OnHit% for {{ buffduration }} seconds.

The bonus On-Hit damage can be increased by {{ allycritchancemaxamp*100 }}% based her ally's Critical Strike Chance.

abilities.name: Final Chapter
abilities.mechanics_description: Yuumi's **Final Chapter (R)** is a channeled, circular area-of-effect ability that can be steered. While Yuumi channels, she can move and even use other abilities. It launches five waves that deal magic damage and slow enemies, while healing allied champions and providing a shield if the heal overheals.
abilities.original_description:
Yuumi channels five waves that damage enemies and heal allies. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling. While on her Best Friend, this spell also follows her mouse. Yuumi channels for {{ ultduration }} seconds, launching {{ numberofwaves }} magical waves affecting both teams. If initially cast while Attached, Yuumi can steer the waves to follow her mouse.

Enemies struck are dealt {{ totalmissiledamage }} magic damage and Slowed by {{ baseslow*-100 }}% for {{ ccduration }} seconds, increased by {{ bonusslowperwave*-100 }}% per wave hit.

Ally champions are healed for {{ totalhealperwave }} health per wave. Excess healing is converted to a Shield instead.

Best Friend Bonus: For her Best Friend, the heal is increased to {{ enhancedhealperwave }} health.

Casting You and Me! will locks the waves in the current direction.
Yuumi can move and cast Zoomies while channeling.

abilities.name: Zoomies
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Zoomies (E)** is a point-and-click ability that shields Yuumi and grants her bonus Attack Speed and Move Speed for a short duration. If Yuumi is attached to an ally, she casts it on them instead, also restoring a portion of their mana based on their missing mana.

**Mechanics and Usage:**

*   **Type:** Point-and-click.
*   **Usage:** Primarily defensive and utility. It provides a shield for survivability, a burst of Attack Speed for offensive pressure, and a Move Speed buff for repositioning or chasing. When attached, it offers crucial mana sustain to allies, making it valuable for casters.
abilities.original_description:
Shields Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.
Yuumi shields herself, blocking {{ totalshielding }} damage and gains {{ totalattackspeed }}% Attack Speed for {{ msduration }} seconds. While the shield persists, the target also gains {{ msamount }}% Move Speed.

If Yuumi is Attached, this Ability affects her ally instead and also restores {{ manarestore }} Mana to them, increased by up to {{ maxmanapercincrease*100 }}% based on the target's missing Mana.

abilities.name: Caustic Spittle
abilities.mechanics_description: Caustic Spittle is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage to the first enemy struck and applies a debuff that reduces their armor and magic resistance. Upon activation, Kog'Maw also gains a temporary boost to his attack speed, enhancing his sustained damage output.
abilities.original_description:
Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed. Passive: Kog'Maw gains {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Kog'Maw vomits a corrosive projectile that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit and shreds {{ shredamount }}% Armor and Magic Resist for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Icathian Surprise
abilities.mechanics_description: **Icathian Surprise (Passive):** This is an automatic, area-of-effect (AoE) true damage explosion that triggers 4 seconds after Kog'Maw dies if he is killed by an enemy. Its usage is primarily defensive, as it punishes enemies who kill him and can potentially net him a final kill or dissuade immediate follow-up.
abilities.original_description: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.

abilities.name: Void Ooze
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Ooze is a **linear skillshot** that deals magic damage to enemies it passes through and leaves a slowing ooze trail. It is primarily used **offensively** to poke, zone, and stick to targets with its damage and CC.
abilities.original_description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it. Kog'Maw spits bile, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and leaving a trail of ooze for {{ trailduration }} seconds. Enemies in the ooze are <status>Slowed</status> by {{ slowamount }}%.

abilities.name: Living Artillery
abilities.mechanics_description: **Living Artillery (R)** is a long-range, circular skillshot that Kog'Maw fires at a target location. It deals magic damage and reveals enemies hit, with damage significantly amplified against targets below 40% health. Subsequent casts within a short window increase in mana cost.
abilities.original_description:
Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana. Kog'Maw shoots acid at an area, dealing {{ basedamagecalc }} plus {{ tooltipmissinghealthdamageamp }}% per 1% missing Health magic damage and revealing enemies hit for 2 seconds. Enemies below 40% Health instead take {{ maxdamagecalc }} magic damage.

Subsequent shots within {{ manacostduration }} seconds cost an additional {{ basecost }} Mana (max: {{ manacostcap }} Mana).

abilities.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
abilities.mechanics_description: **Bio-Arcane Barrage (W):** This ability is a **buff** that Kog'Maw **toggles** on and off. When active, it grants him bonus **attack range** and causes his basic attacks to deal a percentage of the target's **maximum health as bonus magic damage**. This enhances Kog'Maw's **offensive** capabilities, allowing him to deal significant sustained damage, particularly against tanky champions, and poke more safely from a distance.
abilities.original_description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage. Kog'Maw gains {{ range }} Attack Range and his Attacks deal an additional <magicDamage>{{ totalhealthdamage }} max Health magic damage</magicDamage> for {{ duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Plasma Fission
abilities.mechanics_description: Plasma Fission is a linear skillshot that damages, slows, and can be reactivated or detonated on an enemy to split into two new bolts. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and waveclear, with mana refund on unit kills incentivizing its use in such scenarios.
abilities.original_description:
Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit. Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slows by {{ slowamount*100 }}% decaying over {{ slowduration }} second(s). At the end of its range, on hitting a target, or on Recasting, the bolt splits and fires two new bolts at a 90 degree angle.

Killing a unit with this restores {{ tooltipmanarefund }} Mana.

abilities.name: Organic Deconstruction
abilities.mechanics_description: **Organic Deconstruction (Passive)** is a debuff applied by Vel'Koz's damaging abilities. It is a **stacking passive that is triggered by hitting enemies with any of Vel'Koz's abilities**. Once an enemy has accumulated **3 stacks** of Organic Deconstruction, they will take a burst of **true damage** after a short delay, making it a key component of Vel'Koz's offensive damage and burst potential.
abilities.original_description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <keywordName>Organic Deconstruction</keywordName> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

abilities.name: Void Rift
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Rift is a **linear skillshot** that deals an initial burst of magic damage, then explodes for a second burst of magic damage after a short delay. It is primarily used **offensively** for poke and damage, and its two charges allow for zoning and follow-up damage.
abilities.original_description:
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay. Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void, dealing {{ initialdamage }} magic damage. The rift then erupts, dealing {{ secondarydamage }} magic damage.

This Ability has 2 charges ({{ ammorechargetime }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
abilities.mechanics_description: Vel'Koz channels a **linear skillshot** that follows his cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing continuous magic damage and a slow to enemies hit. This ability offensively melts targets, especially champions who have accumulated stacks of his passive, "Organic Deconstruction," which then allows the beam to shred them with true damage.
abilities.original_description:
Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead. Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor, dealing a total of {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over 2.5 seconds and Slowing by {{ e3 }}%. Deals true damage instead to enemies recently damaged by Organic Deconstruction.

Enemies gain stacks of Deconstruction periodically while in the beam.

abilities.name: Tectonic Disruption
abilities.mechanics_description: Tectonic Disruption is a **circular skillshot** that deals magic damage and knocks up enemies hit. Enemies within a very small radius around Vel'Koz are instead **knocked back** a short distance, functioning as a defensive tool to create space.
abilities.original_description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away. Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area, causing it to explode, <status>Knocking Up</status> for {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Enemies close to Vel'Koz will be <status>Knocked Back</status> instead of <status>Knocked Up</status>.

abilities.name: Timewinder
abilities.mechanics_description: **Timewinder (Q)** is a linear skillshot that Ekko throws, dealing damage on its initial cast. Upon hitting an enemy champion or reaching its maximum range, it expands into a slowing field. The ability then travels back to Ekko, dealing additional damage to any enemies it passes through on its return. Timewinder is primarily used offensively for poke and damage, with the slow providing utility for engaging or disengaging.
abilities.original_description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return. Ekko throws a device dealing <magicDamage>{{ initialdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. On hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, it expands into a field that <status>Slows</status> enemies inside by {{ e2 }}%. After it expands, Ekko recalls it, dealing <magicDamage>{{ recalldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Parallel Convergence
abilities.mechanics_description:
**1. How to hit/use:** Parallel Convergence is a **circular skillshot** that Ekko throws. The anomaly it creates also has a circular area of effect.

**2. How it is used:** Ekko uses Parallel Convergence both **offensively** to slow and stun enemies for damage, and **defensively** for the shield it provides when he re-enters the anomaly.

**Concise Description:** Ekko throws a circular projectile that creates a time-distorting anomaly after a delay, slowing any enemies within its radius. If Ekko re-enters the anomaly, he detonates it, stunning enemies inside and granting himself a shield.
abilities.original_description:
Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to low health enemies. He can cast Parallel Convergence to split the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and stuns enemies by suspending them in time. Passive: Ekko's Attacks against enemies below 30% Health deal {{ missinghealthpercent }} missing Health magic damage.

Active: Ekko launches a chronosphere lasting 1.5 seconds after a delay that Slows enemies inside by {{ e0 }}%. If Ekko enters the sphere, he detonates it, Stunning for {{ e2 }} seconds and gaining {{ totalshield }} Shield.

abilities.name: Z-Drive Resonance
abilities.mechanics_description: Z-Drive Resonance is an auto-targeting passive that triggers on the third consecutive attack or damaging spell cast on the same enemy. This passive deals bonus magic damage and grants Ekko a movement speed buff when the target is a champion, utilized offensively for increased damage output and defensively/offensively for hit-and-run tactics.
abilities.original_description: Every third attack or damaging spell on the same target deals bonus magic damage, and grants Ekko a burst of speed if the target is a champion.

abilities.name: Chronobreak
abilities.mechanics_description: Chronobreak (R) is a ground-targeted ability where Ekko rewinds to his position from 4 seconds prior. This repositioning is used offensively to deal massive AoE magic damage upon arrival and defensively to heal based on damage taken during those 4 seconds.
abilities.original_description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage. Ekko turns back time, entering Stasis while teleporting to where he was 4 seconds ago and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies. In addition, Ekko restores <healing>{{ totalbaseheal }} Health</healing>, increased by {{ percenthealampperpercentmissinghealth }}% for each 1% Health he lost in last 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Phase Dive
abilities.mechanics_description: **Phase Dive (E)** is a **target-based dash** that empowers Ekko's next basic attack. Upon activation, Ekko dashes a short distance and gains increased auto-attack range, allowing him to **teleport to an enemy champion or unit** if they are within the empowered attack's range. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to close gaps, deal bonus magic damage with the empowered attack, and set up further combos or escapes.
abilities.original_description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target. Ekko dashes and empowers his next Attack to have bonus range, teleport him to his target, and deal an additional <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Dauntless Instinct
abilities.mechanics_description: K'Sante's abilities apply a mark to enemies. His next basic attack on a marked target consumes the mark, dealing bonus damage. During his ultimate, "All Out," all of K'Sante's damage is increased.
abilities.original_description:
K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack.

When All Out, K'Sante deals more damage with all Attacks and Abilities.

abilities.name: Ntofo Strikes
abilities.mechanics_description: K'Sante's Q is a short-range, linear skillshot that damages and slows enemies. Landing it twice consumes the stacks to unleash a second use that stuns and pulls enemies in, making it a core tool for engaging and setting up follow-up CC.
abilities.original_description:
K'Sante strikes, damaging and slowing enemies in a short line.

On hit, grants a stack of Ntofo Strikes. At 2 stacks, K'Sante fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in.

When All Out, cooldown is reduced. K'Sante slams his weapon, dealing {{ basedamage }} physical damage and Slowing enemies by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }}s. If he hits, he gains a stack of Ntofo Strikes for {{ recastwindow }} seconds. At 2 stacks, he instead fires a shockwave that Stuns and Pulls enemies for {{ stunduration }} second.

All Out: Cooldown is reduced by {{ rcooldownreduction.0*100 }}%.

abilities.name: Path Maker
abilities.mechanics_description: K'Sante's W, Path Maker, is a charge-up skillshot he uses offensively to deal damage and crowd control, or defensively to mitigate incoming damage. He performs a short, forward ram, knocking back and stunning enemies hit based on how long he charges it, becoming unstoppable and gaining damage reduction during the charge.
abilities.original_description:
K'Sante charges up, taking reduced damage, then dashes, knocking back and stunning enemies.

When All Out, deals increased damage and no longer knocks back or stuns. K'Sante raises his weapons defensively for {{ mindurationtooltip }}-{{ maxduration.1 }}s, becoming Unstoppable and reducing incoming damage by {{ damagereduction*100 }}%. Then, he rams forward, dealing {{ basedamage }} + {{ totalmaxhealthdamage }} max Health physical damage. Enemies hit are Knocked Back and Stunned for {{ minknockbackduration }}-{{ maxknockbackduration }}s (based on charge time).

All Out: Cooldown is refreshed. Deals an additional {{ rdamageincreasemin*100 }}-{{ rdamageincreasemax*100 }}% damage as true damage (based on charge time), damage reduction is increased to {{ rdamagereduction*100 }}% and dash speed is increased, but no longer Knocks Back or Stuns.

abilities.name: Footwork
abilities.mechanics_description: **Footwork (E)** is a **dash** ability. K'Sante can **point and click** to dash a short distance, gaining a shield. If he targets an ally, the dash range is significantly increased, and both K'Sante and the ally gain a shield. This ability is primarily used for **mobility and defense**, allowing K'Sante to reposition, escape danger, or provide shields to himself and allies.
abilities.original_description:
K'Sante dashes and gains a shield. If targeting an ally, K'Sante dashes to the ally with increased range and both gain a shield.

When All Out, cooldown is reduced and speed is increased. K'Sante dashes, gaining {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. If dashing to an ally, the distance of the dash is significantly increased and the ally is also Shielded.

All Out: Cooldown is decreased by {{ cooldownmodao*100 }}% and dash speed is increased.

abilities.name: All Out
abilities.mechanics_description: **K'Sante's R - All Out:** This is a **targeted dash** that knocks an enemy champion back. If the target is knocked into a wall, K'Sante follows up with an additional strike. While in his "All Out" mode, K'Sante gains offensive buffs (damage, omnivamp, attack speed, armor penetration) and his basic abilities are enhanced, but he loses defensive stats.
abilities.original_description:
K'Sante knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, K'Sante goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses. K'Sante shatters his ntofos to Knock Back an enemy champion, dealing {{ basedamage }} physical damage, then dashes behind them and goes All Out for {{ alloutduration }}s. If the enemy would hit a wall, they are Knocked Back through the wall and K'Sante strikes them again for {{ totaldamageslamdown }} physical damage.

While All Out, K'Sante's Abilities are upgraded and he gains {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed, {{ armorpenpercent*100 }}% Bonus Armor Penetration, and {{ omnivamp*100 }}% Omnivamp, but loses {{ healthlost*100 }}% max Health, {{ defenseslost*100 }}% Bonus Armor, and {{ defenseslost*100 }}% Bonus Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.mechanics_description: Warpath is a passive ability that **automatically grants Hecarim bonus Attack Damage based on a percentage of his total bonus Move Speed**. This passive is used **offensively to enhance his auto attacks**, synergizing directly with items and abilities that increase his movement speed.
abilities.original_description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Move Speed.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.mechanics_description: **Rampage (Q):** This is an **auto-target** ability that Hecarim casts at his current location, cleaving all nearby enemies for physical damage. Hitting at least one enemy champion or large monster grants a stack that **reduces the cooldown and increases the damage** of subsequent Rampages, encouraging Hecarim to constantly weave his Q into his auto-attack combos for sustained offense.
abilities.original_description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage. If Hecarim damages at least one enemy, he increases the damage and lowers the cooldown of subsequent Rampages. Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ damage }} physical damage. If this Ability hits, he gains a stack that decreases its Cooldown by {{ rampagecooldownreduction }} seconds and increases its damage by {{ rampagebonusdamageperc }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

abilities.name: Onslaught of Shadows
abilities.mechanics_description: Onslaught of Shadows is a **linear skillshot dash** that Hecarim uses offensively to engage, deal damage, and apply a powerful crowd control effect. Upon completing his charge, Hecarim emits a shockwave that **Fears** enemies, with the duration scaling based on the distance he traveled during the dash.
abilities.original_description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror. Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damagedone }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Hecarim unleashes a shockwave at the end of the charge that <status>Fears</status> for between {{ feardurationmin }} to {{ feardurationmax }} seconds, increased by charge distance.

abilities.name: Spirit of Dread
abilities.mechanics_description: **Hecarim's Spirit of Dread (W) is a persistent area-of-effect ability.** When activated, Hecarim gains bonus Armor and Magic Resist for a duration. While active, he continuously deals magic damage to enemies within a radius around him and heals himself based on a percentage of both the damage he deals and the damage his allies deal to those same enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Hecarim gains Armor and Magic Resist. Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies, and gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer. Hecarim deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over {{ buffduration }} seconds to nearby enemies.

Hecarim gains {{ resistamount }} Armor and Magic Resist and heals for {{ leechamount }}% of damage nearby enemies take from Hecarim and {{ allytooltipleachvalue }}% of damage taken from his allies.

abilities.name: Devastating Charge
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Devastating Charge (E)** is a **dash-like ability** used **offensively** to close distance, dealing increased damage and applying a knockback.

Hecarim activates E to gain a rapidly increasing movement speed buff and the ability to ignore unit collision for a short duration. His next auto attack during this time will deal bonus physical damage based on the distance he dashed, and apply a knockback to the target.
abilities.original_description: Hecarim gains increasing Move Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability. Hecarim becomes Ghosted and gains <speed>{{ minmovespeed*100 }}% Move Speed</speed> increasing to <speed>{{ maxmovespeed*100 }}%</speed> over {{ e5 }} seconds. His next Attack <status>Knocks Back</status> and deals between <physicalDamage>{{ mindamage }}</physicalDamage> and <physicalDamage>{{ maxdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. <status>Knock Back</status> distance and damage scales with distance travelled during this Ability.

abilities.name: Granite Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: Granite Shield is a passive, auto-targeting buff that grants Malphite a shield absorbing damage equal to 10% of his maximum health. This shield automatically recharges after a few seconds of not taking damage, making it a defensive tool that rewards skillful positioning and trading.
abilities.original_description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.

abilities.name: Seismic Shard
abilities.mechanics_description: **Seismic Shard (Q)** is a targeted **skillshot** that Malphite throws at an enemy champion or minion. It deals magic damage and applies a movement speed slow to the target, while also granting Malphite a temporary movement speed buff equal to the slow percentage. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to initiate combat with a slow and damage, or to chase down fleeing enemies.
abilities.original_description: Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds. Malphite launches a shard of earth at an enemy, dealing <magicDamage>{{ qdamagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Malphite also steals the amount <status>Slowed</status>, gaining it as <speed>Move Speed</speed> for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Thunderclap
abilities.mechanics_description: Thunderclap (W) is an **auto-attack reset** that Malphite uses offensively. His next auto-attack deals bonus physical damage and creates a small cone-shaped aftershock in front of him, cleaving to nearby enemies. For a short duration afterward, all of Malphite's auto-attacks will continue to create these aftershocks.
abilities.original_description:
Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him. Passive: Malphite gains {{ bonusarmorpassive*100 }}% Armor (%i:scaleArmor%{{ f1 }}). This effect is increased to {{ bonusarmorpassive*300 }}% (%i:scaleArmor%{{ f2 }}) while Granite Shield is active.

Active: Malphite's next Attack deals an additional {{ totalbonusdamage }} physical damage and creates an aftershock which deals {{ thunderclapsplash }} physical damage in their direction. His Attacks continue to create aftershocks for the next {{ thunderclapbuffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Ground Slam
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics and Usage:**

Ground Slam is a **circular AoE skillshot** centered on Malphite. Malphite slams the ground, emitting a shockwave that deals magic damage to all enemies within the radius. This ability is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and as a **debuff**, reducing enemy attack speed, which is particularly effective against auto-attack reliant champions. It can also be used as minor **utility** to help his team disengage or secure kills by slowing down enemy attacks.
abilities.original_description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration. Malphite slams the ground, dealing <magicDamage>{{ edamagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> and reducing <attackSpeed>Attack Speed by {{ asreduction }}%</attackSpeed> for {{ duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Force
abilities.mechanics_description: Unstoppable Force is a **linear skillshot** that Malphite targets with a direction. He dashes that distance, damaging and **knocking up** all enemies hit during the dash, and then further **knocking up** enemies at his final destination. It's primarily used **offensively** for initiating fights, dealing damage, and applying significant crowd control.
abilities.original_description: Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air. Malphite charges with the force of a landslide, dashing Unstoppably. At the end of the dash, Malphite <status>Knocks Up</status> for {{ knockupduration }} seconds and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Martial Poise
abilities.mechanics_description: Martial Poise is a **passive** ability that allows Kalista to **dash** a short distance in the direction of a movement command immediately after casting a basic attack or her Q (Pierce). This dash is primarily used **offensively** to reposition for attack chains or defensively to kite enemies and dodge abilities.
abilities.original_description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics:** Sentinel is a skillshot ability that Kalista throws in a straight line. She can use it offensively for bonus damage and defensively for vision.

**Usage:** Kalista's passive bonus damage, triggered when she and her Oathsworn target the same enemy, is a significant combat tool. Her active Sentinel acts as a scouting tool, providing vision of any enemy champions it passes over, and can be cast twice.
abilities.original_description:
Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it. Passive: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both Attack the same target, she deals {{ maxhealthdamage*100 }}% max Health magic damage. This effect has a {{ pertargetcooldown }} second Cooldown per target and a cap of {{ maximummonsterdamage }} to non-champions.

Active: Kalista sends a ghost to patrol an area for three laps. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. This ability has 2 charges ({{ ammorechargetooltip }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Pierce
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics:** Pierce (Q) is a linear skillshot that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit. If the target is killed, the spear continues through them, damaging subsequent enemies and retaining any Rend stacks.

**Usage:** This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and wave clear, and it synergizes with Rend to finish off multiple targets. Kalista can also use it to enable a quick tactical dash via her passive, Martial Poise.
abilities.original_description:
Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills. Kalista hurls a spear, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to the first target hit. If this kills the target, the spear continues onward, carrying any Rend stacks to the next target hit.

Kalista can dash after using this Ability using Martial Poise.

abilities.name: Rend
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Type and Usage:** Skillshot (linear) for offense, dealing physical damage and applying a slow.

**Description:** Kalista throws a spear in a line, impaling the first enemy hit. Activating Rend again rips out all impaled spears from nearby enemies, dealing increasing damage per spear and slowing them; this ability refunds its cooldown and mana on multi-kills.
abilities.original_description:
Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage. Passive: Kalista's spears linger in their target for 4 seconds, stacking any number of times.

Active: Kalista rips the spears from nearby enemies, dealing {{ normaldamage }} plus {{ additionaldamage }} physical damage per spear beyond the first. Slows enemies hit by {{ totalslowamount }} for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If this Ability kills at least one target, its Cooldown is refreshed and it refunds {{ manarefund }} Mana.

abilities.name: Fate's Call
abilities.mechanics_description:
Kalista targets her Oathsworn, pulling them to her location. The Oathsworn can then dash in a target direction, stopping at the first enemy champion hit and knocking back nearby enemies.

**Mechanics:**

*   **How to hit/use:** Targeted spell on an allied champion (her Oathsworn). After being pulled, the Oathsworn has a directional skillshot that stops on the first enemy champion hit.
*   **How it is used:** Primarily for **utility** with **offensive** potential. It allows Kalista to reposition her Oathsworn defensively or set up aggressive plays by enabling them to initiate with a knockback.
abilities.original_description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back. Kalista puts her <keywordMajor>Oathsworn</keywordMajor> into Stasis and draws them to herself for up to 4 seconds. The <keywordMajor>Oathsworn</keywordMajor> can click to launch themselves, stopping at the first champion hit and <status>Knocking Back</status> all nearby enemies. If the <keywordMajor>Oathsworn</keywordMajor> hits a champion, they are placed at their maximum attack range from it.

abilities.name: Unstable Matter
abilities.mechanics_description: Unstable Matter is a **targeted AoE ability** Zac uses offensively to deal damage. It erupts from Zac, damaging all nearby enemies based on their **maximum health**, with a cooldown reduction based on **collecting Goo blobs**.
abilities.original_description:
Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ basedamage }} + {{ displaypercentdamage }} max Health magic damage to nearby enemies.

Absorbing Goo reduces this Ability's Cooldown by 1 second.

abilities.name: Elastic Slingshot
abilities.mechanics_description: Elastic Slingshot (E) is a **skillshot dash** that Zac uses to traverse distances and initiate fights. By charging the ability, Zac stretches himself back before launching forward; upon landing, he **knocks up** nearby enemies and deals magic damage, granting himself extra health blobs for each champion hit.
abilities.original_description:
Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward. Begin Charging: Zac pulls himself taut, charging up a dash over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Release: Zac launches himself and Knocks Up enemies where he lands for up to {{ maxstun }} second (based on charge time), dealing them {{ damage }} magic damage. Zac spawns an extra chunk of Goo for each enemy champion hit.

abilities.name: Stretching Strikes
abilities.mechanics_description: Stretching Strikes (Q) is a linear skillshot that Zac uses offensively to deal damage and slow his first target. His next auto-attack gains range and can be used to pull a second, different enemy champion together with the first, stunning both and damaging and slowing them along with nearby enemies if they collide.
abilities.original_description:
Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other. Zac stretches his arm out, attaching it to the first enemy hit to deal {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and briefly Slow them. Zac's next Attack gains increased range and applies the same damage and Slow.

If Zac hits a different enemy with this Attack, he Knocks Up both towards each other. If they collide, they and surrounding enemies take {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and are briefly Slowed.

abilities.name: Let's Bounce!
abilities.mechanics_description: Let's Bounce! is a **skillshot** that launches Zac in a target direction. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and apply crowd control (knock-up and slow), but also provides **utility** by granting increasing movement speed and allowing the use of other abilities during the cast.
abilities.original_description:
Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them. Zac bounces {{ bounces }} times. The first bounce to hit each enemy Knocks them back and deals {{ damageperbounce }} magic damage. Subsequent bounces deal {{ damagepersubsequentbounce }} magic damage and Slow by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.

Zac gains up to {{ endingms*100 }}% Move Speed over time and can cast Unstable Matter while bouncing.

abilities.name: Cell Division
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Cell Division (Passive):** Zac sheds bloblets when hit by abilities, which he can reabsorb to heal. Upon dying, he splits into four bloblets that must be destroyed by enemies within a short time for him to stay dead; otherwise, he revives.

**Mechanics & Usage:**

*   **How to hit/use:** The bloblets are **auto-targeted** to appear near Zac after he successfully hits an enemy with an **ability**.

*   **How it is used:** This ability is primarily **defensive** and **utility** based. The bloblets provide a self-heal, offering sustain in combat and lane. The revive mechanic on death acts as a powerful "second life" that can allow Zac to survive crucial engagements or turn the tide of a fight if enemies fail to eliminate all his bloblets before they recombine. The bloblets themselves, while not directly used offensively, serve as a deterrent and a resource for Zac's survival.
abilities.original_description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

abilities.name: Umbra Blades
abilities.mechanics_description: Umbra Blades is an auto-target passive that triggers on Nocturne's next basic attack after a short cooldown. It deals bonus physical damage in an area and heals Nocturne, making it a tool for sustained fighting and wave clear.
abilities.original_description:
Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.

abilities.name: Duskbringer
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics:** Skillshot (linear projectile)

**Usage:** Primarily offensive, dealing damage and providing Nocturne with a significant movement speed and attack damage buff if he hits an enemy champion, allowing for aggressive chases or escapes.

**Concise Description:** Nocturne hurls a shadow blade in a line, dealing damage and applying a movement-enhancing trail to any enemy champion struck. While on his own trail, or an enemy champion's, Nocturne gains bonus movement speed and attack damage, and can move through units.
abilities.original_description:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Move Speed and Attack Damage. Nocturne throws a shadow blade, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and leaving a dusk trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne is Ghosted and gains {{ movespeed }}% Move Speed and {{ bonustrailad }} Attack Damage.

abilities.name: Shroud of Darkness
abilities.mechanics_description: **Shroud of Darkness (W)** is a point-and-click ability that grants a temporary spell shield to Nocturne, blocking the next incoming enemy ability. If an ability is successfully blocked, Nocturne's passive attack speed bonus is doubled for a short duration, making it a potent defensive and offensive utility tool.
abilities.original_description:
Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful. Passive: Nocturne gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a shadow barrier for 1.5 seconds that blocks the next enemy Ability. If an Ability is blocked, this Ability's passive effect is increased to {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Unspeakable Horror
abilities.mechanics_description: Unspeakable Horror is a **skillshot** that Nocturne throws in a line. If it hits an enemy champion, it tethers them, dealing damage over time and applying a **fear** if the tether remains unbroken for its duration. The passive grants Nocturne bonus movement speed towards feared enemies, making it useful for both chasing down targets and kiting.
abilities.original_description:
Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration. Passive: Nocturne gains {{ tooltipfearms*100 }}% Move Speed toward Feared enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare tether into his target, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If the tether remains unbroken, the target is Feared for {{ e2 }} second(s).

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Paranoia (R)**

1.  **How to hit/use:** This ability is a **channelled ultimate** that is activated by pressing R. Once activated, Nocturne can then **target an enemy champion** to launch himself at them.
2.  **How it is used:** Paranoia is primarily an **offensive utility** ability that initiates fights and provides a powerful engagement tool. It reduces the vision radius of all enemy champions, making them vulnerable, and then allows Nocturne to close the gap on a chosen target for significant **physical damage**.
abilities.original_description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion. Nocturne darkens the map, reducing the sight radius of all enemy champions and removing their vision of allies for {{ paranoiaduration }} seconds. Nocturne can <recast>Recast</recast> this Ability during the duration to launch himself at an enemy champion dealing <physicalDamage>{{ damage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Zephyr
abilities.mechanics_description: Zephyr is a **skillshot** that Janna activates to deal magic damage and apply a slow to a single target. Passively, it grants Janna bonus movement speed and the ability to move through units, enhancing her mobility.
abilities.original_description:
Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Move Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Move Speed. Passive: Janna gains {{ totalms }} Move Speed and is Ghosted.

Active: Janna's elemental strikes an enemy, Slowing them by {{ totalslow }} for {{ slowduration }} seconds, and dealing {{ totaldamage }} + {{ spell.tailwindself:bonusdamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.mechanics_description: **Tailwind (Passive):** Tailwind is an inherent buff that automatically applies to nearby allied champions and Janna herself. It grants bonus movement speed when moving *towards* Janna, and on-hit attacks and Zephyr (Janna's Q ability) deal bonus magic damage based on a portion of Janna's bonus movement speed. This ability provides both offensive utility through increased damage and defensive/utility benefits through enhanced allied mobility.
abilities.original_description:
Janna's allies gain Move Speed moving towards her.

Janna deals a portion of bonus Move Speed as bonus magic damage on hit and with Zephyr.

abilities.name: Howling Gale
abilities.mechanics_description: Howling Gale is a **linear skillshot** that Janna summons as a stationary projectile. She can **recast** to send it flying forward, dealing magic damage and **knocking back** any enemies in its path. The longer Janna allows the tornado to charge before releasing it, the further it travels, the more damage it deals, and the longer the knockback lasts.
abilities.original_description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path. Janna summons a tornado that grows stronger over {{ maxduration }} seconds then blows along its path. It deals <magicDamage>{{ minimumdamage }} - {{ maxdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Knocks Up</status> for {{ baseknockup }} - {{ maxknockup }} seconds. The distance, damage, and <status>Knock Up</status> duration increase based on how much the tornado grew. Janna can <recast>Recast</recast> to send the tornado early.

abilities.name: Eye Of The Storm
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Eye of the Storm (E)** is a point-and-click ability that shields a targeted allied champion or turret, increasing their Attack Damage while the shield is active. Janna can regain a portion of the cooldown for this ability whenever she successfully crowd controls an enemy champion.

**Mechanics & Usage:**

*   **Targeting:** Point-and-click. Janna selects a single allied champion or turret.
*   **Usage:** Primarily defensive and utility. It provides a shield to absorb damage and a significant Attack Damage buff for allies, making it excellent for empowering carries in fights or protecting turrets during sieges. The cooldown refund mechanic is a crucial utility aspect, encouraging aggressive play and skillful use of Janna's other CC abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage. Janna grants an ally champion or turret {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. While shielded, they gain {{ totalad }} Attack Damage.

Janna refunds {{ ecdrefundforcc*100 }}% of the cooldown whenever she impairs an enemy champion's movement with an Ability.

abilities.name: Monsoon
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Monsoon (R) - Janna**

**1. How to use:** Monsoon is a self-centered, circular AOE ability. It does not require aiming.

**2. How it is used:** Monsoon is primarily a defensive and utility tool. Its initial activation knocks back nearby enemies, creating space and interrupting their aggression. Following the initial knockback, it provides a sustained heal to nearby allies over its duration.

**Mechanics & Usage:** Janna channels a large, stationary circular area around herself that pushes enemies away and then heals allies within it. Reactivating the ability or moving will end the channel early.
abilities.original_description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active. Janna summons a magical monsoon, <status>Knocking Back</status> nearby enemies then healing nearby allies for <healing>{{ totalheal }} Health</healing> over {{ e3 }} seconds. Moving or using an Ability ends the monsoon early.

abilities.name: Hemorrhage
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Hemorrhage (Passive)**

*   **How to hit/use:** Auto-target, applied by Darius' basic attacks and damaging abilities.
*   **How it is used:** Primarily offensively for sustained damage and a powerful defensive buff.

Darius' basic attacks and damaging abilities apply a bleed debuff that stacks up to 5 times and deals physical damage over time. Upon reaching maximum bleed stacks on an enemy, Darius gains bonus Ferocity, significantly increasing his Attack Damage.
abilities.original_description: Darius' attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Darius enrages and gains massive Attack Damage when his target reaches max stacks.

abilities.name: Decimate
abilities.mechanics_description: Decimate is a **wide, circular skillshot** that Darius swings. The **outer edge deals significantly more damage and applies a stack of his passive (Hemorrhage)**, while the **inner part of the swing deals less damage and does not apply Hemorrhage**. Additionally, hitting enemy champions or large monsters with the **outer edge heals Darius for a percentage of his missing health**.
abilities.original_description:
Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions and large monsters hit by the blade. Darius hefts his axe then swings it around, dealing {{ bladedamage }} physical damage with the edge and {{ handledamage }} damage with the handle. Enemies hit with the handle do not take a Hemorrhage stack.

Darius restores {{ e5 }}% missing Health per enemy champion and large jungle monster hit with the edge, up to a max of {{ e7 }}%.

abilities.name: Crippling Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Crippling Strike is an empowered auto-attack that Darius uses offensively. Upon activation, his next auto-attack strikes a single target, dealing bonus physical damage and applying a significant movement speed slow. If the enhanced attack kills the target, it refunds its mana cost and reduces its cooldown.
