abilities.original_description:
Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Move Speed is slowed. Darius' next Attack deals {{ empoweredattackdamage }} physical damage and Slows by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

This Ability refunds its Mana cost and reduces its Cooldown by {{ e3 }}% if it kills the target.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

abilities.name: Noxian Guillotine
abilities.mechanics_description: Noxian Guillotine is a **point-and-click** ultimate that Darius uses **offensively for high true damage burst**. It deals increased damage based on the target's Hemorrhage stacks, and if it secures a kill, Darius can recast it once within a short window for a potential chain execution.
abilities.original_description:
Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration. Darius leaps to an enemy and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ damage }} true damage. For each Hemorrhage on the target, this Ability deals an additional {{ rdamagepercentperhemostack*100 }}% damage, up to a max of {{ maximumdamage }} damage.

If this kills the target, Darius may Recast this Ability once within {{ rrecastduration }} seconds. At rank 3, this Ability has no Mana cost and kills refresh the Cooldown completely.

abilities.name: Apprehend
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Apprehend (E) - Darius**

**Mechanics:** Apprehend is a **cone-shaped skillshot**. Darius swings his axe in a forward arc, pulling in all enemies hit by the swing.

**Usage:** This ability is primarily used for **utility and engagement**. It provides crowd control in the form of a pull, knock-up, and slow, allowing Darius to reposition enemies, lock them down for his own damage, or peel for himself. The passive armor penetration significantly increases his offensive threat by amplifying his physical damage.
abilities.original_description:
Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him. Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Darius hooks with his axe, Pulling, and Knocking Up and Slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

abilities.name: Crimson Pact
abilities.mechanics_description: Crimson Pact is a **passive ability** that automatically converts bonus Health into Ability Power (AP) and AP into bonus Health. This passive is crucial for Vladimir's build path, incentivizing him to acquire both Health and AP to maximize his damage output and survivability.
abilities.original_description: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

abilities.name: Transfusion
abilities.mechanics_description: **Transfusion (Q)** is a point-and-click ability that Vladimir uses to **deal magic damage and heal himself** by draining the lifeforce of a target enemy. It can be used **offensively for damage and sustain**, and its empowered version after two uses provides **increased damage, healing (scaling with missing health), and a brief movement speed burst**.
abilities.original_description:
Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time. Vladimir drains his target's lifeforce, dealing {{ basedamagetooltip }} magic damage and restoring {{ basehealtooltip }} Health. After using this Ability twice, Vladimir gains {{ movementspeedonq2 }}% Move Speed for 0.5 seconds and empowers the next use of this Ability for {{ e8 }} seconds.

The empowered version of this Ability deals {{ empowereddamagetooltip }} magic damage instead and restores an additional {{ empoweredhealtooltip }} plus {{ empoweredhealpercenttooltip }} missing Health.

abilities.name: Sanguine Pool
abilities.mechanics_description: Sanguine Pool is a ground-targeted ability where Vladimir becomes untargetable and gains decaying movement speed for a short duration. While in the pool, he slows nearby enemies, dealing damage and healing himself based on the number of enemy champions affected.
abilities.original_description:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them. Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, gaining {{ hasteboost*100 }}% decaying Move Speed for {{ hasteduration }} second and becoming Untargetable and Ghosted while Slowing enemies in the pool by {{ movespeedmod*-100 }}%.

Vladimir deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and restores {{ totalheal }} Health per enemy over the duration.

abilities.name: Tides of Blood
abilities.mechanics_description: Tides of Blood is a self-cast ability that Vladimir charges by spending health. Once charged, releasing it deals area-of-effect magic damage around him, slowing enemies if charged for at least 1 second.
abilities.original_description:
Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units. Begin Charging: Vladimir charges up a reservoir of blood, spending up to {{ chargehealthtooltip }} Health. While at full charge, Vladimir is Slowed by 20%.

Release: Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood missiles at surrounding enemies, dealing between {{ mindamagetooltip }} and {{ maxdamagetooltip }} magic damage based on charge time. If this Ability was charged for at least 1 second, it also Slows targets by {{ slowpercent }}% for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Hemoplague
abilities.mechanics_description: Hemoplague is a targeted **area-of-effect (AoE) ability centered on Vladimir** that functions as a short-range projectile. He uses it offensively primarily for its **damage amplification debuff on enemies** and subsequent **AoE damage and healing**, making it a crucial tool for teamfights and extended engages.
abilities.original_description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit. Vladimir creates a virulent plague, causing its victims to take {{ e2 }}% increased damage from all sources for {{ e4 }} seconds. After it expires, Vladimir deals <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to all infected targets. Vladimir restores <healing>{{ damage }} Health</healing> if he hits a champion, and restores an additional <healing>{{ secondaryhealingtooltip }} Health</healing> for each champion beyond the first.

abilities.name: Ghostwater Dive
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ghostwater Dive (W):** Pyke activates a stealth buff that also grants decaying bonus movement speed. This ability is primarily used for **utility**, allowing Pyke to reposition defensively for escapes or offensively to engage and flank enemies unseen.
abilities.original_description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time. Pyke gains <keywordStealth>Camouflage</keywordStealth> and <speed>{{ movespeed }}% Move Speed</speed> decaying over {{ e0 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Bone Skewer
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Bone Skewer (Q)** is a **linear skillshot** that can be used in two ways:

*   **Tap:** Pyke stabs, dealing damage and applying a short slow to the first enemy hit.
*   **Hold:** Pyke throws his harpoon, dealing damage, applying a shorter slow, and **pulling** the first enemy hit towards him.

This ability is primarily **offensive**, used for dealing damage, engaging with the pull, or disengaging with the slow. It also provides a small **utility** function through its mana refund mechanic.
abilities.original_description:
Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him. Tap: Pyke stabs, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to the first enemy hit, preferring champions. They are then Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.

Hold: Pyke throws his harpoon, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to the first enemy hit and Pulling them towards him. They are then Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.

If Pyke successfully hits an enemy champion or the channel does not complete successfully, {{ manarefund*100 }}% of the Mana cost is refunded.

abilities.name: Phantom Undertow
abilities.mechanics_description: **Phantom Undertow (E):** This is a **linear skillshot** that Pyke uses to dash forward, leaving a phantom in his wake. After a short delay, the phantom **returns to Pyke**, stunning any enemy champions it passes through and dealing physical damage. It's primarily used offensively for burst damage and crowd control, but the dash also provides mobility for engaging or escaping.
abilities.original_description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path. Pyke dashes, leaving a drowned phantom behind him that returns to him shortly. The phantom <status>Stuns</status> for {{ stunduration }} seconds and deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to champions.

abilities.name: Death From Below
abilities.mechanics_description: Pyke's **Death From Below (R)** is a linear skillshot that allows him to dash a short distance and execute enemies below a certain health threshold with bonus gold awarded to an ally upon a successful execution. Champions above the threshold and non-champions still take damage but are not executed. Pyke can recast the ability for free within a short window if he successfully executes a champion.
abilities.original_description:
Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists. Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, teleporting to and executing targets below {{ rdamage }} Health. Champions above the threshold and non-champions instead take physical damage equal to {{ reduceddamage*100 }}% of that amount ({{ reduceddamagefinal }}).

When an enemy champion dies inside the X, Pyke can Recast this Ability for free within {{ rrecastduration }} seconds. If he executed that champion, the last assisting ally will also get kill gold. If he did not, he will still get kill gold as if he did.

abilities.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Gift of the Drowned Ones (Passive):**

Pyke regenerates health previously lost to enemy champions *only when out of combat and vision* of enemy champions. He synergizes this by **cannot gaining bonus maximum health**, instead converting health *items* into bonus Attack Damage.

**Mechanics Breakdown:**

1.  **How to hit/use the ability:** This is a **passive ability**, meaning it requires no active input from Pyke. Its effect triggers automatically under specific conditions:
    *   **Regeneration:** Pyke needs to be out of combat with enemy champions and out of their line of sight (vision) for the healing to begin.
    *   **Bonus AD Conversion:** This happens passively as Pyke acquires items that would normally grant bonus maximum health.

2.  **How it is used:**
    *   **Defensively:** The primary defensive use is the **health regeneration**, allowing Pyke to recover from poke and trades more effectively when he can safely disengage and break line of sight.
    *   **Offensively/Utility:** The "no max health" aspect is a significant **trade-off that fuels offensive power**. By converting health items into bonus Attack Damage, Pyke scales his damage output significantly, forcing him to rely on his regeneration and defensive abilities (like his shield) rather than raw tankiness. This encourages an aggressive assassination playstyle.
abilities.original_description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

abilities.name: Pillar of Flame
abilities.mechanics_description: Pillar of Flame is a targeted ground-effect skillshot that deals magic damage in an area after a short delay. It's primarily used offensively to apply damage and potentially trigger Brand's passive "Ablaze" bonus damage.
abilities.original_description:
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage. Brand creates a pillar of pure fire, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Units that are Ablaze take {{ empowereddamage }} damage instead.

abilities.name: Sear
abilities.mechanics_description: **Sear (Q)** is a **linear skillshot** that deals magic damage. If the target is already **Ablaze**, Sear will also apply a **stun**, making it a crucial part of Brand's combo for both damage and crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target. Brand launches a fireball that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the target is Ablaze, they will be Stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Blaze (Passive) - Brand**

*   **Type:** Triggered Debuff
*   **Usage:** Offensive (Damage, Area of Effect Burst)

Brand's abilities apply a stacking debuff named Blaze to enemies. Once Blaze reaches 3 stacks on a champion or large monster, it becomes unstable and detonates after a 2-second delay, dealing significant area-of-effect damage and reapplying its own spell effects in the blast radius. Killing an enemy ablaze refunds mana.
abilities.original_description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

abilities.name: Pyroclasm
abilities.mechanics_description: Pyroclasm is a **skillshot** that bounces between Brand and nearby enemies up to 5 times. It is used **offensively** for high magic damage and to apply bonus crowd control with a slow on targets already afflicted by Blaze.
abilities.original_description:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them. Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that can bounce to Brand or another enemy up to 5 times, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies each bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on champions.

If the target is Ablaze, they are briefly Slowed by {{ slowamount }}%.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.mechanics_description: "Conflagration" (E) is a *skillshot* that Brand casts at a target location, dealing magic damage in a small radius. It is used *offensively* to deal damage and apply Brand's passive, "Ablaze," to multiple enemies, doubling its spread range if even one target hit is already ablaze.
abilities.original_description:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled. Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ edamagecalc }} magic damage to surrounding units.

If the target is Ablaze, the spread range is doubled.

abilities.name: Corrosive Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Corrosive Charge is a linear skillshot that Urgot fires. It's primarily used offensively to deal physical damage and apply a slow to enemies caught in its blast, setting up for further engagements or disengaging.
abilities.original_description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion. Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Echoing Flames
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Echoing Flames (Passive)**

*   **How to Hit/Use:** Auto-target.
*   **How it is Used:** Offensively (Damage).

Urgot's passive, Echoing Flames, automatically triggers three bolts of flame around him after he lands three successive basic attacks or Purge hits on the same target. These bolts deal physical damage in a small area, effectively punishing enemies who remain close to Urgot during engagements.
abilities.original_description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.mechanics_description: Urgot's W, **Purge**, is a **toggle ability** that, when activated, causes him to **continuously auto-attack** the closest enemy, prioritizing champions he has recently marked with other abilities. While firing, Urgot gains **slow resistance but is significantly slowed** himself, making it a primary **offensive** tool for applying sustained damage and synergizing with his passive.
abilities.original_description:
Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames. Passive: Urgot's other Abilities mark the last champion hit for 5 seconds.

Active: Urgot begins firing his chain gun at the closest enemy, prioritizing marked enemies. He Attacks them {{ e8 }} times a second dealing {{ damagepershot }} physical damage per shot. Urgot can move while firing and has {{ e2 }}% Slow resistance, but loses {{ e5 }} Move Speed.

At max rank, this Ability lasts indefinitely and can be Toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Disdain
abilities.mechanics_description: **Disdain (E):** This is a **linear skillshot dash** that Urgot uses offensively to engage onto an enemy champion. Upon hitting a champion, it stops Urgot's charge, **stuns** them for a short duration, and **flings them behind him**, setting up potential follow-up attacks. Enemies collided with along the path take physical damage.
abilities.original_description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way. Urgot charges forward, gaining <shield>{{ etotalshieldhealth }} Shield</shield> for {{ eshieldduration }} seconds. The first champion hit is <status>Stunned</status> for {{ stunduration }} seconds and thrown behind Urgot. All enemies Urgot collides with take <physicalDamage>{{ edamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Fear Beyond Death
abilities.mechanics_description: Urgot's **Fear Beyond Death (R)** is a linear skillshot that impales the first enemy champion hit, slowing them based on their missing health. If the target drops below a health threshold, Urgot can recast it to suppress and drag them in, executing them and fearing nearby enemies. This ability is primarily used offensively for single-target assassination and area-of-effect crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them. Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first champion hit, dealing {{ rcalculateddamage }} physical damage and Slowing for {{ rslowduration }} seconds by 1% per 1% missing Health, up to {{ rmovespeedmod }}%.

If the impaled victim falls below {{ rhealththreshold }}% Health, Urgot can Recast this Ability, Suppressing the victim and dragging them to himself. On reaching Urgot, they are killed and nearby enemies are Feared for {{ rfearduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Orb of Deception
abilities.mechanics_description: Orb of Deception is a linear skillshot that Ahri fires out and then retracts. The outgoing orb deals magic damage, while the returning orb deals true damage, allowing Ahri to use it offensively for damage and trading.
abilities.original_description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.  Ahri throws then pulls back her orb, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> on the way out and <trueDamage>{{ totaldamage }} true damage</trueDamage> on the way back.

abilities.name: Essence Theft
abilities.mechanics_description: **Essence Theft (Passive):** Ahri's damaging abilities apply a stack of Essence Theft (up to 3). Upon reaching 9 stacks or killing an enemy champion, her next damaging ability hit will consume the stacks to heal her. This passive provides sustain in lane and during skirmishes, rewarding aggressive spell usage and successful takedowns.
abilities.original_description:
After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals.
After taking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for a greater amount.

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.mechanics_description: Ahri's Charm is a linear skillshot that travels a fixed distance. If it hits an enemy champion, it deals magic damage and applies a Charm debuff, forcing the target to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for a short duration. This ability is primarily used for crowd control (CC) and setting up kills, offering both offensive initiation and disengage potential.
abilities.original_description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her. Ahri blows a kiss that <status>Charms</status> the first enemy hit for {{ charmduration }} seconds and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Spirit Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: **Spirit Rush (R)** is a **targeted dash** that allows Ahri to rapidly reposition up to three times within a set window. Each dash fires a burst of essence bolts that deal magic damage to nearby enemies, prioritizing champions, making it a powerful tool for both **offensive engagement and defensive kiting**, with resets further enhancing its uptime.
abilities.original_description:
Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions. Ahri nimbly dashes, firing {{ rmaxtargetspercast }} essence bolts at nearby enemies, prioritizing champions. These bolts deal {{ rcalculateddamage }} magic damage each. Spirit Rush can be Recast up to 2 more times within {{ rrecastwindow }} seconds.

Consuming a champion's Essence with Essence Theft during this period extends the recast window by up to {{ pdurationextension }} seconds and grants an additional recast of Spirit Rush (up to {{ rmaxcasts }} stored).

abilities.name: Fox-Fire
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics:** Ahri's Fox-Fire (W) is an **auto-targeting** ability. Upon activation, it grants her a decaying movement speed boost and sends out three orbs of fox-fire that automatically home in on the nearest available enemy units.

**Usage:** Fox-Fire is primarily used **offensively** to contribute burst damage and secure kills, especially against lone targets. The reduced damage against secondary targets encourages hitting a single enemy for maximum impact. It can also be used **defensively** to help Ahri escape by providing movement speed.
abilities.original_description: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies. Ahri releases 3 fox-fires that seek nearby enemies and deal <magicDamage>{{ singlefiredamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, reduced to <magicDamage>{{ multifiredamage }} damage</magicDamage> beyond the first. She also gains <speed>{{ movementspeed*100 }}% Move Speed</speed> decaying over {{ movementspeedduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Threads of Vibration
abilities.mechanics_description: **Threads of Vibration (Passive):** Skarner's abilities and basic attacks apply stacks of Quaking to enemies. At four stacks, Quaking detonates, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum health and slowing them. This passive is primarily offensive, rewarding Skarner for consistent engagement and ability usage to proc the bonus damage and utility.
abilities.original_description: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.

abilities.name: Shattered Earth / Upheaval
abilities.mechanics_description: Skarner's Q, "Shattered Earth / Upheaval," is a **buffs-on-next-three-attacks** ability. He gains attack speed and deals AoE physical damage on his next three auto attacks, with the third hit dealing bonus max health damage and applying a slow. Skarner can **recast** the ability before completing the three attacks to throw the boulder as a **linear skillshot**, dealing damage and slowing the first enemy hit and nearby enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful projectile. Skarner rips a boulder from the ground, empowering his next 3 Attacks with {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed and dealing {{ abilitydamage }} physical damage to surrounding enemies. His final Attack will deal an additional {{ maxhppercent*100 }}% max Health physical damage and Slow affected foes by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }}s.

Recast: Skarner ends this Ability and throws his boulder, dealing {{ spell.skarnerq:abilitydamage }} + {{ spell.skarnerq:maxhppercent*100 }}% max Health physical damage, and additionally Slowing the first enemy hit and any other surrounding enemies by {{ spell.skarnerq:slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ spell.skarnerq:slowduration }}s.

abilities.name: Ixtal's Impact
abilities.mechanics_description: Skarner's Ixtal's Impact (E) is a **linear skillshot** that Skarner **charges forward** in a chosen direction, **ignores terrain**, and can be **recast to end early**. If he hits a champion or large monster, he **drags them** and slams them into the next wall for **damage and a stun**, making it primarily an **offensive crowd control** and **engagement/pick tool**.
abilities.original_description:
Skarner charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them. Skarner charges forward, steering toward the chosen direction and ignoring terrain. If he runs into a champion or large monster, Skarner drags them along for the rest of his charge.

Colliding into a wall with an enemy in tow deals {{ pindamage }} physical damage to the enemy and Stuns them for {{ stunduration }}s.

Skarner can Recast this Ability to end his charge early.

abilities.name: Seismic Bastion
abilities.mechanics_description: **Seismic Bastion (W)** is a **self-cast ability** that Skarner uses to gain a **temporary shield** for defense. Simultaneously, it emits a **circular shockwave** around him that deals magic damage and applies a **slow** to all enemies within its radius.
abilities.original_description: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes. Skarner gains <shield>{{ initialshield }} Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }}s and triggers an earthquake that deals <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> nearby enemies by {{ sloweffect*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }}s.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.mechanics_description: **Impale (R)** is a linear skillshot that Skarner casts forward. It deals damage and suppresses the first three champions hit, chaining them to Skarner and dragging them along as he moves. This ability is primarily used offensively for potent crowd control and pick potential, and grants Skarner a movement speed bonus if at least one champion is suppressed, enhancing his subsequent chase or repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by Skarner as he moves around. Skarner's tails lash forward, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and Suppressing the first 3 champions he hits for {{ duration }}s. Those hit are dragged along by Skarner for the duration of this Ability.

If Skarner hits at least one champion he gains {{ speedboostamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ speedboostduration }} seconds.

If Shattered Earth is active, Skarner will cast Upheaval first.

abilities.name: Sigil of Malice
abilities.mechanics_description: Sigil of Malice is a **skillshot** that LeBlanc hurls at an enemy. It deals initial damage and applies a mark, which then detonates for additional damage when hit by another LeBlanc ability, serving as her primary **offensive burst** tool.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage. If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds the Mana cost and part of this spell's remaining Cooldown. LeBlanc projects a sigil to an enemy, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage and marking them for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Damaging the marked enemy with an Ability detonates the sigil, dealing {{ markdamage }} magic damage.

If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds {{ manarefund*100 }}% of the Mana cost and {{ cooldownrefund*100 }}% of this spell's remaining Cooldown.

The initial sigil deals an additional {{ bonusminiondamage }} damage to minions.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.mechanics_description: Mirror Image is a **passive** ability. When LeBlanc's health drops below 40%, she **automatically** triggers an **invisibility** effect for 1 second, during which an **illusionary clone** of herself spawns. This clone mimics her basic attacks and abilities but deals no damage and is primarily used **defensively** to misdirect enemies or **offensively** to scout and create confusion.
abilities.original_description: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Mimic
abilities.mechanics_description: Mimic is a **point-and-click** ability that allows LeBlanc to recast her most recently cast basic ability (Q, W, or E) with significantly increased damage and improved effects. It is primarily used **offensively** for burst damage, allowing her to double-cast spells for amplified assassination potential.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells. LeBlanc mimics her most recent Ability, using it again. The mimicked Ability deals increased damage.

Mimicked Sigil of Malice deals {{ rq1damage }} magic damage when applied, and {{ rq2damage }} magic damage when consumed.
Mimicked Distortion deals {{ rwdamage }} magic damage.
Mimicked Ethereal Chains deals {{ re1damage }} magic damage when shackled and {{ re2damage }} magic damage when Rooting.

abilities.name: Ethereal Chains
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ethereal Chains (E)** is a **skillshot** that LeBlanc throws in a line. It deals initial damage and, if the target remains within range for 1.5 seconds, it **roots** them and deals a burst of additional damage. This ability is primarily used for **CC/utility** to set up other combos or escape, but also contributes to her **damage/burst** potential.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage. LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit, dealing {{ initialdamage }} magic damage and granting True Sight.

If they remain shackled for {{ e3 }} seconds, LeBlanc Roots them for {{ e4 }} seconds and deals an additional {{ delayeddamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Distortion
abilities.mechanics_description: LeBlanc's Distortion (W) is a **point-and-click dash** that sends her to a target location, dealing area-of-effect magic damage to enemies upon arrival. It is primarily used for **offensive repositioning and engaging**, but the ability to **recast it within 4 seconds to return to the original cast location** provides significant **defensive utility and outplay potential**.
abilities.original_description:
LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location. LeBlanc dashes then deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies. For {{ e3 }} seconds after dashing, LeBlanc can Recast.

Recast: LeBlanc returns to her starting location.

abilities.name: Get Excited!
abilities.mechanics_description: "Get Excited!" is a passive ability for Jinx that triggers upon assisting in a champion kill, epic monster kill, or structure destruction. It grants her a temporary, significant boost to her Movement Speed and Attack Speed, allowing for aggressive repositioning and sustained damage output.
abilities.original_description: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

abilities.name: Flame Chompers!
abilities.mechanics_description: Flame Chompers! is a **skillshot** ability where Jinx tosses out three snare grenades in a line. Enemies who walk over them can trigger the grenades, causing them to root and deal magic damage to nearby enemies, making it a potent **crowd control and zoning tool**.
abilities.original_description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place. Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that last for {{ grenadeduration }} seconds. They explode on contact with enemy champions, <status>Rooting</status> them for {{ rootduration }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Switcheroo!
abilities.mechanics_description: **Switcheroo! (Q)** is a **toggle** ability that allows Jinx to switch between her Minigun, **Pow-Pow**, and her Rocket Launcher, **Fishbones**. Using Fishbones provides increased auto-attack range and splash damage at the cost of mana and slower attack speed. Using Pow-Pow grants stacking attack speed bonuses with each auto-attack, making her attacks faster over time. This ability is primarily used offensively to adapt Jinx's auto-attack damage, range, and attack speed to different combat scenarios.
abilities.original_description:
Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower. Jinx swaps weapons between Fishbones the rocket launcher and Pow-Pow the minigun.

While using the rocket launcher, Jinx's Attacks deal {{ rocketdamage }} physical damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ rocketbonusrange }} range, cost Mana, and scale {{ rocketaspdpenalty*100 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

While using the minigun, Jinx's Attacks grant Attack Speed for {{ minigunattackspeedduration }} seconds, stacking up to {{ minigunattackspeedstacks }} times (+{{ minigunattackspeedmax }}% %i:scaleAS% max).

abilities.name: Zap!
abilities.mechanics_description: **Zap! (W):** This is a **linear skillshot** that fires a projectile dealing damage and applying a slow to the first enemy champion it hits. It's primarily used offensively to poke and set up kills by slowing targets, and can also be used defensively to kite enemies.
abilities.original_description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it. Jinx fires a shock blast that deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit, <status>Slows</status> them by {{ slowpercent }}%, and reveals them for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
abilities.mechanics_description: Super Mega Death Rocket! is a linear skillshot that Jinx fires across the map. It travels and gains damage over time, exploding on the first enemy champion hit for significant physical damage, which also executes targets below a certain health threshold and deals reduced damage to nearby enemies. This ability is primarily used offensively for securing kills at range or as a global zone control tool.
abilities.original_description:
Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health. Jinx fires a rocket that explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ damagefloor }} to {{ damagemax }} + {{ percentdamage }}% missing Health physical damage, gaining damage over the first second of travel time. Nearby enemies take {{ aoedamagemult*100 }}% Damage.

Missing Health damage cannot exceed {{ monsterexecutemax }} against Monsters.

abilities.name: Sunlight
abilities.mechanics_description: Sunlight is an **auto-target** passive effect applied to enemies hit by Leona's abilities. When attacked by an allied champion, an afflicted enemy consumes Sunlight to take bonus magic damage. This promotes aggressive play by Leona engaging and amplifying her allies' damage output on the target.
abilities.original_description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

abilities.name: Shield of Daybreak
abilities.mechanics_description: **Shield of Daybreak (Q)** is a point-and-click ability Leona uses to empower her next basic attack. This empowered attack deals bonus magic damage and stuns the target for a short duration, making it a primary tool for Leona to initiate fights and lock down enemies.
abilities.original_description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target. Leona's next Attack <status>Stuns</status> for {{ e1 }} seconds and deals an additional <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }}</magicDamage> magic damage.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics and Usage:**

Eclipse is an **auto-target** ability that Leona activates. It provides a temporary defensive buff to Leona, increasing her resistances and reducing incoming damage. Upon expiry or reactivation, it deals a burst of magic damage to nearby enemies and refreshes the defensive buff if at least one enemy is hit.
abilities.original_description: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect. Leona raises her shield, reducing incoming damage by {{ flatdamagereduction }} and gaining {{ bonusarmortooltip }} Armor and {{ bonusmrtooltip }} Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. Afterwards, her shield detonates, dealing {{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage to nearby enemies. If she hits at least one, she retains the Armor and Magic Resist bonuses for an additional {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Zenith Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: **Zenith Blade (E)** is a **linear skillshot** that Leona uses offensively to deal magic damage and primarily for **utility**. It allows her to engage or reposition by dashing to the *last enemy champion struck*, rooting them for a brief duration.
abilities.original_description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them. Leona thrusts with a sword of light, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} magic damage</magicDamage>. The last champion struck will be <status>Rooted</status> for {{ e2 }} seconds and Leona will dash to them.

abilities.name: Solar Flare
abilities.mechanics_description: Solar Flare is a **circular skillshot** that Leona targets at a location. It deals damage, knocks up, and disorients enemies caught in its radius, with a stronger crowd control effect (stun) in the center and a weaker one (slow) on the edge, making it primarily a **heavy offensive and crowd control tool**.
abilities.original_description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Leona calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing <magicDamage>{{ explosioncalculateddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ ccduration }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are <status>Stunned</status> instead of <status>Slowed</status>.

abilities.name: Ravenous Flock
abilities.mechanics_description: Ravenous Flock is a passive ability that heals Swain and permanently increases his maximum health when he collects Soul Fragments. These fragments are primarily dropped by dying enemies or can be acquired by hitting enemies with his ultimate ability, "Behold, Swain!"
abilities.original_description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health.

abilities.name: Death's Hand
abilities.mechanics_description: Swain's Q, Death's Hand, is a **linear skillshot** that fires 5 bolts in a cone. It is used **offensively** to deal damage, with the damage significantly increasing if enemies are hit by multiple bolts, incentivizing close-range engagements.
abilities.original_description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by. Swain unleashes 5 eldritch bolts, dealing <magicDamage>{{ initialdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>{{ extraboltdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> per bolt past the first (max <magicDamage>{{ maxdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>).

abilities.name: Vision of Empire
abilities.mechanics_description: "Vision of Empire" is a circular skillshot that Swain casts. When it detonates, it deals magic damage, slows, and reveals any enemy champions hit, granting Swain a Soul Fragment. This ability is primarily used offensively to engage, poke, or secure a kill, while also providing utility through its reveal and the Soul Fragment resource for his ultimate.
abilities.original_description:
Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment. Swain opens a demon eye, revealing a location for 1.5 seconds, then deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slows by {{ slow*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Champions hit grant Swain a Soul Fragment and are revealed for {{ revealduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Nevermove
abilities.mechanics_description: Nevermove is a linear skillshot that Swain throws forward, deals magic damage to the first enemy hit, and roots all enemies in its path. Upon reactivation, Swain pulls all currently rooted champions towards him, applying a debuff and granting him a Soul Fragment for each champion pulled.
abilities.original_description:
Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension. Swain launches a wave of demonic power that returns, detonating on the first enemy hit to deal {{ secondarydamage }} magic damage and Root enemies in the area for {{ rootduration }} seconds.

Rooting a champion allows Swain to reactivate this ability to pull all champions Rooted by Nevermove toward him, gaining a Soul Fragment for each.

abilities.name: Demonic Ascension
abilities.mechanics_description: **Demonic Ascension (R)** is a **toggle** ability that allows Swain to transform into a demon, **draining health** from nearby enemies over time. While transformed, he can **activate Demonflare** at intervals to deal **burst damage** and **slow** enemies in an area.
abilities.original_description:
Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate and slow nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire. This form is indefinite as long as Swain drains enemy champions. Swain frees the demon, which deals {{ damagecalc }} magic damage and drains {{ healingcalc }} Health per second from nearby enemies. His Demonic Energy depletes over time but can be recharged indefinitely by draining enemy Champions and is fully restored on Champion takedowns.

After {{ demonflarecastdelay }} seconds and every {{ demonflarecooldowntooltip }} seconds thereafter, Swain can cast Demonflare while transformed, which deals {{ demonflaredamagetotal }} magic damage and Slows enemies by {{ demonflareslowamount*100 }}%, decaying over {{ demonflareslowduration }}s.

abilities.name: Ki Barrier
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ki Barrier (Passive):** This is an auto-targeting defensive ability. Shen generates a personal Energy shield after casting any ability. This shield's cooldown is reduced whenever Shen affects an enemy champion with an ability or attack.
abilities.original_description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

abilities.name: Spirit's Refuge
abilities.mechanics_description: **Spirit's Refuge (W)** is a **skillshot** that Shen uses to create a **defensive zone** for himself and nearby allies. It's not used for damage, but for **defense**, blocking incoming auto-attacks for a duration within the zone.
abilities.original_description:
Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked. Shen creates a defensive zone at his Spirit Blade for {{ e1 }} seconds. Attacks against allied champions in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, it will wait for up to {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Dash
abilities.mechanics_description: **Shadow Dash (E)** is a **linear skillshot dash** that Shen uses to **offensively engage and control enemies**. Upon activation, Shen dashes forward through any enemy champions or large monsters, dealing damage and taunting them for a short duration. This taunt forces affected enemies to attack Shen, and the dash itself can be used to close distance or reposition.
abilities.original_description:
Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path. Passive: Dealing damage with Twilight Assault or this Ability recovers {{ energyrefund }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes, Taunting champions and jungle monsters for {{ ccduration }} seconds and dealing {{ tauntdamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Stand United
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Ability Type:** Auto-target (beneficiary), Channeling (Shen)

**Usage:** Shen targets an allied champion anywhere on the map, granting them a shield that scales with the ally's missing health. After a brief channel, Shen teleports to the shielded ally's location, positioning himself for a teamfight or to defend them.
abilities.original_description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location. Shen grants an allied champion anywhere on the map between <shield>{{ shield }}</shield> and <shield>{{ maxshield }} Shield</shield> based on their missing Health for {{ shieldduration }} seconds (max Shield at 60% missing Health). After channeling for {{ channelduration }} seconds, Shen teleports to his ally's location with his <keywordMajor>Spirit Blade</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Twilight Assault
abilities.mechanics_description: Twilight Assault is a **point-and-click ability** that allows Shen to cast his Spirit Blade a short distance. Upon hitting any target, he **recasts the blade back to himself**, slowing enemies it passes through. The primary usage is **offensive**, dealing damage based on max health, with significant bonus damage and an attack speed buff if an enemy champion is hit by the blade's return.
abilities.original_description:
Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen. Shen recalls his Spirit Blade. Enemies hit by the pull are Slowed by {{ e4 }}% while moving away from Shen for the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Additionally, Shen's next {{ e3 }} Attacks deal an additional {{ baseflatdamage }} plus {{ basepercenthealth }} max Health magic damage. If Shen hit an enemy champion with the Spirit Blade, the damage is increased to {{ baseflatdamage }} plus {{ emppercenthealth }} max Health magic damage and he gains {{ e9 }}% Attack Speed for those Attacks.

abilities.name: Frozen Domain
abilities.mechanics_description: Frozen Domain is a targeted Ground Area of Effect (AoE) ability that Trundle detonates on himself, creating a zone that grants him bonus Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while he remains within it. This ability is primarily used as a **buff/self-enhancement** tool, allowing Trundle to synergize offensively with his auto-attacks and healing, while also providing significant mobility to chase or escape.
abilities.original_description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it. Trundle freezes an area for {{ e4 }} seconds. While inside he gains <speed>{{ e1 }}% Move Speed</speed>, <attackSpeed>{{ e2 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed>, and {{ e3 }}% increased healing.

abilities.name: King's Tribute
abilities.mechanics_description: Trundle's King's Tribute is an **auto-targeting passive** that **releases an area-of-effect heal** whenever an enemy unit dies near him. This is primarily a **defensive/sustain** tool, allowing Trundle to heal for a percentage of the slain unit's maximum health, making him more durable in extended fights or when clearing waves.
abilities.original_description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

abilities.name: Chomp
abilities.mechanics_description: Chomp is a **point-and-click** ability that Trundle uses **offensively**. It deals immediate damage, applies a short slow, and then empowers Trundle's next auto-attack to deal bonus damage and further slow, while also temporarily stealing Attack Damage from the target.
abilities.original_description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage. Trundle's next Attack deals <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and briefly <status>Slows</status> by {{ slowamount*100 }}%, then Trundle gains <physicalDamage>{{ bonusad }} Attack Damage</physicalDamage> for {{ sapdebuffduration }} seconds and the enemy loses <physicalDamage>{{ sappedad*-1 }} Attack Damage</physicalDamage> for the same duration.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.mechanics_description: **Trundle's Subjugate (R)** is a point-and-click targeted ability. It is used **offensively** to steal a percentage of an enemy champion's Health, Armor, and Magic Resist, which is then doubled in effectiveness over the 4-second duration. This ability serves to both damage and significantly debuff a single enemy target, making them weaker and Trundle stronger in combat.
abilities.original_description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled. Trundle drains the lifeforce of an enemy champion, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totalpercenthpdamage }} max Health magic damage</magicDamage> and stealing <scaleArmor>{{ armormrshred*100 }}% Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> over {{ actualdurationofdrainbuff }} seconds.

abilities.name: Pillar of Ice
abilities.mechanics_description:
## Trundle's Pillar of Ice (E)

Pillar of Ice is a **targeted area of effect (AoE) skillshot** that creates an impassable pillar of ice at a target location. While it doesn't require precise aiming like a linear skillshot, the pillar is placed where Trundle directs it.

**Mechanics and Usage:**

*   **Utility:** The primary function of Pillar of Ice is **disruption and control**. It creates a temporary wall that blocks movement, separating enemies, cutting off escape routes, or body-blocking for allies. Enemies directly on top of the pillar when it spawns are briefly **knocked back**, which can interrupt channeled abilities or reposition enemies. Additionally, all enemies near the pillar are **slowed**.
*   **Offensive Use:** While not a direct damage ability, Pillar of Ice is often used offensively to **set up kills**. The knockback and slow can trap fleeing enemies, isolate targets for focused damage, or prevent enemies from reaching Trundle or his allies. The wall can also be used to **zone** enemies during engagements or sieges.
*   **Defensive Use:** It can be used defensively to **disengage**, block off pursuing enemies, or create space for Trundle and his team to escape.

**Concise Description:**

Trundle summons an impassable ice pillar with a targeted AoE, knocking back enemies directly on top of it and slowing nearby foes, primarily used for disrupting enemy positioning and enabling zone control or disengages.
abilities.original_description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units. Trundle creates an icy pillar for {{ e1 }} seconds, briefly <status>Knocking Back</status> enemies directly over it and <status>Slowing</status> nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

abilities.name: Burst Fire
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Zeri's Q - Burst Fire:**

Burst Fire is a **linear skillshot** that fires a rapid burst of 7 projectiles. Each projectile will target the first enemy hit, dealing physical damage and **acting as a basic attack**. It is primarily used **offensively** for sustained damage and synergizes with on-hit effects.
abilities.original_description: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack. Zeri fires a burst of {{ numberofmissiles }} rounds that deals <physicalDamage>{{ activedamagethatcancrit }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.

abilities.name: Living Battery
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Living Battery (Passive)**

**Type:** Auto-target (for damaging component), buff (for bonus damage)

**Usage:** Passive damage and a self-buff. Zeri's basic attacks are treated as abilities, dealing magic damage and charging her Sparkpack. When fully charged, her next basic attack will deal bonus magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Zeri's Attacks deal magic damage and are treated as Abilities. Moving and casting Burst Fire stores up energy in Zeri's Sparkpack. When fully charged her next Attack deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Ultrashock Laser
abilities.mechanics_description: Ultrashock Laser is a linear skillshot that damages and slows the first enemy hit. If it collides with terrain, it expands into a longer-range laser that critically strikes champions and monsters within its area. This ability is primarily used offensively to deal damage and apply a slowing debuff, or as a tool to poke from a distance by bouncing it off walls.
abilities.original_description:
Zeri fires an electric pulse that slows and damages the first enemy hit. If the pulse hits a wall it expands into a long range laser. Zeri fires an electric pulse that deals {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and Slows the first enemy hit by {{ slowpercent*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If the pulse hits terrain, it expands into a laser that applies the effects in an area and Critically Strikes champions and monsters.

abilities.name: Lightning Crash
abilities.mechanics_description: **Lightning Crash (R)** is a circular skillshot that Zeri casts around herself, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit. Upon hitting an enemy champion, Zeri gains a significant burst of attack speed and movement speed, which can be extended and amplified by hitting more champions or scoring critical strikes. While this "Overcharge" buff is active, her auto-attack replacement, Burst Fire, transforms into a rapid triple shot that chains lightning to nearby enemies, enhancing her wave clear and sustained damage in teamfights.
abilities.original_description:
Zeri discharges a nova of electricity and overcharges herself, gaining increased damage and stacking Move Speed that refreshes and gets stronger every time she hits an enemy champion. While overcharged, Burst fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains lightning between enemies. Zeri discharges a nova of electricity, dealing {{ totalactivedamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies. If she hits an enemy champion, Zeri gains {{ baseaspercent*100 }}% Attack Speed and {{ basebonusms*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ rduration }} seconds. Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or Ability extends this ability's duration and adds a stack of Overcharge for {{ maxhyperchargeduration }} seconds. Critical strikes add 2 additional stacks. Each stack grants {{ mspercent*100 }}% Move Speed.

During this time, Burst Fire becomes a faster triple shot that chains {{ chainphysicaldamage }} physical damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Spark Surge
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Spark Surge (E)** is a **dash** that allows Zeri to vault over terrain, greatly extending its range. It then **enhances her next 3 basic attacks** (fired off through her passive "Burst Fire"), making them **pierce through enemies** and deal bonus magic damage on the first target hit. Zeri uses this ability offensively for damage and to reposition, defensively as a quick escape tool, and for utility to traverse the map quickly and chase opponents.

**Mechanics & Usage:** Spark Surge is a dash that can be used to vault over walls, considerably increasing its travel distance. The enhanced shots from Burst Fire are a form of auto-attack modifying ability. Zeri primarily uses this for aggressive repositioning to find pierce angles, dodging skillshots, and escaping dangerous situations. The cooldown reduction from hitting champion targets further incentivizes offensive use to chain abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Zeri dashes a short distance and energizes her next 3 shots of Burst Fire, causing them to pierce through enemies. She will vault and grind over any terrain she touches. Zeri dashes a short distance and vaults over any terrain she touches, greatly extending the dash range. For the next {{ buffduration }} seconds, her shots of Burst Fire pierce dealing {{ pendamagepercent*100 }}% damage to enemies after the first and an additional {{ bonusdamagetotal }} magic damage On-Hit to the first target struck.

Hitting an enemy champion with an Attack or Ability reduces this Ability's cooldown by {{ cdreductionperhit }} seconds. Critical strikes reduce the cooldown by {{ critcdreductionperhit }} seconds instead.

abilities.name: Gathering Fire
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Gathering Fire (Passive)**

*   **How to Hit/Use:** Not applicable, this is a passive ability that activates automatically.
*   **How it is Used:** Offensively. Every time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her damaging abilities (Q - Inner Flame, W - Focused Resolve, or E - Plenty of Power), the cooldown of her ultimate, Mantra, is reduced. This allows Karma to cast Mantra more frequently, empowering her basic abilities for stronger effects.
abilities.original_description: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.

abilities.name: Inner Flame
abilities.mechanics_description: Inner Flame is a linear skillshot that deals damage to the first enemy hit and then explodes, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in a small area around the primary target. When empowered by Mantra, the explosion also deals additional damage after a short delay in a slightly larger area.
abilities.original_description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay. Karma fires a blast of energy, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first target hit and surrounding enemies, and Slowing them by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.mechanics_description: Inspire is a skillshot that Karma fires in a target direction. It shields the first allied champion it hits, granting them bonus movement speed, and a larger shield and bonus applies to nearby allies if empowered by her Mantra.
abilities.original_description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions. Karma grants an allied champion {{ totalshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }}s and {{ movespeed*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }}s.

abilities.name: Focused Resolve
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Focused Resolve (W)** is a skillshot that Karma fires from herself, creating a tether to the first enemy champion or large monster hit. It's used defensively to peel for herself and allies by rooting enemies, and offensively to lock down targets for follow-up damage.

**Mantra Bonus:** Empowers the tether to heal Karma and significantly extend the root duration.
abilities.original_description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration. Karma tethers herself to a champion or jungle monster, dealing {{ initialdamage }} magic damage and revealing them for {{ tetherduration }}s. If the tether remains unbroken, the target takes {{ initialdamage }} magic damage again and is Rooted for {{ rootduration }}s.

abilities.name: Mantra
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Karma's R - Mantra:**

Mantra is a **self-cast** ability that empowers Karma's *next* basic ability within 8 seconds, enhancing its effect. It is used both **offensively** to amplify damage and crowd control, and **defensively** to provide a stronger shield and heal.
abilities.original_description:
Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point. Karma empowers her next Ability used within 8 seconds.
  • Inner Flame: Deals an additional {{ rqimpactdamage }} magic damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, Slowing enemies and dealing an additional {{ rqfielddamage }} magic damage.
  • Focused Resolve: Karma will restore {{ rwhealamount }} missing Health at the beginning and end of the tether, and Root for {{ rwbonusroot }}s longer.
  • Inspire: Karma shields her target for {{ rebonusshield }} more Shield, and also shields allies near her target, granting them {{ rebonusshieldarea }} Shield and {{ removespeed*100 }}% Move Speed.

abilities.name: Adaptive Defenses
abilities.mechanics_description: **Camille's Adaptive Defenses (Passive)** is an **auto-target** ability used **defensively**. Basic attacking an enemy champion grants Camille a shield for a few seconds that specifically counters the damage type of the last champion she hit, absorbing either physical or magic damage.
abilities.original_description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Tactical Sweep
abilities.mechanics_description: **Tactical Sweep (W)** is a **cone-shaped skillshot** that Camille charges up before releasing. It's used offensively for damage and wave clear, with enemies hit by the outer edge taking bonus damage based on their max health and also suffering a decaying slow, while Camille heals based on the bonus damage dealt to champions.
abilities.original_description:
Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille. Camille winds up and slices, dealing {{ basedamagetotal }} physical damage.

Enemies hit by the outer half are Slowed by {{ slowpercentage }}% decaying over {{ slowduration }} seconds, and they take an additional {{ outeredgetooltip }} max Health physical damage. Camille restores {{ outerconehealingratio }}% of the bonus damage dealt to champions as Health.

abilities.name: Precision Protocol
abilities.mechanics_description: Precision Protocol (Q) is an empowered attack that Camille can **recas**t. The first cast deals bonus physical damage and grants movement speed. Recasting it after a short delay significantly boosts the bonus damage and converts a portion to true damage, making it a potent offensive tool for burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks. Camille's next Attack deals an additional {{ bonusdamage }} physical damage and grants her {{ msbonus*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ msduration }} second. This ability can be Recast in the next {{ qtotalrecasttime }} seconds.

If the Recast Attack hits at least {{ qrampuptime }} seconds after the first, the bonus damage is increased to {{ empoweredbonusdamage }} and {{ damageconversionpercentage }} of the Attack's damage is converted into true damage.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

abilities.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
abilities.mechanics_description: **Camille's Hextech Ultimatum (R)** is a targeted dash that makes her briefly untargetable. Upon arrival, it knocks away nearby enemies and **locks the primary target within a circular zone**, preventing their escape by any means for its duration. While the target is trapped, Camille's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage based on a percentage of their current health.
abilities.original_description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks. Camille briefly becomes Untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ rduration }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are <status>Knocked Away</status>. Her Attacks against the trapped enemy deal an additional <magicDamage>{{ rpercentcurrenthpdamage }}% current Health magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Hookshot (E)** is a two-part skillshot.

1.  **First Cast:** Camille fires a hookshot that attaches to terrain. This pulls her to the wall, positioning her to recast the ability.
2.  **Second Cast (Recast):** While attached to the wall, Camille can recast to dash. She dashes towards the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals physical damage and knocks up nearby enemies. If she dashed at an enemy champion, the dash travels twice as far and grants her bonus attack speed.

**Mechanics & Usage:** Hookshot is primarily a **utility and offensive** ability. It allows Camille to traverse the map by attaching to walls and can be used defensively to reposition or offensively to engage, knock up, and stun enemy champions. The extended dash range and subsequent attack speed buff on enemies make it a powerful initiation and follow-up tool.
abilities.original_description:
Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing. Camille fires a hookshot that attaches to terrain, pulling her to it for 1 second and allowing this Ability to be Recast.

Recast: Camille dashes from the wall, colliding with the first enemy champion hit. Upon landing, she deals {{ totaldamage }} physical damage to nearby enemies and Stuns enemy champions for {{ knockupduration }} seconds. Dashes towards enemy champions travel twice as far and grant {{ asbuff*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ asduration }} seconds on impact.

abilities.name: Salvation
abilities.mechanics_description: Salvation is an **auto-targeting** passive that grants Soraka **movement speed** when she is near allied champions below 40% health, allowing her to reach and assist them more quickly. This utility buff is primarily used **defensively** to position herself for healing or other supportive actions.
abilities.original_description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

abilities.name: Starcall
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Starcall (Q)** is a **skillshot** that Soraka targets at a location. It deals magic damage and applies a slow to enemies hit. If an enemy champion is struck, Soraka also heals herself and gains a temporary movement speed buff.

**Description:**

Starcall is a **circular AoE skillshot** that Soraka casts at a target location. It deals magic damage and applies a significant slow to all enemies within the radius. Crucially, if the starfall hits one or more enemy champions, Soraka **heals herself** for a portion of her maximum health over time and gains a decaying **movement speed buff**. This self-sustain is core to Soraka's playstyle, allowing her to trade effectively in lane and sustain through prolonged engagements.
abilities.original_description:
A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health. Soraka calls down a star, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ movespeedslow*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Hitting an enemy champion grants Soraka Rejuvenation, which restores {{ totalhot }} Health over {{ hotduration }} seconds and grants {{ movespeedhaste*100 }}% Move Speed decaying over the same duration.

abilities.name: Astral Infusion
abilities.mechanics_description: **Astral Infusion (W):** Astral Infusion is a point-and-click targeted ability that consumes a percentage of Soraka's current health to heal a chosen allied champion. It is primarily used defensively to sustain allies in lane or during combat, with the added benefit of granting Rejuvenation to the target if Soraka herself is under its effect, further reducing the health cost and providing a small additional heal over time.
abilities.original_description:
Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion. Soraka restores {{ totalheal }} Health to another allied champion.

If Soraka is affected by Rejuvenation, the Health cost will be reduced by {{ percenthealthcostrefund*100 }}%, and the target will gain Rejuvenation for {{ spell.sorakaq:hotduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Equinox
abilities.mechanics_description: Equinox is a **circular skillshot** that Soraka places at a target location. It **silences** enemies within the zone for its duration and then **roots** them after a short delay. This ability is primarily used for **utility and crowd control (CC)**, defensively to peel for herself or allies, or offensively to set up kills by locking down targets.
abilities.original_description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted. Soraka creates a starfield that deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> to champions. The field lingers for {{ rootdelay }} seconds, <status>Silencing</status> enemies inside. When the zone disappears, champions inside the zone are <status>Rooted</status> for {{ rootduration }} second(s) and take <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Wish
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Wish (R) - Soraka:**

*   **Usage:** Auto-target, global range, Cast time: 1 second (channel).
*   **Mechanics:** Soraka channels for 1 second, during which she can be interrupted, instantly healing herself and all allied champions regardless of their position on the map. The healing is significantly amplified if the target ally is below 40% health.
*   **Primary Use:** Wish is Soraka's ultimate, primarily used defensively to save allies from death or to sustain her team during extended fights. It can also be used offensively to secure objectives if the team needs the sustain to push or defend.
abilities.original_description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions. Soraka calls upon divine powers, restoring <healing>{{ healingcalc }} Health</healing> to all allied champions, regardless of distance. Healing is increased to <healing>{{ ampedhealing }}</healing> on targets below 40% Health.

abilities.name: Piercing Light
abilities.mechanics_description: Lucian's Piercing Light (Q) is a linear skillshot that fires a bolt of light dealing physical damage. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage and harass enemies, and can be cast immediately after an auto attack.
abilities.original_description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target. Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Lightslinger
abilities.mechanics_description: **Lightslinger (Passive):** After casting an ability, Lucian's next basic attack fires two shots instead of one, with the second shot dealing reduced damage. Additionally, when Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy champion is Crowd Controlled, his next two basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage (this effect has a cooldown). This passive is automatically triggered by ability usage and ally interactions, and is used offensively to increase damage output and burst potential.
abilities.original_description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot. When Lucian is healed or shielded by an ally, or when a nearby enemy Champion is immobilized, his next 2 basic attacks will deal bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Ardent Blaze
abilities.mechanics_description: Ardent Blaze is a linear skillshot that damages the first enemy hit, revealing marked targets. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage, and its secondary effect provides a significant movement speed buff to both Lucian and his allies when they attack marked enemies, promoting engage and kiting.
abilities.original_description:
Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Move Speed for attacking marked enemies. Lucian fires a shot that explodes at the end of its range or on the first enemy hit, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, briefly revealing enemies and marking them for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or an ally damages a marked enemy, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Move Speed for 1 second. Allies triggering this effect will also grant Lucian Vigilance.

abilities.name: Relentless Pursuit
abilities.mechanics_description: Relentless Pursuit, Lucian's (E) ability, is a **short-range dash** that can be used to reposition offensively or defensively. Each successful hit from Lucian's Lightslinger passive (his next auto-attack after an ability) **reduces the cooldown of Relentless Pursuit**, allowing for rapid, chained dashes in combat.
abilities.original_description:
Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown. Lucian dashes.

Cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second whenever Lucian hits an enemy with Lightslinger ({{ e2 }} seconds for champions).

abilities.name: The Culling
abilities.mechanics_description: Lucian's ultimate, The Culling, is a **linear skillshot** that fires a rapid barrage of shots in a target direction. It's primarily used **offensively** to deal significant sustained damage to a single target or spread damage across multiple enemies in a line, often in conjunction with his dash to reposition during the channel.
abilities.original_description:
Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons. Lucian rapidly fires {{ totalnumshots }} shots in a direction for {{ duration }} seconds or until he Recasts. Each shot deals {{ damageperbullet }} physical damage to the first enemy hit.

While firing, Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit.

Total Damage: {{ totaldamage }} physical damage

abilities.name: Bandage Toss
abilities.mechanics_description: **Bandage Toss (Q)** is a linear skillshot that Amumu throws. Upon hitting the first enemy, Amumu is pulled to their location, stunning the target and dealing magic damage. This ability has two charges and is primarily used offensively to initiate fights, lock down a target with crowd control, and close the distance.
abilities.original_description:
Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them. Amumu launches a bandage, pulling himself to the first enemy hit, Stunning them for {{ e2 }} second, and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

This Ability has 2 charges.

abilities.name: Cursed Touch
abilities.mechanics_description:
Your description is good, but let's refine it for clarity.

"Cursed Touch" is a passive ability that applies a debuff to enemies Amumu **hits with his basic attacks**. This debuff causes them to take **bonus true damage** from all subsequent magic damage sources, enhancing Amumu's and his team's offensive magic damage output.
abilities.original_description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

abilities.name: Despair
abilities.mechanics_description: Despair is a **toggle ability** that Amumu activates to passively **deal damage over time** to enemies around him based on a percentage of their maximum health. It is primarily used **offensively** to apply sustained damage and pressure, and can also be used **defensively** to deter opponents by forcing them to take damage if they remain near Amumu.
abilities.original_description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed. <toggle>Toggle:</toggle> Amumu begins crying, dealing <magicDamage>{{ basedamage }} plus {{ totalhealthdamage }}% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies every second and refreshing <keywordMajor>Curse</keywordMajor>.

abilities.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
