This ability is primarily used **defensively to sustain allies** and **offensively to poke enemies**, with both healing and damage being amplified on subsequent bounces.
abilities.original_description:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies. Nami unleashes a stream of water that bounces between allied and enemy champions. Each champion can only be hit once, and it hits up to {{ maxtargets }} targets.
  • Restores {{ totalheal }} Health to allies and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.
  • Deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies and will bounce to a nearby allied champion.
    The damage and healing value is modified by {{ bouncescaling }} each bounce.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Tidal Wave (R)** is a linear skillshot that travels across a significant distance, knocking up enemies for 0.5 seconds, slowing them, and dealing magic damage. The slow duration scales with how far the wave travels. Enemies are **knocked up**, and allies hit by the wave gain a doubled movement speed buff from Nami's E ability, Surging Tides.

**Mechanics & Usage:**
*   **Type:** Linear Skillshot
*   **Primary Use:** Primarily offensive and utility. It's a powerful engage tool to initiate fights by knocking up and slowing multiple enemies, setting them up for follow-up crowd control. The extended slow duration on max range is particularly potent for catching fleeing targets or creating distance. The allied movement speed buff also provides significant utility for team repositioning or chasing. While it deals damage, it's not typically the primary source of burst damage for Nami.
abilities.original_description:
Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides. Nami summons a tidal wave, Knocking Up for 0.5 seconds, Slowing by {{ e4 }}%, and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. The duration of the Slow increases based on distance the wave traveled, up to {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

abilities.name: Crescent Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: **Crescent Strike (Q)** is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage to enemies in an arc. It applies **Moonlight**, revealing enemies for a short duration, and serves as a primary damage and poke tool for Diana.
abilities.original_description:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds. Diana unleashes an arc of lunar energy, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and marking with Moonlight for {{ moonlightduration }} seconds.

Moonlight reveals enemies that are not stealthed.

abilities.name: Moonsilver Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Moonsilver Blade is an **auto-target** passive that enhances Diana's basic attacks. Every third auto-attack deals bonus magic damage in a small cleave, and casting any ability grants Diana a temporary buff to her attack speed, encouraging aggressive, spell-weaving auto-attack combos.
abilities.original_description: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Pale Cascade
abilities.mechanics_description: Pale Cascade is a **skillshot** where Diana summons three orbs that orbit her. These orbs **auto-target** the nearest enemies upon activation, dealing AoE magic damage and granting Diana a shield. Detonating all three orbs refreshes the shield's duration and adds bonus strength, making it a tool for both an offensive burst and defensive survivability.
abilities.original_description:
Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength. Diana creates three orbiting spheres for {{ shieldduration }} seconds that explode on contact, each dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, up to a max of {{ totalmaxdamage }} damage.

Diana also gains {{ shieldvalue }} Shield for the same duration. When the last sphere detonates, she gains an additional {{ shieldvalue }} Shield and refreshes the duration.

abilities.name: Moonfall
abilities.mechanics_description: Moonfall is a **circular AOE skillshot** that Diana uses **offensively** to pull all nearby enemies towards her and apply a **slow**. If at least one enemy champion is caught, Moonlight crashes down shortly after, dealing significant magic damage in an area around Diana, with bonus damage for each additional champion pulled.
abilities.original_description:
Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them.

If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled. Diana Pulls In, Slows by {{ slowtooltip }}%, and reveals nearby enemies for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If Diana hits at least one enemy champion, she calls to the moon, dealing {{ rexplosiondamage }} magic damage plus {{ rmultihitamplification }} for each champion pulled beyond the first, up to a max of an additional {{ maxdamage }} damage.

abilities.name: Lunar Rush
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Ability Type:** Dash

**Usage:** Diana dashes to an enemy, dealing magic damage. If the target is affected by her passive "Moonlight," the cooldown is refreshed, allowing for rapid, chained dashes. This ability is primarily used offensively for engage and chasing, and the refreshed cooldown enables aggressive, multi-target engagements.
abilities.original_description:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush. Diana becomes as the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. If the target is afflicted with Moonlight, this Ability's Cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.name: Noxious Slipstream
abilities.mechanics_description: Noxious Slipstream is a **passive** and **auto-targeting** ability. It grants Singed a temporary burst of movement speed *whenever* he moves through a space occupied by an enemy champion, primarily used for **utility** to chase or kite and position better.
abilities.original_description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

abilities.name: Poison Trail
abilities.mechanics_description: **Poison Trail (Q)** is a **toggle ability** that Singed activates to leave a persistent trail of poison behind him as he moves. This trail deals **area-of-effect magic damage** over time to enemies standing within it, making it primarily an **offensive utility** tool for sustained damage in fights and zone control.
abilities.original_description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path. <toggle>Toggle:</toggle> Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals <magicDamage>{{ damagepersecond }} magic damage</magicDamage> per second.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Type:** Skillshot (projectile, fires in the direction Singed is facing)

**Usage:** Offensive utility and crowd control. Singed flings an enemy unit over his shoulder, dealing magic damage based on their maximum health. If the flipped target lands within Singed's Mega Adhesive (W), they are also rooted.
abilities.original_description:
Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted. Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ e3 }}% max Health magic damage.

If Singed flings a target into his Mega Adhesive, they are Rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Insanity Potion
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Insanity Potion (R)** is a **toggle** ability that Singed activates to **boost his own combat stats**, increasing his Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for a duration. While active, his **Poison Trail** also applies **Grievous Wounds**, reducing enemy healing.

**How to hit/use:** Toggle (activate/deactivate).
**How it is used:** Primarily as a **buff** to enhance Singed's survivability and engage potential, with **utility** added through the Grievous Wounds debuff on his Poison Trail.
abilities.original_description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds. Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ statamount }} <scaleAP>Ability Power</scaleAP>, <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor>, <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>, <speed>Move Speed</speed>, <healing>Health Regen</healing>, and <scaleMana>Mana Regen</scaleMana> for {{ duration }} seconds. During this effect, Singed's <spellName>Poison Trail</spellName> also applies {{ grievousamount*100 }}% Grievous Wounds for {{ grievousduration }} second.

abilities.name: Mega Adhesive
abilities.mechanics_description: Mega Adhesive is a ground-targeted circular area-of-effect ability. It applies a slow and a ground debuff to enemies who enter the area, preventing them from using movement abilities. Singed uses Mega Adhesive primarily for utility, to control enemy movement, set up his poison trail, and disengage from fights.
abilities.original_description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it. Singed hurls a cask of sticky liquid, <status>Grounding</status> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies in the area by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ wduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Nether Blade
abilities.mechanics_description: Nether Blade is an **auto-target** ability that Kassadin **auto-attacks** with. It enhances his next auto-attack to deal significant bonus magic damage and restore a portion of his missing mana, with a bonus against champions, primarily used for **offensive burst and mana sustain**.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana. Passive: Kassadin's Attacks deal an additional {{ onhitdamage }} magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his blade, causing his next Attack to deal {{ activedamage }} magic damage and restore {{ missingmanaratio }}% missing Mana, increased to {{ championmissingmanaratio }}% against champions.

abilities.name: Void Stone
abilities.mechanics_description: Void Stone is Kassadin's passive ability and is always active. It grants him **passive magic damage reduction** and makes him **pass through enemy units**. This passive is used **defensively** to tank magic damage and **offensively** to improve his mobility and ability to chase or escape.
abilities.original_description: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

abilities.name: Force Pulse
abilities.mechanics_description: Force Pulse is a **cone skillshot** that Kassadin fires in front of him. It's used **offensively** to deal magic damage and apply a slow to enemies caught in the cone, allowing for follow-up attacks or escapes.
abilities.original_description:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him. Passive: Force Pulse's Cooldown is reduced by {{ reductionperspellcast }} second whenever any Ability is used near Kassadin.

Active: Kassadin unleashes a void pulse, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

abilities.name: Null Sphere
abilities.mechanics_description: Kassadin's Q, Null Sphere, is a **point-and-click** ability that deals magic damage to a target and **interrupts channeling abilities**. It also provides Kassadin with a **temporary magic damage shield**, making it a versatile tool for both trading offensively and mitigating enemy magic damage defensively.
abilities.original_description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage. Kassadin fires an orb of void energy, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and interrupting channels. Kassadin also gains <shield>{{ totalshield }} Magic Shield</shield> for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Riftwalk
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Riftwalk (R) - Kassadin**

*   **Type:** Dash. Kassadin blinks to a target nearby location.
*   **Usage:** Primarily offensive for closing gaps and dealing damage, but also highly versatile for repositioning defensively or weaving through fights. Each subsequent cast within a timeframe significantly increases mana cost and damage, allowing for high burst potential but requiring careful mana management.
abilities.original_description:
Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage. Kassadin teleports to a nearby location, dealing {{ basedamage }} magic damage.

Each subsequent use of this Ability within the next {{ rstackduration }} seconds doubles the Mana cost and deals an additional {{ bonusdamage }} magic damage. The cost and damage increases can stack up to {{ maxstacks }} times.

abilities.name: Yordle Snap Trap
abilities.mechanics_description: Yordle Snap Trap is a **skillshot** ability that Caitlyn places on the ground. When an enemy champion walks over it, they are **rooted** and revealed, allowing Caitlyn to follow up with her empowered auto-attack, Headshot.
abilities.original_description: Caitlyn sets a trap that, when sprung, reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot. Caitlyn sets a trap that <status>Roots</status> the first champion that steps on it for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting <keywordStealth>True Sight</keywordStealth> of them for 3 seconds. Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds, and {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once. This Ability has {{ e5 }} charges ({{ ammorechargetime }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.mechanics_description: Caitlyn's Headshot is a passive ability that enhances her basic attack. After attacking a total of 6 times, her next attack becomes a empowered "Headshot," dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. This bonus critical strike damage is doubled in range when attacking enemies affected by her **Yordle Snap Trap** (W) or **90 Caliber Net** (E). Headshot is primarily used offensively to increase burst damage and extend Caitlyn's effective range.
abilities.original_description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

abilities.name: Piltover Peacemaker
abilities.mechanics_description: Piltover Peacemaker is a linear skillshot that deals high physical damage to the first target hit and reduced damage to subsequent targets it passes through. It is primarily used offensively for poke and to secure kills, especially when augmented by her traps to guarantee full damage.
abilities.original_description:
Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Caitlyn revs her rifle to fire a piercing shot dealing {{ initialdamage }} physical damage. After the bolt strikes the first target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ secondarydamage }} physical damage.

Enemies revealed by Yordle Snap Trap always take full damage.

abilities.name: 90 Caliber Net
abilities.mechanics_description: 90 Caliber Net is a **linear skillshot** that, upon hitting an enemy, deals magic damage, slows them, and knocks Caitlyn a short distance backward. It is primarily used **defensively** to create space and escape danger, but can also be used offensively to peel for allies or set up further engagements by slowing an enemy.
abilities.original_description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back. Caitlyn fires a net, pushing her backwards. The net <status>Slows</status> the first target hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second and deals <magicDamage>{{ netdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Ace in the Hole
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ace in the Hole (R)** is a **long-range, linear skillshot** that deals massive physical damage. While channeling, Caitlyn gains True Sight on her target, but **any enemy champion can dash or move to intercept the bullet for their ally**, effectively taking the damage instead. This ability is primarily used **offensively for high-damage burst** at extreme range or to finish off fleeing targets, though its intercept mechanic makes it a tactical tool for baiting enemy cooldowns or punishing mispositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally. Caitlyn takes a moment to channel and line up the perfect shot, then she fires, dealing {{ rtotaldamage }} physical damage, but other enemy champions can intercept it. This Ability grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

Deals up to an additional {{ critchanceamp*100 }}% based on Caitlyn's Critical Strike chance.

abilities.name: Way of the Hunter
abilities.mechanics_description:
Way of the Hunter is Yone's passive ability.

1.  **How to hit/use:** This is a passive effect that triggers automatically after Yone lands two basic attacks.
2.  **How it is used:** It is used offensively to deal bonus magic damage on every second attack and to increase Yone's critical strike chance, allowing for higher damage output and more frequent critical strikes.
abilities.original_description: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.

abilities.name: Mortal Steel
abilities.mechanics_description: **Mortal Steel (Q)** is a linear skillshot that damages enemies in a line and grants a stack of Gathering Storm on hit. At two stacks, the next cast becomes Mortal Steel's empowered version, which dashes Yone forward, knocking up enemies in his path.
abilities.original_description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne. Yone thrusts forward, dealing {{ qdamage }} physical damage.

On hit, grants a stack for {{ buffduration }} seconds. At 2 stacks, this ability causes Yone to dash forward with a wave of wind that Knocks Up for {{ q3knockupduration }} seconds and deals {{ qdamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Soul Unbound
abilities.mechanics_description: **Yone's E - Soul Unbound** is a **dash** that allows him to briefly enter a spirit form, leaving his mortal body behind. While in spirit form, he gains ramping movement speed for engaging or repositioning, and upon returning to his body, he deals **damage** based on a percentage of the champion damage he inflicted during spirit form. This makes it a powerful tool for aggressive trading and setting up kills.
abilities.original_description:
Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining Move Speed. When this ability ends, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit. Yone enters a spirit form for {{ returntimer }} seconds, leaving his body behind for the duration and gaining {{ startingms*100 }}% to {{ movementspeed*100 }}% ramping Move Speed.

When the spirit form ends, Yone snaps back to his body and repeats {{ deathmarkpercent*100 }}% of all Attack and Ability damage he dealt to champions during this time. You may Recast this ability during spirit form.

Recast: End spirit form early.

abilities.name: Fate Sealed
abilities.mechanics_description: **Fate Sealed (R):** Yone unleashes a linear skillshot wave that deals mixed damage, teleports him to the **last champion hit** behind them, and knocks up all enemies struck towards him. This ability is primarily used offensively for engage, crowd control, and damage, with a strong focus on isolating and disrupting enemy teams.
abilities.original_description: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him. Yone strikes all enemies along a path for <physicalDamage>{{ tooltipdamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <magicDamage>{{ tooltipdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, teleporting behind the last champion hit and <status>Knocking Up</status> victims towards Yone.

abilities.name: Spirit Cleave
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Spirit Cleave (W)**

*   **How to use:** A linear skillshot that Yone swings in a cone in front of him.
*   **Usage:** Primarily offensive, dealing both physical and magic damage based on the target's max health. It also provides a defensive shield, with its strength significantly amplified by the number of champions hit, encouraging aggressive multi-target engagements.
abilities.original_description:
Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to Yone, the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe.

Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed. Yone cleaves forward, dealing {{ basedamage*0.5 }} + {{ maxhealthdamage*50 }}% max Health physical damage and {{ basedamage*0.5 }} + {{ maxhealthdamage*50 }}% max Health magic damage.

If Yone hits, he gains {{ wshield }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. The amount of Shield increases for each champion struck.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.mechanics_description: **Annie's Disintegrate (Q) is a point-and-click skillshot that deals magic damage and refunds its mana cost and 50% cooldown if it kills the target.** This makes it a crucial tool for farming minions and securing kills, allowing Annie to cast it repeatedly in lane.
abilities.original_description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target. Annie hurls a fireball, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. If the target dies, Annie refunds the Mana cost and reduces the Cooldown by 50%.

abilities.name: Pyromania
abilities.mechanics_description: Pyromania is a passive ability for Annie that automatically triggers. After casting **4 spells** (basic abilities or ultimate), Annie's **next offensive spell** that would normally hit a target will also **stun** them for a duration. This empowers Annie's offensive spellcasting with crowd control, enhancing her burst potential and engage capabilities.
abilities.original_description:
After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.mechanics_description: **Incinerate (W)** is a cone-shaped skillshot that Annie casts in front of her, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit. It's primarily used offensively for area-of-effect (AoE) damage and to apply damage to multiple targets simultaneously, often to set up or follow up on her ultimate.
abilities.original_description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area. Annie projects a wave of fire, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Molten Shield
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Type:** Auto-target (on self or an ally)

**Usage:** Defensive/Utility

**Description:** Molten Shield is an **auto-target** ability Annie can cast on herself or an ally, providing a temporary **shield** and increased movement speed. While the shield is active, the shielded target **retaliates against attackers** with magic damage whenever they are struck by an enemy auto-attack or ability.
abilities.original_description:
Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells. Annie grants an ally champion {{ shieldblocktotal }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds and {{ movespeedcalc }} Decaying Move Speed for {{ movementspeedduration }} seconds. While the shield holds, enemies who hit the shielded ally with an Attack or Ability receive {{ damagereturn }} magic damage once per shield.

Tibbers always gains the effects of Molten Shield when summoned.

abilities.name: Summon: Tibbers
abilities.mechanics_description: "Summon: Tibbers" is a targeted area-of-effect ability that summons Tibbers, dealing initial damage and applying a burn over time to nearby enemies. When enraged (triggerable by stunning an enemy champion or Annie's death), Tibbers gains significantly increased attack and movement speed, and Annie gains bonus magic penetration. Tibbers' movement and attacks can be manually directed by recasting the ability.
abilities.original_description:
Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him. Passive: Annie gains {{ rpercentpenbuff*100 }}% Magic Penetration.

Annie summons her bear Tibbers, dealing {{ initialburstdamage }} magic damage. For the next {{ tibberslifetime }} seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ tibbersauradamage }} magic damage per second.

Tibbers becomes enraged when summoned, if Annie stuns an enemy champion, and if Annie dies. When enraged, Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Move Speed decaying over 3 seconds.

Recast: Manually issue orders to Tibbers.

abilities.name: An Acquired Taste
abilities.mechanics_description: An Acquired Taste is a passive enhancement that automatically applies to Tahm Kench's auto-attacks and abilities. Each successful hit on an enemy champion grants a stack of "An Acquired Taste". At three stacks, this passive enables Tahm Kench's Q (Tongue Lash) and W (Devour) abilities to be used on enemy champions, with Devour in particular consuming the target for a short duration.
abilities.original_description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of <spellName>An Acquired Taste</spellName>. At three stacks, he can use <spellName>Devour</spellName> on an enemy champion.

abilities.name: Tongue Lash
abilities.mechanics_description: Tongue Lash is a **linear skillshot** that damages, slows, and applies a stack of "An Acquired Taste" to the first enemy hit. Hitting an enemy champion also heals Tahm Kench, and hitting a champion with 3 stacks of "An Acquired Taste" stuns them, consuming the stacks.
abilities.original_description:
Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion.

Applies a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed. Deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit and Slows them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

On champion hit, heals Tahm for {{ baseheal }} +{{ percenthealthhealing*100 }}% of his missing Health and applies a stack of An Acquired Taste dealing {{ spell.tahmkenchpassive:totaldamage }} extra magic damage. If that champion already had 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they will also be Stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds, consuming the stacks.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour enemy champions who already have 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste from a distance when you hit them.

abilities.name: Abyssal Dive
abilities.mechanics_description: Abyssal Dive is a targeted **skillshot** that Tahm Kench uses to **go untargetable** and then **dash** to a target location. Upon reappearing, he deals **magic damage** and **knocks up** all enemies in a small area around him. It can be used **offensively** for engage and crowd control, or **defensively** to escape by diving away from enemies. If Abyssal Dive hits at least one enemy champion, its cooldown and mana cost are significantly refunded, encouraging aggressive use and potential follow-up. Allies currently being devoured by Tahm Kench are brought along for the dive.
abilities.original_description:
Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area. Dive down and then re-appear at target location, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Knock Up all enemies in an area for {{ knockupduration }} second. Hitting at least one enemy champion refunds {{ champrefund*100 }}% of the Cooldown and Mana cost.

Devoured allies can be taken along for the ride (but can always hop out early).

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.mechanics_description: Tahm Kench's ultimate, Devour, is a point-and-click ability that allows him to engulf a champion. If targeting an enemy with 3 stacks of his passive, he deals damage and becomes slowed while they are devoured. If targeting an ally, he grants them a shield and increased movement speed, with both Tahm Kench and his passenger becoming Grounded but the target able to exit early.
abilities.original_description:
Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally. Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds. He can Recast to spit them out.

Enemy Champions: Require 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste. Are devoured for up to {{ enemyduration }} seconds and take {{ basedamage }} (+{{ percenthpdamage }} of their Max Health) magic damage. Tahm Kench is Slowed by {{ slowamount*100 }}% and Grounded during this effect.

Ally Champions: Are devoured for up to {{ allyduration }} seconds and are granted {{ totalshield }} Shield which decays gradually after being spit out. Allies can also choose to exit early. Tahm Kench is Grounded during this effect, but can cast Abyssal Dive and gains {{ allyspeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ allyduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Thick Skin (Passive/Active E):**

*   **Mechanics:** This is a **passive with an active component** that is **auto-targeting**. The passive stores a percentage of damage Tahm Kench takes, which regenerates as health when out of combat. The active component instantly converts all stored damage into a temporary shield.
*   **Usage:** Tahm Kench uses Thick Skin defensively to mitigate incoming damage through a shield and sustain through its out-of-combat healing. The passive's effectiveness increases significantly when surrounded by multiple enemy champions.
abilities.original_description:
Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat.

Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield. Passive: {{ greyhealthratio*100 }}% of damage Tahm Kench takes is stored by his Thick Skin, increased to {{ greyhealthratioenhanced*100 }}% if there are at least {{ enhancedthreshold }} nearby enemy champions. If Kench has not taken damage within {{ ooctimer }} seconds, Thick Skin will rapidly be consumed to heal Tahm for {{ greyhealthhealingratio }} of its value.

Active: Convert all your stored Thick Skin into a Shield, lasting {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Transcendent
abilities.mechanics_description: Transcendent is a passive ability that allows Syndra to rank up her basic abilities at levels 6, 11, and 16, granting them enhanced effects with increased damage, crowd control, or utility. Its usage is tied directly to the activation of her other abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities.

Dark Sphere: Syndra can hold an additional charge
Force of Will: Bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Increased width and slows all targets
Unleashed Power: Executes low health targets

abilities.name: Dark Sphere
abilities.mechanics_description: **Dark Sphere (Q)** is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit. The **Dark Sphere** lingers for a duration, becoming a throwable object that Syndra's other abilities can interact with for added effects and damage.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers. Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. The Dark Sphere remains for {{ sphereduration }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other Abilities.

{{ spell.syndrapassive:q1upgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: Syndra can store {{ upgrade1maxammo }} charges of Dark Sphere.

abilities.name: Scatter the Weak
abilities.mechanics_description: Scatter the Weak is a linear skillshot that knocks back enemies and any Dark Spheres it hits. Enemies struck by the knockback and by a knocked-back Dark Sphere are stunned and take magic damage, offering Syndra both offensive crowd control and burst damage potential.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned. Syndra projects a wave of force, Knocking Back enemies and Dark Spheres and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Dark Spheres that are pushed Stun enemies for {{ stunduration }} seconds and deal {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

{{ spell.syndrapassive:eupgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: This Ability's width is increased and Slows enemies by {{ upgradedslowamount*100 }}% for {{ upgradedslowduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.mechanics_description: **Force of Will (W):** This is a targeted ability where Syndra can pick up a Dark Sphere, minion, or non-epic monster. She can then recast the ability within 5 seconds to hurl the picked-up object, dealing magic damage and applying a decaying slow to enemies hit. This ability is primarily used offensively for poke, wave clear, and applying crowd control, but the slow can also be used defensively to create distance.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies. Syndra grabs a Dark Sphere, enemy minion, or non-epic monster. She drags it with her and can Recast for up to 5 seconds.

Recast: Syndra hurls the object, dealing {{ throwdamage }} magic damage and Slowing by {{ totalslowamount }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

{{ spell.syndrapassive:wupgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: This Ability deals an additional {{ tooltiponlypassivebonuspercent }} true damage.

abilities.name: Unleashed Power
abilities.mechanics_description: **Unleashed Power (R):** This is a point-and-click targeted ability that launches Syndra's existing Dark Spheres (3 base + up to 4 additional from her Q) at a single enemy champion. It is primarily used offensively for high burst damage and can execute targets below a certain health threshold at higher ranks.
abilities.original_description:
Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres. Passive: Dark Sphere gains an additional {{ qhasteperrank }} Ability Haste for each rank of Unleashed Power.

Syndra draws on her full cataclysmic power, launching the 3 Dark Spheres orbiting her plus up to 4 more nearby at an enemy champion. Each Dark Sphere deals {{ damagecalc }} magic damage (max {{ maxdamagecalc }} magic damage).

{{ spell.syndrapassive:rupgradethreshold }} Splinters of Wrath: This Ability executes enemies below {{ upgradeexecutethreshold*100 }}% Health.

abilities.name: Iron Ambassador
abilities.mechanics_description: **Iron Ambassador (Passive):** Poppy's next basic attack is a ranged skillshot that, upon hitting an enemy, will bounce to a secondary target. If Poppy picks up her buckler after it bounces or lands, she gains a temporary shield. This passive's primary use is defensive, providing a shield, but the ranged attack can also be used offensively to harass or secure last hits from a safe distance.
abilities.original_description: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.

abilities.name: Hammer Shock
abilities.mechanics_description: **Hammer Shock (Q)** is a linear skillshot where Poppy slams her hammer down, dealing immediate physical damage. After a short delay, the impacted area **explodes**, dealing a second instance of physical damage and applying a **slow** to any enemies caught within. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and to set up plays with its crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay. Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ healthdamagepercent }}% max Health physical damage and making the ground unstable.

The unstable area Slows enemies by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ healthdamagepercent }}% max Health physical damage again.

abilities.name: Heroic Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Heroic Charge is a **linear skillshot dash** that allows Poppy to charge forward, carrying the first enemy champion hit with her. This ability is primarily used **offensively for crowd control and burst damage**, as tackling an enemy into terrain will stun them for a significant duration and deal bonus damage.
abilities.original_description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned. Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ tackledamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and carrying them forward. If Poppy tackles them into terrain, the enemy is <status>Stunned</status> for {{ e3 }} seconds and take an additional <physicalDamage>{{ tackledamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>.

abilities.name: Steadfast Presence
abilities.mechanics_description:
Poppy activates her "Steadfast Presence" by **pressing W**. This ability is a **point-and-click (or rather, an area-of-effect around Poppy)**.

Upon activation, Poppy gains increased movement speed and projects a magical field around her for a short duration. This field **nullifies any enemy champion dashes** that attempt to pass through it, causing them to take magic damage, be **slowed**, and become **grounded** (preventing them from using movement abilities). Poppy's passive also grants her flat bonus Armor and Magic Resist, which is doubled when she is below a certain health threshold.
abilities.original_description:
Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded. Passive: Poppy gains {{ bonusarmor }} Armor and {{ bonusmr }} Magic Resist. This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below {{ passiveempoweredhealthpercent*100 }}% Health.

Active: Poppy gains {{ e2 }}% Move Speed and projects a field around her for {{ e1 }} seconds that stops enemy dashes. Enemies who are stopped by the field are Grounded and Slowed by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ groundingduration }} seconds and take {{ interruptdamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Keeper's Verdict
abilities.mechanics_description: Keeper's Verdict is a **charged, linear skillshot** that Poppy uses offensively to deal damage and CC enemies. Upon release, it slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that knocks back the first champion hit and any enemies behind them towards their own Nexus, with knockback distance and damage scaling with charge time. An uncharged hit still deals damage but only knocks up briefly.
abilities.original_description:
Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away. Begin Casting: Poppy begins charging her hammer for up to {{ channelmaxduration }} seconds, Slowing herself by {{ selfslow }}%.

Release: Poppy smashes the ground, creating a shockwave that deals {{ damage }} physical damage to the first champion hit and surrounding enemies, Knocks them Back towards their Nexus, and makes them Untargetable while they fly. The range and Knock Back distance increase with charge duration.

An uncharged swing deals {{ halfdamage }} physical damage and Knocks Up for {{ knockupdurationsnap }} seconds.

abilities.name: Decisive Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: **Decisive Strike (Q)** is a **point-and-click** empowered auto-attack that grants Garen a burst of movement speed and cleanses slows. It is primarily used **offensively** to close gaps, initiate trades with the bonus damage and silence, allowing him to trade effectively without being interrupted.
abilities.original_description:
Garen gains a burst of Move Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them. Garen removes all Slowing effects on him and gains {{ movementspeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movementspeedduration }} second(s).

His next Attack Silences for {{ silenceduration }} seconds and does {{ totaldamage }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Courage
abilities.mechanics_description: Garen's E, **Courage**, is a **toggleable** ability that, when activated, grants him a **shield** and **tenacity** for a short duration, followed by **damage reduction** for a longer period. This ability is primarily **defensive**, allowing him to mitigate burst damage, but its passive component also provides a permanent **stat increase** to his resistances by killing units.
abilities.original_description:
Garen passively increases his Armor and Magic Resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration. Passive: Garen has {{ resistsfortooltip }} bonus Armor and {{ resistsfortooltip }} bonus Magic Resist. Killing units permanently grants {{ resistgainonkilltooltip }} resists, up to a max of {{ resistmax }}.

Active: Garen steels his courage for {{ drduration }} seconds, reducing incoming damage by {{ drpercent*100 }}%. He also gains {{ totalshield }} Shield and {{ upfronttenacity*100 }}% Tenacity for {{ upfrontduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Perseverance
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Perseverance (Passive)**

*   **How to hit/use:** This ability is passive, meaning it's always active and requires no player input besides managing Garen's combat status.
*   **How it is used:** Perseverance is used defensively to enable Garen to sustain through laning phases and skirmishes.

**Mechanics & Usage:** Garen passively regenerates a percentage of his maximum health per second after not taking damage from champions or minions for a short duration, allowing him to out-sustain opponents in lane and return to fights after skirmishes.
abilities.original_description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.mechanics_description: Judgment is an **auto-target spinning attack** where Garen continually deals physical damage to all nearby enemies for a duration. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal sustained damage and shred enemy armor, allowing Garen and his allies to deal more damage to debuffed targets.
abilities.original_description:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Garen rapidly spins his sword for {{ duration }} seconds, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage {{ f1 }} times over the duration. The nearest enemy takes {{ nearestenemybonus*100 }}% increased damage. Champions hit by {{ stackstoshred }} strikes lose {{ shredamount*100 }}% Armor for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

Recast: Garen ends this Ability early.

abilities.name: Demacian Justice
abilities.mechanics_description: **Demacian Justice (R)** is a point-and-click ultimate that deals significant **true damage** to a single enemy champion, executing them if their current health is below a certain threshold based on Garen's missing health. It is primarily an **offensive** ability used to secure kills on low-health targets.
abilities.original_description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion. Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to slay his enemy, dealing <trueDamage>{{ basedamage }} plus {{ executedamage*100 }}% missing Health true damage</trueDamage>.

abilities.name: Determination
abilities.mechanics_description: Xin Zhao's Determination passively empowers his basic attacks: every third consecutive attack against the same target will deal a burst of bonus physical damage and restore a small amount of Xin Zhao's health. This passive synergizes with his auto-attack focused playstyle, providing both increased damage output and sustain in extended trades.
abilities.original_description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

abilities.name: Audacious Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Audacious Charge is a **dash** that Xin Zhao uses to **engage** on an enemy. It deals **magic damage** to all enemies in an area around his target, **slowing** them, and grants Xin Zhao a significant **attack speed buff**.
abilities.original_description:
Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. This Ability gains increased range against Challenged targets. Xin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing {{ chargedamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by {{ baseslowamount }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Xin Zhao also grants himself {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This Ability's range is increased on enemies that are Challenged.

abilities.name: Three Talon Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: **Three Talon Strike (Q)** is a point-and-click ability that enhances Xin Zhao's next three basic attacks. The first two attacks deal bonus physical damage, and the third attack deals amplified bonus physical damage and knocks the target airborne. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and to initiate a crowd control chain with the knock-up.
abilities.original_description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air. Xin Zhao's next 3 Attacks deal an additional {{ bonusdamage }} physical damage and reduces his other Ability's Cooldowns by 1 second. The third Attack also Knocks Up for {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Crescent Guard
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Crescent Guard (R) - Xin Zhao**

Crescent Guard is an **auto-targeting, AoE sweep** around Xin Zhao that damages enemies based on their current health and knocks back any **non-challenged** targets. After the sweep, Xin Zhao becomes immune to damage from champions outside the swept circle, making it a **defensive tool for engagement and self-peeling**.
abilities.original_description:
Xin Zhao passively challenges an enemy he damaged recently. When activated, Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created. Passive: The last champion Xin Zhao damaged with an Attack or Audacious Charge is Challenged for {{ markduration }} seconds.

Active: Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ totaldamage }} plus {{ percentcurrenthealthdamage*100 }}% current Health physical damage and Knocks Back all non-Challenged enemies.

Afterwards, Xin Zhao becomes immune to damage from enemies outside the sweep range for {{ missiledefensebaseduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
abilities.mechanics_description: Wind Becomes Lightning is a **two-part skillshot**. The first part is a **melee cleave** in front of Xin Zhao for damage, followed by a **linear thrust skillshot** that deals damage, slows enemies, and applies a **"Challenged" debuff** to champions and large monsters. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and to initiate a duel by applying the "Challenged" debuff, which empowers Xin Zhao's other abilities.
abilities.original_description:
Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies and marking them as Challenged. Xin Zhao slashes, dealing {{ slashdamage }} physical damage, then thrusts, dealing {{ thrustdamage }}. Enemies hit by the thrust are Slowed by {{ e6 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Champions and Large Monsters hit by the thrust are marked as Challenged for {{ markduration }} seconds and revealed unless Stealthed.

abilities.name: We Are More
abilities.mechanics_description:
**We Are More (Passive): Auto-target and Offensive. **

Naafiri summons Packmates that automatically attack her primary target whenever she hits them with an attack or ability. These Packmates deal bonus damage based on Naafiri's own attack damage, allowing for increased burst and sustained damage.
abilities.original_description: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.mechanics_description: **Eviscerate (E):** Naafiri performs a short dash that deals damage to enemies in a small area around her upon arrival. This ability is used offensively for burst damage and to recall/fully heal her Packmates, which is a core part of her combat loop.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them. Naafiri surges forward, dealing {{ totaldamagefirstslash }} physical damage, then explodes in a flurry of blades, dealing {{ totaldamagesecondslash }} physical damage.

Packmates become Untargetable and are recalled to Naafiri restoring 100% Health.

abilities.name: Darkin Daggers
abilities.mechanics_description: **Darkin Daggers (Q)** is a **two-part skillshot** that Naafiri can use to deal initial physical damage and apply a bleed. If the target is already bleeding, the recast deals bonus damage based on their missing health and heals Naafiri if they are a champion or large monster. The **Packmates** also leap to attack the first champion or monster hit by either cast, making it an offensive tool for damage and sustain.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding.

Packmates leap to attack the first champion or monster hit by this skill.
Naafiri hurls Darkin-tainted blades, dealing {{ spell.naafiriq:totaldamagefirstcast }} physical damage and inflicting a bleed, dealing {{ spell.naafiriq:totalbleeddamage }} physical damage over {{ spell.naafiriq:bleedduration }} seconds.

Naafiri can Recast this Ability. If enemies hit are already bleeding from this Ability, it instead deals the remaining bleed damage plus between {{ spell.naafiriq:totalmindamagesecondcast }} and {{ spell.naafiriq:totalmaxdamagesecondcast }} physical damage, based on their missing Health. If that target was a champion or large monster, Naafiri restores {{ spell.naafiriq:totalhealsecondcast }} Health.

Packmates will leap at the first champion or monster hit and attack them for {{ spell.naafirip:packmatetauntduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Hounds' Pursuit
abilities.mechanics_description: **Hounds' Pursuit (R):** This is a targeted dash ability. Naafiri dashes at an enemy champion, dealing damage and slowing them, with her packmates dashing alongside to add more damage. If Naafiri secures a takedown shortly after casting, she can recast it for a personal shield and reveal nearby enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri and her packmates dash at a champion, dealing damage. Naafiri reveals nearby enemies if she scores a takedown and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants a shield. Naafiri dashes at an enemy champion, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and briefly Slowing them. Packmates become Untargetable and dash alongside Naafiri, dealing {{ packmatedamage }} physical damage per Packmate.

If Naafiri scores a Takedown within {{ takedownwindow }} seconds she reveals nearby enemies and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants {{ shieldtotal }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: The Call of the Pack
abilities.mechanics_description: "The Call of the Pack" is an **auto-target** ability used both **offensively** and for **utility**. Naafiri briefly becomes untargetable, gains bonus Attack Damage and Movement Speed, and spawns additional Packmates. This ability is primarily used to enhance Naafiri's combat prowess and create more offensive pressure with her pack.
abilities.original_description:
Naafiri becomes Untargetable and empowers her pack, spawning additional packmates and gaining increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.
Naafiri becomes Untargetable for {{ untargetableduration }} second and prepares to hunt, spawning {{ packmatestoadd }} additional Packmates and gaining {{ bonusad }} Attack Damage and {{ movespeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ duration }} seconds.

Packmates become Untargetable and are recalled to Naafiri.

abilities.name: Deadly Venom
abilities.mechanics_description: Deadly Venom is an auto-target passive that applies a stacking debuff on enemies hit by Twitch's basic attacks. This debuff deals true damage over time, making it an offensive tool for sustained damage and extending his threat radius through his auto attacks.
abilities.original_description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

abilities.name: Venom Cask
abilities.mechanics_description: Venom Cask is a skillshot ability that Twitch throws in a target direction. It deals damage, applies a stack of Deadly Venom to enemies hit, and creates a lingering poison cloud that slows and applies additional stacks over time.
abilities.original_description:
Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target. Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for {{ duration }} seconds.

Enemies that remain within the cloud are Slowed by {{ totalslowamount }}% and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.

abilities.name: Contaminate
abilities.mechanics_description: **Contaminate (E)** is a targeted, ground-effect ability. It deals increased damage to enemies based on how many stacks of Twitch's passive, Deadly Venom, they have accumulated.
abilities.original_description:
Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases. Deals {{ basedamage }} physical damage to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom, plus an additional {{ physicaldamageperstack }} physical damage and {{ magicdamageperstack }} magical damage per stack of Deadly Venom.

Max Damage: {{ maxphysicaldamage }} physical damage and {{ maxmagicdamage }} magical damage.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ambush (Q)** is a self-cast ability that makes Twitch invisible and grants him bonus movement speed. Upon exiting stealth, he receives a significant attack speed buff, making it ideal for surprise engagements, repositioning, or escaping. If an enemy champion afflicted with Twitch's passive "Deadly Venom" dies, the cooldown of Ambush is fully refreshed, allowing for rapid re-engagement or repeated escapes.
abilities.original_description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset. Twitch Camouflages and gains {{ e3 }}% Move Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. The Move Speed increases to {{ e3 }}% while near an enemy champion that can't see him. After exiting Camouflage, Twitch gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e6 }} seconds.

When an enemy champion dies while afflicted with Venom, this Ability's Cooldown is refreshed.

abilities.name: Spray and Pray
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Spray and Pray (R) - Twitch**

*   **Mechanics:** Skillshot (linear).
*   **Usage:** Offensive (damage, range extension).

When activated, Spray and Pray grants Twitch bonus attack range and causes his auto-attacks to become piercing bolts for a duration. These bolts travel in a straight line, hitting all enemies in their path and dealing reduced damage to subsequent targets. This ability is used offensively to extend Twitch's auto-attack range significantly, allowing him to deal damage to multiple targets or strike from a much safer distance.
abilities.original_description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path. Twitch unleashes his crossbow, gaining {{ bonusrange }} Attack Range and {{ bonusad }} Attack Damage, and causing his Attacks to become piercing bolts for {{ duration }} seconds. These bolts hit all enemies they pass through, but deal {{ falloffdamage*100 }}% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of {{ minimumfalloffdamage*100 }}% damage.

abilities.name: Triumphant Roar
abilities.mechanics_description: Triumphant Roar is a passive ability that automatically triggers a self and nearby ally heal when Alistar accumulates 3 stacks. Stacks are gained by stunning or displacing enemy champions, or when any enemy unit dies within Alistar's vicinity.
abilities.original_description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.mechanics_description: **Alistar's Pulverize (Q)** is a **circular AoE (Area of Effect) spell** that he slams down on the ground around him. It deals magic damage and **Knocks Up** all enemies hit for a short duration, making it a potent tool for **crowd control, engagement, and disruption** in both offensive and defensive situations.
abilities.original_description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air. Alistar smashes the ground, <status>Knocking Up</status> enemies for {{ knockupduration }} second and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.mechanics_description: **Alistar's Trample (E)** is a **toggle aura** that allows him to **pass through units** while it's active, dealing continuous magic damage in a small radius around him. It's primarily used **offensively** to apply pressure and farm, with the main payoff being its passive component: stacking on champions to empower his next basic attack with **bonus magic damage and a stun**.
abilities.original_description:
Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them. Alistar begins trampling the ground, becoming Ghosted and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages a champion grants a stack.

At {{ e5 }} stacks, Alistar's next Attack against champions Stuns for {{ e6 }} second and deals an additional {{ attackbonusdamage }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.mechanics_description: **Unbreakable Will (R)** is a **self-cast** ability that **instantly cleanses all disabling crowd control effects** on Alistar. It then provides a **damage reduction buff** that significantly mitigates incoming physical and magical damage for its duration. Alistar uses this ability defensively to survive burst damage and to disengage from unfavorable engagements by removing stuns, roots, and other disabling effects.
abilities.original_description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration. Alistar immediately cleanses all <status>Disabling</status> effects and takes {{ rdamagereduction }}% reduced damage for {{ rduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Headbutt
abilities.mechanics_description: **Alistar's Headbutt (W)** is a **point-and-click** ability that deals magic damage and **knocks the target back**. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage and set up combos with his Pulverize (Q) by displacing targets into the subsequent area of effect. It can also be used defensively to push away dangerous enemies.
abilities.original_description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back. Alistar rams into an enemy, <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Back</status> and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Drakehound's Step
abilities.mechanics_description: Drakehound's Step is a **per-attack-animation-cancel** that allows Ambessa to **dash a short distance** after casting an ability. This dash enhances her next auto-attack with **bonus range, damage, and attack speed**, and **refunds energy**, making it a core tool for aggressive repositioning and sustained damage output.
abilities.original_description: Entering an attack or movement command while casting an ability will cause Ambessa to dash a short distance once the ability is cast, granting her next attack bonus range, damage, and attack speed, and refunding energy.

abilities.name: Lacerate
abilities.mechanics_description: Lacerate is a **point-and-click** ability that Ambessa uses to deal damage and apply a decaying slow to **nearby enemies** in a circle around her. It's primarily an **offensive** tool for damage and peel, but can also be used to **set up her follow-up dash (Drakehound's Step)** for an empowered second strike.
abilities.original_description: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash. Ambessa whips her chains around, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ calc_damage_flat }} physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies by <status>{{ slow_amount*100 }}%</status>, which decays over {{ slow_duration }} second. Initiating <spellName>Drakehound's Step</spellName> from this Ability will trigger an additional strike.

abilities.name: Cunning Sweep / Sundering Slam
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Cunning Sweep / Sundering Slam (Q):**

1.  **How to hit/use:** Cunning Sweep is a **cone-shaped skillshot** that Ambessa casts in front of herself. If Cunning Sweep hits an enemy, it **empowers her next ability cast** for a short duration into Sundering Slam. Sundering Slam is a **targeted skillshot** that Ambessa uses to slam her blades in a line in front of her.
2.  **How it is used:** This ability is primarily used **offensively** for damage. Cunning Sweep deals damage to all enemies in a cone, with bonus damage at the edge, while Sundering Slam deals significant bonus damage to the first enemy hit and reduced damage to others. Hitting with Cunning Sweep also implies a **debuff** in that it enables the empowered Sundering Slam.
abilities.original_description:
Ambessa sweeps her twin drakehounds in a semicircle in front of her, dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades. Striking an enemy will transform the next cast of this ability for a short period of time, causing her to slam her twin drakehounds down in a line in front of her, dealing bonus damage to the first enemy hit. Cunning Sweep: Ambessa sweeps her blades forward, dealing {{ calc_damage_1_max }} + {{ calc_damage_1_percent_max }} max Health physical damage to enemies at the edge of the strike. All other enemies take {{ calc_damage_1_min_ratio }} damage. Striking an enemy readies a Sundering Slam.

Sundering Slam: Ambessa slams her blades down, dealing {{ calc_damage_2_max }} + {{ calc_damage_2_percent_max }} max Health physical damage against the first enemy hit. All other enemies take {{ calc_damage_2_min_ratio }} damage.

abilities.name: Public Execution
abilities.mechanics_description: **Public Execution (R)** is a linear skillshot that Ambessa uses to blink to the *farthest* enemy champion within the targeted line. Upon arrival, it *suppresses* the target for a duration, then slams them, dealing physical damage and *stunning* them. This ability is primarily an offensive engagement and lockdown tool.
abilities.original_description:
Ambessa blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line of her choosing and suppresses them upon her arrival. She then slams the enemy into the ground where they take damage and are stunned. Passive: Ambessa gains {{ armor_penetration*100 }}% %i:scaleAPen% Armor Penetration and her Abilities heal her for {{ calc_omnivamp }} of the damage she dealt.

Active: Ambessa becomes Unstoppable and blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line, Suppressing the target for {{ suppress_duration }} seconds and then slamming them into the ground, dealing {{ calc_damage }} physical damage and Stunning them for {{ stun_duration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Repudiation
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Repudiation (W):** Ambessa activates a defensive stance, gaining a shield for a short duration. Upon reactivating the ability (or when the duration ends), she slams the ground, dealing AoE physical damage to nearby enemies. This damage is amplified if she took non-minion damage while in her defensive stance.

*   **How to use:** This is a two-part ability usable with a single cast followed by a reactivation or automatic activation. The first part is instantaneous, granting a shield and entering a "bracing" state. The second part is an AoE ground slam around Ambessa.
*   **How it is used:** Repudiation is a **dual-purpose** ability. The initial shield provides **defensive** utility, while the ground slam deals **offensive** AoE damage. Its effectiveness is significantly increased when used to **mitigate damage** (defensively) before unleashing a powerful attack (offensively).
abilities.original_description: Ambessa gains a shield, briefly braces herself, and then slams the ground to damage nearby enemies. If she blocked any non-minion damage while bracing herself, this ability will deal increased damage. Ambessa gains <shield>{{ calc_shield }} Shield</shield> for {{ shield_duration }} seconds and braces herself for {{ buff_duration }} seconds. She then slams the ground, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ calc_damage_low }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to nearby enemies, which increases to <physicalDamage>{{ calc_damage_high }} physical damage</physicalDamage> if she braced herself from damage from an enemy champion, large monster, or structure.

abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.mechanics_description: Anivia's passive, **Rebirth**, is an auto-targeting, reactive ability. Upon being killed, Anivia transforms into an egg and resets her health to full, allowing her to potentially revive if she survives for a short duration. This ability is primarily defensive, acting as a second life to reposition or escape danger.
abilities.original_description: Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health.

abilities.name: Crystallize
abilities.mechanics_description: Anivia's Crystallize is a **linear skillshot** that creates an impassable wall of ice. It is primarily used for **utility** to block enemy movement and create zoning or escape opportunities, though it can also deal minor damage if enemies are struck as it forms.
abilities.original_description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts. Anivia summons a wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

abilities.name: Flash Frost
abilities.mechanics_description: Flash Frost is a linear skillshot that travels in a straight line, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit. It can be detonated early by recasting, at which point it explodes in a radius, dealing additional magic damage and stunning all enemies within the area.
abilities.original_description:
Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area. Anivia fires a massive chunk of ice, dealing {{ totalpassthroughdamage }} magic damage and Chilling enemies for {{ slowduration }} seconds, Slowing them by {{ spell.glacialstorm:slowamount }}%. At the end of its range, the ice detonates, Stunning enemies for {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing {{ totalexplosiondamage }} magic damage.

Anivia can Recast this ability while the ice flies to detonate it early.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Frostbite (E) - Anivia**

Anivia's Frostbite is a **linear skillshot** used primarily for **offensive damage and burst**. It deals bonus damage if the target is already under the effect of "Chilled" from her Q (Flash Frost) or R (Glacial Storm), making it a key part of her combo for maximizing damage output.
abilities.original_description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing damage. If the target was recently hit by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled. Anivia blasts an enemy with a freezing wind, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Against <keywordMajor>Chilled</keywordMajor> enemies, Anivia deals <magicDamage>{{ empowereddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> instead.

abilities.name: Glacial Storm
abilities.mechanics_description: Glacial Storm is a **toggle-cast circular area of effect (AoE) skillshot** that deals damage and slows enemies within its radius. It is primarily used **offensively** to zone enemies, deal sustained damage, and set up combos with other abilities due to its crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance. Toggle: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail that Slows enemies by {{ slowamount }}% and deals {{ totaldamagepersecond }} magic damage per second. The storm increases in size over {{ growthtime }} seconds.

When the storm is fully formed, it Chills, Slows by {{ slowpercentempoweredtt }}%, and does {{ empowereddamagepersecondtooltiponly }} magic damage per second instead.

abilities.name: Decimating Smash
abilities.mechanics_description: **Decimating Smash (Q)** is a **linear skillshot** charged by Sion. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and apply crowd control (knock-up and stun) to enemies in a line in front of him, with longer charge times increasing both damage and CC duration.
abilities.original_description:
Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned. Begin Charging: Sion charges a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds.

Release: Sion slams his axe down, briefly Slowing and dealing between {{ mindamagetotal }} and {{ maxdamagetotal }} physical damage based on charge time. If Sion charged for at least 1 second, enemies are Knocked Up and Stunned for between {{ basestuntime }} and 2.25 seconds based on charge time.

abilities.name: Soul Furnace
abilities.mechanics_description: **Soul Furnace (W)** is a **self-cast shield** that can be **reactivated after a delay** to deal **magic damage and bonus damage based on Sion's maximum health** in an area around him. It's used both offensively for burst damage and defensively to survive, while its passive grants Sion permanent health for killing units.
abilities.original_description:
Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health. Passive: Sion gains {{ hpperkill }} max Health when he kills a unit, or {{ hpperchampkill }} for champion takedowns, large minions and large monsters.

Active: Sion gains {{ totalshield }} Shield for 6 seconds. After {{ e7 }} seconds if the shield still holds, Sion can Recast to detonate the shield to deal {{ totaldamage }} plus {{ e4 }}% max Health magic damage.

abilities.name: Glory in Death
abilities.mechanics_description: Glory in Death is a passive ability that activates upon Sion's death. Once activated, Sion reanimates for a short duration with decaying health, gaining significantly increased attack speed and lifesteal on his attacks, which also deal bonus damage based on the target's max Health. This allows for a final offensive push or potential to secure kills before he fully dies.
abilities.original_description: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.

abilities.name: Roar of the Slayer
abilities.mechanics_description: "Roar of the Slayer" is a **linear skillshot** that damages, slows, and shreds the Armor of the first enemy hit. If it hits a non-champion unit, they are knocked back, and subsequent enemies hit by the knocked-back unit will also take damage, be slowed, and have their Armor reduced. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage, apply crowd control, and reduce enemy resistances before engaging or during a fight.
abilities.original_description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through. Sion fires a shockwave, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ slowamount }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds and removing <scaleArmor>{{ armorshred }}% Armor</scaleArmor> for {{ armorshredduration }} seconds. Non-champions hit are <status>Knocked Back</status>. Enemies hit by a <status>Knocked Back</status> unit take the same damage and effects.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
abilities.mechanics_description: **Unstoppable Onslaught (R)** is a **linear skillshot** that Sion uses offensively to initiate fights and deal damage. Upon activation, Sion begins charging in a chosen direction, gaining speed over time and allowing slight steering. He travels until he hits an enemy champion, a wall, or is recasted, applying physical damage, a crowd control effect (knock-up, stun, or slow) scaled by distance traveled, and then stops, making it a high-impact engage tool.
abilities.original_description:
Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged. Sion charges Unstoppably in a direction for 8 seconds, turning towards the mouse cursor. Sion stops on colliding with an enemy champion or wall or on Recasting this Ability.

At the end of the charge, Sion deals between {{ mindamagetotal }} and {{ maxdamagetotal }} physical damage based on distance travelled. Enemies close to Sion are Stunned for between {{ minstunduration }} and {{ maxstunduration }} seconds based on distance travelled. Enemies in a larger area are Slowed by {{ slowamount }}% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Stage Presence
abilities.mechanics_description: Stage Presence is a passive ability that causes Seraphine's **basic spells to echo and cast a second time** automatically whenever she casts her third basic spell. Additionally, casting spells while **near allied champions** empowers her next basic attack with bonus magic damage and increased range.
abilities.original_description: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

abilities.name: Surround Sound
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Usage:** Circular AoE cast, self-cast ultimate utility.

**Description:** Seraphine casts a circular shield on herself and nearby allies, granting movement speed. If she is already shielded, she instead heals allies for a percentage of their missing health after a delay.
abilities.original_description:
Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well. Seraphine spurs her nearby allied champions in song, granting them {{ hastevalueallies }} Move Speed, herself {{ wmsbonustotal }} decaying Move Speed and both {{ shieldvalueseraphine }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

If Seraphine is already Shielded, she calls out to her allies to join her, restoring {{ wmissinghpheal }}% missing Health to them after a {{ whealsplitdelay }} second delay.

abilities.name: High Note
abilities.mechanics_description:
Here's a breakdown of Seraphine's Q, "High Note":

**Mechanics:**
High Note is a **linear skillshot** that Seraphine projects in a target direction.

**Usage:**
It is primarily used **offensively** to deal magic damage. The damage is **increased against champions and monsters, especially when they are at lower health**, making it a strong finishing tool.

**Concise Description:**
Seraphine fires a linear skillshot that deals magic damage, dealing significantly more damage to low-health champions and monsters. This ability is used offensively to poke and finish off targets.
abilities.original_description: Seraphine deals damage in an area. Seraphine projects a pure note, dealing <magicDamage>{{ explosiondamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, increased against champions and monsters by the target's missing Health percentage up to <magicDamage>{{ totalempowereddamage }} damage</magicDamage> below {{ executethreshold*100 }}% Health.

abilities.name: Beat Drop
abilities.mechanics_description: Beat Drop is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage and applies a slow to enemies hit. Enemies already slowed by any source are instead rooted, and those already immobilized are stunned. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and crowd control, with the ability to escalate into a powerful root or stun on already affected targets.
abilities.original_description:
Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line. Seraphine unleashes a heavy soundwave, dealing {{ finaldamage }} magic damage to enemies in a line and Slowing them by {{ slowvalue }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Enemies that are already Slowed are Rooted instead, and Immobilized enemies are Stunned.

abilities.name: Encore
abilities.mechanics_description: **Encore (R)** is a linear skillshot that deals magic damage and charms enemies hit. The range of the skillshot extends with every champion (ally or enemy) it hits, granting allies a movement speed buff.
