He can **recast** it to detonate the cask early, dealing **magic damage** and applying a **slow** to enemies hit, with both effects scaling based on how long the cask is alive before exploding. It's primarily used for **offensive damage and area control**.
abilities.original_description:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. The potency of the explosion increases over time. Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed. Gragas rolls a cask that explodes after {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing between {{ mindamage }} magic damage and {{ maxdamage }} magic damage and Slowing for between {{ e2 }} and {{ effect2amount*1.5 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. The damage and Slow increase with time the cask spent before exploding.

Gragas can Recast to detonate the cask early.

abilities.name: Explosive Cask
abilities.mechanics_description: **Explosive Cask (R)** is a circular skillshot that Gragas hurls towards a target location. Upon impact, it deals area-of-effect magic damage and knockbacks all enemies caught in the blast radius away from the center. This ability is primarily used offensively for burst damage and crowd control, but can also be used defensively to create space or disrupt enemy engages by knocking them away.
abilities.original_description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius. Gragas hurls his cask, dealing <magicDamage>{{ damagedone }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Knocking Away</status> enemies from the impact zone.

abilities.name: Body Slam
abilities.mechanics_description: **Gragas's Body Slam (E)** is a **linear skillshot dash** that deals magic damage to all enemies hit and knocks them up for a short duration. It's primarily used **offensively for damage and crowd control**, with its cooldown being significantly reduced if Gragas hits an enemy champion, encouraging aggressive engagement.
abilities.original_description:
Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them. Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy, Knocking Up nearby enemies for {{ stunduration }} second and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to them.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by {{ cooldownrefund*100 }}% if Gragas collides with an enemy.

abilities.name: Guerrilla Warfare
abilities.mechanics_description: **Guerrilla Warfare (Passive):** Teemo becomes Invisible after standing still for a short duration or when inside brush. Upon breaking Stealth, he gains a significant Attack Speed buff for a few seconds, ideal for aggressive engagements.
abilities.original_description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

abilities.name: Move Quick
abilities.mechanics_description: **Move Quick (W)** is a **toggle-like ability** that provides passive movement speed. Teemo gains bonus movement speed while he hasn't taken damage from enemy champions or turrets recently. Activating it consumes the cooldown but grants a burst of significantly higher movement speed that is **not interrupted by taking damage** for a short duration, making it a powerful tool for engaging, disengaging, or repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time. Passive: Teemo gains {{ passivemovespeedbonus*100 }}% Move Speed while he hasn't been damaged by a champion or turret in the last {{ passivecooldownondamagetaken }} seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining {{ activemovespeedbonus*100 }}% Move Speed that is not lost when struck for {{ activemovespeedbuffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Dart
abilities.mechanics_description: Blinding Dart (Q) is a **point-and-click skillshot** that Teemo uses **offensively** to deal magic damage and apply a **blind debuff**. This blind prevents the target from performing auto-attacks, making it a powerful tool for trading in lane or disrupting enemy carries.
abilities.original_description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration. Teemo fires a dart, <status>Blinding</status> the target for {{ blindduration }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ calculateddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Toxic Shot
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Toxic Shot (Passive):** This is an **auto-target** ability that is applied automatically to Teemo's basic attacks. It is used **offensively** to add damage over time to his auto attacks, and applies a **debuff** (poison) to the target.

In essence, Teemo's auto attacks apply a poison DoT (damage over time) that deals initial damage on impact and continues to tick for 4 seconds.
abilities.original_description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds. <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Teemo's Attacks apply poison, dealing an additional <magicDamage>{{ impactcalculateddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>{{ totaldotdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> over {{ poisonduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Noxious Trap
abilities.mechanics_description: Noxious Trap is a deployable, stealthy skillshot that allows Teemo to throw toxic mushroom traps with charges that refresh over time. When an enemy steps on a mushroom, it detonates, applying a short-duration slow and damage-over-time effect, revealing the target.
abilities.original_description:
Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range. Teemo tosses a mushroom trap that detonates when stepped on. The traps Slow by {{ slowamount }}% and deal {{ totaldamage }} magic damage over {{ debuffduration }} seconds. Enemies are revealed for the same duration.

Traps last {{ mushroomduration }} minutes and are stealthed. A mushroom tossed onto another mushroom bounces before landing at its position. This Ability has {{ maxammo }} charges ({{ ammorechargetime }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Ice Shard
abilities.mechanics_description: **Ice Shard (Q)** is a **linear skillshot** that damages and slows enemies in a straight line. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal damage and apply crowd control, allowing Lissandra to poke enemies from a distance and set up for further engagements.
abilities.original_description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Move Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit. Lissandra throws a spear of ice that shatters on the first enemy hit, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, and also damaging and slowing the enemies behind them.

abilities.name: Iceborn Subjugation
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Iceborn Subjugation (Passive):** When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra, they are converted into a Frozen Thrall. These thralls apply a slowing effect to nearby enemies and then explode after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area.

This passive is primarily used for area-of-effect crowd control and damage following enemy champion deaths, creating zones of control and follow-up burst potential.
abilities.original_description: When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra they become a Frozen Thrall. Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies and then, after a delay, shatter from the intense cold, dealing magic damage to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.mechanics_description: Ring of Frost is a **skillshot** that Lissandra casts on a target location. Enemies hit by the circular area of effect are dealt magic damage and **rooted** in place. This ability is primarily used for **crowd control (CC)** to set up damage or escape, but also provides **offensive damage**.
abilities.original_description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them. Lissandra creates an ice field, <status>Rooting</status> nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Glacial Path
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics:** Glacial Path is a **skillshot** that travels in a straight line.
**Usage:** It is primarily used for **mobility (offensive and defensive)** and **crowd control (slow)**, allowing Lissandra to engage or disengage by teleporting to the claw's location and slowing enemies hit by its initial cast.
abilities.original_description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location. Lissandra casts forth an ice claw that deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. Lissandra can <recast>Recast</recast> while the claw travels to teleport to its location.

abilities.name: Frozen Tomb
abilities.mechanics_description: **Frozen Tomb (R)** is a self-cast or targeted ability. When cast on Lissandra, she becomes untargetable for a duration, heals herself (scaling with missing health), and then emits a slowing AoE. When cast on an enemy champion, they are stunned for its duration and are the center of the same slowing AoE, dealing magic damage to enemies. It's a versatile tool for both aggressive engage/follow-up and crucial defensive survival.
abilities.original_description:
If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Move Speed. Lissandra encases herself or an enemy champion in ice. Enemies are Stunned for {{ enemycastduration }} seconds. When self cast, Lissandra enters Stasis for {{ selfcastduration }} seconds and restores {{ healamount }} Health, increased by {{ selfcastmissinghpratio }}% for each {{ selfcastmissinghpperabove }}% missing Health.

In either case, dark ice eminates from the target, dealing {{ calculateddamage }} magic damage. The ice persists for {{ slowduration }} seconds, Slowing enemies by {{ slowamount*-100 }}%.

abilities.name: Nimble Fighter
abilities.mechanics_description: Nimble Fighter is a passive ability that allows Fizz to move through enemy units unhindered, and it also grants him a flat damage reduction from all sources. This passive is constantly active and doesn't require any input from the player, providing both offensive mobility for engaging or repositioning and defensive utility by reducing incoming damage.
abilities.original_description: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources

abilities.name: Urchin Strike
abilities.mechanics_description: Urchin Strike is a **point-and-click dash** that allows Fizz to **automatically** move through his target while dealing both physical and magic damage. It is primarily used **offensively** for **damage and closing the gap** on enemies.
abilities.original_description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects. Fizz dashes through an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> plus <magicDamage>{{ qdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Seastone Trident
abilities.mechanics_description: Seastone Trident is a **point-and-click auto-attack modifier**. It applies a damage-over-time bleed on all passive attacks and, when activated, empowers Fizz's next auto-attack for bonus damage, with potential mana refunds and cooldown reduction on kill, or a sustained bonus damage buff on non-kills.
abilities.original_description:
Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time. Passive: Fizz's Attacks cause his enemies to bleed, dealing {{ dotdamage }} magic damage over {{ bleedduration }} seconds.

Active: Fizz's next Attack deals an additional {{ activedamage }} magic damage. If this Attack kills its target, Fizz refunds {{ onkillmanarefund }} Mana and reduces the cooldown of this Ability to {{ onkillnewcooldown }} second. If it does not kill, Fizz's Attacks deal an additional {{ onhitbuffdamage }} magic damage for {{ onhitbuffduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Playful / Trickster
abilities.mechanics_description: **Playful / Trickster (E):** This is a dash-based ability with a point-and-click activation that makes Fizz untargetable. It can be recast while untargetable to dash again, dealing damage and slowing enemies in an area on the initial landing, or in a smaller area on the second dash.
abilities.original_description:
Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down. Fizz hops onto his trident, becoming Untargetable for 0.75 seconds, after which he deals {{ edamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies and Slows them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Fizz can Recast this Ability while Untargetable to dash again, which ends the effect early, deals damage in a smaller area, and doesn't Slow.

abilities.name: Chum the Waters
abilities.mechanics_description: **Fizz's Chum the Waters (R)** is a **skillshot** that Fizz throws in a targeted direction. Upon hitting an enemy champion, it attaches, slowing them. After a delay, a shark erupts, knocking up the target, knocking back nearby enemies, and dealing magic damage to all hit. This ability is primarily used offensively for **damage, crowd control (knock-up/knock-back), and engaging** fights.
abilities.original_description:
Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed. Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first champion hit. The victim is afflicted with True Sight and Slowed by between 40% to 80% based on how far the fish travelled before attaching.

After {{ detonationtime }} seconds a shark erupts on the target, Knocking Up the target with the fish for 1 second, Knocking Back everything else, and dealing between {{ smallsharkdamage }} to {{ bigsharkdamage }} magic damage based on how far the fish travelled before attaching.

abilities.name: Soul Siphon
abilities.mechanics_description: Soul Siphon is a passive ability used for **sustain and extended combat**. Whenever Morgana damages an enemy champion, large minion, or medium/larger jungle monster with any of her abilities or auto-attacks, she **heals herself for a portion of the damage dealt**. This effect is a vital part of her kit, allowing her to trade favorably and survive through prolonged fights.
abilities.original_description: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.

abilities.name: Dark Binding
abilities.mechanics_description: **Dark Binding (Q)** is a linear skillshot Morgana hurls forward. Upon hitting the first enemy, it deals magic damage and applies a root, immobilizing the target for its duration. This ability is primarily used offensively for damage and crowd control, often to set up further damage or engage fights.
abilities.original_description: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.  Morgana hurls a blast of starfire that <status>Roots</status> the first enemy hit for {{ rootduration }} seconds and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Soul Shackles
abilities.mechanics_description: Soul Shackles is a **circular skillshot** that Morgana targets around herself. It is primarily used **offensively** for crowd control and damage, as it deals initial damage and a slow, with the potential to stun enemies who remain within its radius for its duration.
abilities.original_description:
Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them. Morgana chains herself to nearby enemy Champions, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and Slowing them by {{ slowpercent }}%. After {{ chainduration }} seconds, enemies unable to break the chains take an additional {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and are Stunned for {{ stunduration }} seconds.

While casting this Ability, Morgana gains {{ hastepercent }}% Move Speed.

abilities.name: Black Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: **Black Shield (E)** is a point-and-click targeted spell that applies a magical shield to an allied champion. This shield absorbs incoming magic damage and, crucially, prevents Morgana or her target from being affected by crowd control (CC) effects like stuns, roots, or silences for its duration. It is primarily used defensively to protect allies from burst damage or critical CC.
abilities.original_description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken. Morgana grants an ally champion <shield>{{ totalshieldstrength }} Magic Shield</shield> for {{ shieldduration }} seconds. The shield prevents <status>Disabling</status> and <status>Immobilizing</status> effects until it breaks.

abilities.name: Tormented Shadow
abilities.mechanics_description:
**1. How to Hit/Use:** Tormented Shadow is a **skillshot** where Morgana targets a circular area on the ground. The ability has a short cast time.

**2. How it is Used:** Tormented Shadow is used **offensively** for damage over time and **utility** as it applies a powerful **debuff** in the form of decaying, increasing damage for low-health targets. It can also be used **defensively** to zone enemies away.

**Concise Description:** Morgana casts a circular AoE skillshot that deals increasing magic damage over time to enemies within the area. This damage is significantly amplified on targets with lower health, making it a potent zoning and finishing tool.
abilities.original_description:
Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are. Morgana ignites the ground for {{ wduration }} seconds, dealing {{ totalmindamage }} magic damage per second, increased by up to {{ totalmaxdamage }} based on the targets' missing Health.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by {{ cdrefundpercent*100 }}% every time Morgana is healed by Soul Siphon.

abilities.name: Demon Shade
abilities.mechanics_description: Demon Shade is a **passive ability** that automatically activates when Evelynn is out of combat. It grants her **self-healing** when she is below a certain health threshold and, importantly at level 6 and above, grants **Camouflage**, effectively turning her invisible to enemies unless they are very close or have true sight. This allows for stealthy approaches, ambushes, and safe repositioning.
abilities.original_description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

abilities.name: Hate Spike
abilities.mechanics_description: Hate Spike is a **linear skillshot** that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and empowers Evelynn's next few attacks/abilities against them. It can be **recast up to 3 times**, firing a line of spikes that damage all enemies hit, making it a potent **offensive tool** for both single-target damage and area-of-effect poke.
abilities.original_description:
Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes a few times. Evelynn strikes with her Lasher, dealing {{ missiledamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 Attacks or Abilities on that unit to deal an additional {{ totalbonusdamage }} magic damage. Evelynn can Recast this Ability up to {{ qstackcount }} times.

Recast: Evelynn fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing {{ missiledamage }} magic damage to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Whiplash
abilities.mechanics_description: Evelynn's Whiplash is a **point-and-click** ability that deals magic damage based on the target's max health and grants her a brief burst of movement speed. When empowered by Demon Shade, she **dashes** to the target and damages enemies in her path, making it a versatile tool for engaging, chasing, or repositioning.
abilities.original_description:
Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration. Evelynn whips an enemy, dealing {{ basedamage }} plus {{ percenthealthbasetooltip }} max Health magic damage. Evelynn gains {{ speedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ speedduration }} seconds.

Entering Demon Shade refreshes this Ability's cooldown and empowers it. When this Ability is empowered, Evelynn dashes to the target and deals {{ empowereddamage }} plus {{ percenthealthempoweredtooltip }} max Health magic damage to her target and everyone she passes through instead.

abilities.name: Last Caress
abilities.mechanics_description: Last Caress (R) is a **skillshot** that Evelynn uses **offensively** to deal high magic damage in a cone in front of her. It also **teleports her backwards**, allowing for repositioning after engaging or escaping danger. The damage is increased against low-health enemies, making it a potent execution.
abilities.original_description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance. Evelynn unleashes her demonic energy, dealing heavy damage, becoming Untargetable and teleporting backwards. She deals <magicDamage>{{ damage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, increased to <magicDamage>{{ critdamage }}</magicDamage> against enemies below <healing>30% Health</healing>. Upon cast, set Demon Shade to a 1.25 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Allure
abilities.mechanics_description: **Allure (W)** is a targeted ability that Evelynn uses to apply a debuff to a single enemy champion or monster. After the initial cast, Evelynn must land an attack or another ability on the marked target within a short window. If successful, the mark is consumed, refunding its cooldown and slowing the target. If the mark has persisted for at least 2.5 seconds before being consumed, it will additionally Charm the target and shred their Magic Resist (for champions) or deal bonus magic damage (for monsters). Allure is primarily used offensively to set up guaranteed Charm crowd control and enable further damage combos.
abilities.original_description:
Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist. Evelynn marks a champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with an Attack or Ability, she will expunge the mark, refund its cost, and Slow the target by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If the mark lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it has extra effects:
  • Against champions: Charms them for {{ charmduration }} second(s) and removes {{ mrshred*100 }}% Magic Resist for {{ shredduration }} seconds.
  • Against monsters: Charms them for {{ monstercharm }} seconds and deals {{ monsterdamagetotaltooltip }} magic damage.

abilities.name: Phase
abilities.mechanics_description: Phase (W) is an **instantaneous weapon swap** for Aphelios. It is used primarily for **utility and offensive setup**, allowing him to cycle through his weapons and utilize their unique basic attacks and activated abilities in combination.
abilities.original_description: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability. Swap main-hand and off-hand weapons, equipping Gravitum.

abilities.name: The Hitman and the Seer
abilities.mechanics_description: Aphelios cycles through five unique weapons, each with a distinct auto-attack and activated ability. He gains the next weapon in sequence when his current off-hand weapon runs out of ammo, dynamically altering his offensive and utility toolkit.
abilities.original_description: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.

abilities.name: Weapon Queue System
abilities.mechanics_description: The "Weapon Queue System" is not an active ability Aphelios uses. Instead, it's a passive system that dictates the order in which Aphelios receives his five weapons from Alune. When Aphelios expends all ammunition from his current weapon, it's placed at the end of his predetermined weapon queue, and he automatically switches to the next weapon in line. This system is Aphelios's core mechanic, influencing his damage output, combat patterns, and offensive/defensive potential based on the weapon he currently wields.
abilities.original_description: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.

abilities.name: Moonlight Vigil
abilities.mechanics_description: Moonlight Vigil is a **linear skillshot** that, upon hitting an enemy champion, explodes to deal AoE physical damage and then triggers your main-hand weapon's **unique effect** on all champions hit. This ability is primarily used **offensively** for burst damage and to apply bonus effects based on Aphelios' current main-hand weapon.
abilities.original_description:
Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun. Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes when it hits a champion, dealing {{ maxdamage }} physical damage to surrounding enemies.

Then, Aphelios attacks all champions hit with his main-hand weapon. {{ Spell_ApheliosR_WeaponMod_{{ f1 }} }}

abilities.name: Weapon Abilites
abilities.mechanics_description: Aphelios's Q abilities are **skillshots** that primarily deal **offensive damage**, with some offering **utility**. Calibrum fires a linear skillshot that marks enemies for a subsequent long-range shot, Severum grants a temporary movement speed buff and allows it to attack nearby enemies along with his main-hand weapon, Gravitum fires a slow that detonates into a root if enemies are afflicted by it, Infernum releases a cone of damage that also strikes with his off-hand weapon, and Crescendum deploys a turret that fires his off-hand weapon.
abilities.original_description:
Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:

Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.
Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.
Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.
Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.
Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

abilities.name: Rage Gene
abilities.mechanics_description: Rage Gene is a passive ability that **automatically generates rage for Gnar by simply being in combat**, meaning there are no direct player inputs required to "use" it beyond engaging in fights. This rage is a **resource for offensive and defensive utility**, as reaching maximum rage allows Gnar to **transform into Mega Gnar, granting him increased survivability and a new set of powerful, offensive abilities**.
abilities.original_description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

abilities.name: Hop / Crunch
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mini Gnar:** This is a skillshot (linear dash) that Gnar uses to leap. He can use it offensively to engage and deal physical damage, or defensively to escape. If he lands on an enemy, he bounces off, traveling further and applying a slow, while also granting him bonus attack speed.

**Mega Gnar:** This is also a skillshot (linear dash) that Mega Gnar uses to leap. It functions offensively as an area-of-effect (AoE) damage ability upon landing, serving as an engage tool or a way to follow up on his team's crowd control.
abilities.original_description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him. Mini Gnar: Gnar leaps, gaining {{ spell.gnare:minibas*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ spell.gnare:miniasduration }} seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Bouncing off an enemy deals {{ spell.gnare:minitotaldamage }} physical damage and briefly Slows by {{ spell.gnare:movespeedmod*-100 }}%.

abilities.name: Hyper / Wallop
abilities.mechanics_description: **Hyper / Wallop (W)** is a passive ability for Mini Gnar that, every third attack or ability on the same enemy, deals bonus percentage max health magic damage and grants movement speed. When Gnar transforms into Mega Gnar, this ability becomes an active skillshot that deals damage and stuns enemies in a cone in front of him.
abilities.original_description:
Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Move Speed.

Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area. Mini Gnar Passive: Every third Attack or Ability on the same enemy deals an additional {{ spell.gnarw:minitotaldamage }} plus {{ spell.gnarw:minipercenthpdamage*100 }}% max Health magic damage and grants {{ spell.gnarr:rhypermovementspeedpercent }}% Move Speed decaying over {{ spell.gnarw:minihasteduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: GNAR!
abilities.mechanics_description:
**GNAR! (R)**

GNAR! is a linear skillshot that Mega Gnar casts in a chosen direction. It deals damage, slows enemies, and knocks them back, with enemies hitting terrain being stunned and taking bonus damage.

**Usage:**

*   **Offensive:** Primarily used for its crowd control (knockback, slow, stun) to set up plays, disrupt enemy positioning, or secure kills. The damage is secondary.
*   **Defensive:** Can be used to peel for allies or escape by knocking enemies away.
*   **Utility:** The knockback and subsequent stun offer significant disruption and setup potential in teamfights.
abilities.original_description:
Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage. Mini Gnar Passive: Increase Hyper's Move Speed.

Mega Gnar: Gnar tosses nearby enemies, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage, Knocking Back, and Slowing them by {{ rslowpercent }}% for {{ rccduration }} seconds. Enemies that hit a wall instead take {{ walldamage }} physical damage and are Stunned.

abilities.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Boomerang Throw (Mini Gnar):** This is a linear skillshot that Gnar throws, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies hit. Catching the returning boomerang reduces its cooldown, rewarding skillful aiming and positioning.

**Boulder Toss (Mega Gnar):** This is also a linear skillshot that launches a boulder, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies in an area around its impact point. Similar to Mini Gnar's Q, picking up the boulder reduces its cooldown.
abilities.original_description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown. Mini Gnar: Gnar throws a boomerang that deals {{ spell.gnarq:minitotaldamage }} physical damage and Slows by {{ spell.gnarq:slowamount*100 }}% for {{ spell.gnarq:slowduration }} seconds. The boomerang returns after hitting an enemy, dealing reduced damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its Cooldown by {{ spell.gnarq:minicdrefund*100 }}%.

abilities.name: Short Fuse
abilities.mechanics_description: **Short Fuse** is an auto-target passive ability that triggers on Ziggs' next basic attack after using any ability. It deals bonus magic damage and is used primarily for offensive burst, allowing Ziggs to amplify his damage output over a short period.
abilities.original_description: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

abilities.name: Bouncing Bomb
abilities.mechanics_description: Bouncing Bomb is a **skillshot** where Ziggs throws a bomb that bounces up to 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to each. It's primarily used **offensively** for damage and poke, but its bouncing nature can also be used defensively to clear minions or pressure enemies away.
abilities.original_description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage. Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

abilities.name: Satchel Charge
abilities.mechanics_description: Satchel Charge is a **skillshot** that Ziggs throws, which detonates after a short delay or upon recasting. It deals **magic damage** and applies a **knockback** to enemies hit, while also launching Ziggs backward and dealing no damage to himself, making it a versatile tool for both **offensive repositioning (escape/chase)** and **defensive disengage".
abilities.original_description:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after a delay, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets. Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ bombduration }} seconds, or when this ability is Recast. It deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to enemies and Knocks them Back. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will automatically destroy towers below {{ turretdestroypercent*100 }}% of their Health.

abilities.name: Hexplosive Minefield
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Hexplosive Minefield (E)** is a **skillshot** ability that Ziggs throws in a circular area, scattering proximity mines. These mines detonate when an enemy champion or large monster steps on them, dealing magic damage, applying a slow, and knocking them up if they are the first target hit. Successive mine detonations on the same target within a short time deal significantly reduced damage.

**Usage:** Hexplosive Minefield is primarily an offensive and crowd control tool. It's used to zone enemies, deal AoE damage in teamfights, set up kills for Ziggs or his allies with the slow and knock-up, or to deter enemies from closing the distance defensively.
abilities.original_description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing. Successive mine detonations on the same target deal reduced damage. Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by {{ slow*-100 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Mines last {{ mineduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
abilities.mechanics_description: Mega Inferno Bomb is a **long-range skillshot** that Ziggs launches in a straight line. It deals **massive magic damage** in a large area, with a significantly stronger effect in the center of the blast, making it primarily an **offensive tool for area denial and high burst damage**.
abilities.original_description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away. Ziggs hurls his ultimate creation, dealing <magicDamage>{{ empowereddamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> in the center of the blast radius, or <magicDamage>{{ blastdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> at the edge.

abilities.name: Blast Shield
abilities.mechanics_description: **Blast Shield (Passive)** is an auto-targeting persistent shield that is gained over time. Once Vi hits an enemy champion with an ability, the shield is instantly applied, providing a temporary defensive barrier.
abilities.original_description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

abilities.name: Vault Breaker
abilities.mechanics_description: **Vault Breaker (Q)** is a chargeable, linear skillshot that Vi uses to initiate fights, deal damage, and apply Denting Blows. Upon release, Vi dashes forward, stopping if she hits an enemy champion, knocking them back, and dealing escalating physical damage based on charge time.
abilities.original_description:
Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows. Begin Charging: Vi begins charging a powerful punch, Slowing herself by {{ e4 }}%.

Release: Vi dashes forward dealing between {{ totaldamage }} and {{ maxdamagetooltip }} physical damage based on charge time and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit. Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, and Knocks them Back.

abilities.name: Denting Blows
abilities.mechanics_description: **Denting Blows (Passive)** is an **auto-target** ability that applies on Vi's every 3rd basic attack against the same enemy. It is primarily used **offensively** to deal bonus damage, apply an **Armor reduction debuff** on the enemy, and grant Vi a temporary **Attack Speed buff** for increased damage output. It also provides a minor **defensive utility** by reducing the cooldown of her shield.
abilities.original_description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed. <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Every 3rd Attack on the same target deals an additional <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamagetooltip }} max Health physical damage</physicalDamage>, removes <scaleArmor>{{ shredamount }}% Armor</scaleArmor> and grants Vi <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeed }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for {{ sharedbuffsduration }} seconds. It also reduces the remaining Cooldown of <spellName>Blast Shield</spellName> by {{ spell.vipassive:cdreductionon3hit }} seconds.

abilities.name: Relentless Force
abilities.mechanics_description: **Relentless Force (E)** is a point-and-click empowered auto-attack with two charges. It is primarily used offensively to deal extra physical damage to a single target and cleave through enemies behind them, making it a core part of Vi's damage combo and sustained fighting.
abilities.original_description:
Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it. Vi's next Attack deals {{ totaldamagetooltip }} physical damage to the target and enemies behind them.

This Ability has 2 charges ({{ ammorechargetime }} second refresh).

abilities.name: Cease and Desist
abilities.mechanics_description: **Cease and Desist (R)** is a point-and-click, unstoppable dash ability used offensively. Vi targets an enemy champion and dashes to them, knocking them airborne and dealing damage. Enemies she collides with during the dash are also dealt damage and are knocked aside.
abilities.original_description:
Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground. Vi singles out an enemy champion, revealing them and dashing unstoppably towards them. Upon reaching them, Vi Knocks them Up for {{ rstunduration }} seconds and deals {{ damage }} physical damage.

Any other enemies Vi collides with are dealt damage, knocked aside, and Stunned for {{ secondarytargetstunduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Ionian Fervor
abilities.mechanics_description: Ionian Fervor is a **passive ability** that Irelia gains stacks of bonus **Attack Speed** whenever she hits enemies with abilities. At 4 stacks, she also gains bonus **on-hit magic damage**. This passive is primarily used **offensively** to increase her sustained damage output and dueling potential.
abilities.original_description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

abilities.name: Bladesurge
abilities.mechanics_description: **Bladesurge (Q)** is a targeted dash that deals physical damage and heals Irelia. Its key mechanic is its cooldown refresh on marked targets or kills, enabling rapid, chained dashes for aggressive engagement and sustained combat.
abilities.original_description:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes. Irelia dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ championdamage }} physical damage and restoring {{ healamount }} Health to herself. If the enemy dies or was Unsteady, the Cooldown is refreshed.

Deals {{ miniondamage }} damage to minions.

abilities.name: Flawless Duet
abilities.mechanics_description: Irelia's Flawless Duet is a **skillshot** ability where she sends two blades towards each other. Enemies caught in the convergence zone take magic damage, are **stunned**, and become **Marked**. This ability is primarily used for **crowd control** to set up further damage or engage, and offensively to deal burst damage.
abilities.original_description:
Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked. Irelia throws a blade into the ground and can Recast for up to {{ buffduration }} seconds.

Recast: Irelia throws a second blade, then they fly towards each other Stunning for {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage. Champions and large jungle monsters become Unsteady for {{ markduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Defiant Dance
abilities.mechanics_description: **Irelia's W, Defiant Dance, is a point-and-click channeled ability.** She can click to begin charging, during which she is immobile but gains significant damage reduction to both physical and magic damage. Upon releasing the channel (by clicking again or after the maximum duration), she unleashes a powerful strike that deals increasing physical damage based on how long she charged it. This ability is used both offensively for burst damage and defensively for survivability during engages or trades, allowing her to mitigate incoming damage while building up her own.
abilities.original_description:
Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge. Begin Charging: Irelia enters a defensive stance for up to {{ maxduration }} seconds, becoming unable to act but reducing physical damage taken by {{ finalphysicaldr }}% and magic damage taken by {{ finalmagicdr }}%.

Release: Irelia lashes out with her blades, dealing {{ mindamagecalc }} physical damage increased up to {{ maxdamagecalc }} based on charge time.

abilities.name: Vanguard's Edge
abilities.mechanics_description: **Vanguard's Edge (R)** is a targeted skillshot that Irelia fires in a straight line, impacting the first enemy champion or large monster hit. Upon impact, it deals magic damage, applies a mark, and expands into a circular arena that damages and slows any enemies who touch its edges, trapping them within for a duration. This ability is primarily used offensively for burst damage, crowd control with the slow and the arena's lockdown effect, and to empower Irelia's subsequent attacks by marking targets.
abilities.original_description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it. Irelia launches a barrage of blades, dealing <magicDamage>{{ missiledamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and making champions and large jungle monsters <keywordMajor>Unsteady</keywordMajor> for {{ markduration }} seconds. The barrage explodes into a cage around the first champion hit for {{ zoneduration }} seconds. The cage deals <magicDamage>{{ zonedamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by {{ slowamount }}% for {{ ccduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Warm Hugs
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio's "Warm Hugs" (E) is a **point-and-click** ability on an ally champion, providing a **defensive shield** and **offensive movement speed buff**. It has **two charges**, allowing for quick follow-up applications or shielding multiple allies in succession, and multiple casts on the same target will stack the buffs.
abilities.original_description:
Milio tosses a shield to an ally, temporarily increasing their movement speed. This ability has 2 charges. Milio wraps an ally champion in protective flames, granting {{ shieldcalc }} Shield and {{ movespeedamount*100 }}% Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }} seconds.

This ability has 2 charges and the effects stack on repeat targets.

abilities.name: Cozy Campfire
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio casts a stationary zone that heals allies and grants them increased attack range. The zone automatically follows the ally closest to where it was initially cast, and Milio can recast the ability to manually change which ally it follows.
abilities.original_description:
Create an empowering zone that heals allies and increases attack range to those inside. The zone follows the ally nearest to the cast point. Milio creates a hearth that follows ally champions for {{ zoneduration }} seconds. Ally champions nearby gain {{ rangepercent }} Attack Range and restore {{ healingovertime }} Health over the duration. The hearth also applies Fired Up! every {{ healfrequencyseconds }} seconds.

Recast: Change the hearth's follow ally.

abilities.name: Fired Up!
abilities.mechanics_description: Milio's passive, "Fired Up!", is an **auto-target** effect that occurs *after* an allied champion hits a target with an attack or ability that Milio has enhanced with one of his own abilities. This enhancement makes the target take a burst of **bonus magic damage** and suffer a **burning damage-over-time** effect.
abilities.original_description: Milio's abilities enchant allies on touch, making their next damage deal a burst of extra damage and burn the target.

abilities.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Ultra Mega Fire Kick (Q)** is a linear skillshot that Milio kicks a fireball forward. It knocks back the first enemy hit, then bounces past them to explode in a target area. The explosion deals magic damage and slows enemies hit within its radius.

**Usage:** This ability is primarily a utility and zoning tool. While it can deal damage, its main purpose is to create space with the knockback and hinder enemy movement with the slow, making it useful for peeling for allies or setting up plays. Milio refunds a portion of the mana cost if he hits an enemy champion, encouraging aggressive use but requiring accuracy to be mana-efficient.
abilities.original_description:
Kick a ball that knocks back an enemy. The ball launches upward on hit and falls toward the enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in the area upon impact. Milio kicks a fireball, Knocking Back the first enemy hit. If it hits, the ball bounces past them and explodes, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage to surrounding enemies and Slowing them by {{ slowamountpercent }} for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

Hitting at least one enemy champion with Ultra Mega Fire Kick refunds {{ refundratio*100 }}% of it's Mana cost.

abilities.name: Breath of Life
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Breath of Life (R) Mechanics:**

*   **Usage:** Breath of Life is an **auto-targeting** ability. Upon activation, it will automatically target all allied champions within a **fixed radius** around Milio.
*   **Effects:** It is primarily a **defensive** and **utility** ability. It heals allies, removes disabling and immobilizing crowd control effects, and grants them a significant amount of Tenacity.

**Concise Description:**

Milio's ultimate, Breath of Life, is an area-of-effect auto-target ability that heals nearby allies, removes CC, and grants them bonus Tenacity, making it a powerful defensive tool for saving allies from engage or sustained crowd control.
abilities.original_description: Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames that heal and remove crowd control effects from allies in range. Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames on nearby ally champions, cleansing <status>Disabling</status> and <status>Immobilizing</status> effects, restoring <healing>{{ healcalc }} Health</healing>, and granting {{ tenacityamount*100 }}% Tenacity for {{ tenacityduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Hawkshot
abilities.mechanics_description: **Hawkshot (E)** is a **linear skillshot** that Ashe sends forth. It is used purely for **utility**, granting vision along its path and at its destination, and can be fired to anywhere on the map. Ashe possesses 2 charges of Hawkshot, which recharge over time.
abilities.original_description:
Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map. Ashe sends forth a hawk to grant vision for 5 seconds anywhere on the map. It also reveals the area around it as it flies.

This Ability has 2 charges ({{ chargecooldown }} second recharge).

abilities.name: Frost Shot
abilities.mechanics_description: **Frost Shot (Passive):** Ashe's basic attacks and most damaging abilities automatically apply a movement speed slow to her targets. Additionally, her critical strikes will *not* deal bonus damage, but instead will apply a significantly stronger version of the slow. This passive is used to control enemy positioning, set up kills, and kite dangerous opponents.
abilities.original_description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

abilities.name: Volley
abilities.mechanics_description: **Volley (W)** is a linear skillshot that fires a spread of five arrows in a cone. It is primarily used offensively to deal damage and apply a slow with Frost Shot, kite enemies, or zone areas. While enemies can be hit by multiple arrows, only the first arrow that hits them deals damage, and subsequent arrows will pass through them harmlessly.
abilities.original_description: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot. Ashe fires a volley of {{ numberofarrowstooltip }} arrows, each dealing <physicalDamage>{{ totaldamage }} physical damage</physicalDamage>. Enemies can be hit by multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.

abilities.name: Ranger's Focus
abilities.mechanics_description: Ranger's Focus is an **auto-target cast that consumes Focus stacks built up from basic attacks at maximum stacks**. Its primary use is **offensive**, significantly boosting Ashe's attack speed and turning her next few basic attacks into a powerful, high-damage flurry for burst damage or to quickly shred targets.
abilities.original_description:
Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration. Passive: Ashe's Attacks grant a stack for {{ e1 }} seconds. At {{ e2 }} stacks, she may activate this Ability.

Active: Ashe gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed and her Attacks deal {{ empowereddamage }} damage instead for {{ e3 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
abilities.mechanics_description: **Enchanted Crystal Arrow (R)** is a linear skillshot fired by Ashe that travels across the entire map. It deals moderate magic damage and stuns the first enemy champion it hits, with the stun duration scaling based on the distance the arrow has traveled. Enemies in a small radius around the primary target are also dealt a small amount of damage and afflicted with a slow.
abilities.original_description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed. Ashe launches a crystal arrow of ice that <status>Stuns</status> the first champion hit and deals <magicDamage>{{ rmaindamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>. The <status>Stun</status> duration increases with distance travelled, up to {{ maxstunduration }} seconds. Surrounding enemies are <status>Slowed</status> by <spellName>Frost Shot</spellName>.

abilities.name: Prowl
abilities.mechanics_description: Prowl is a **buff** that triggers in two ways: passively, by entering **brush**, or actively, by hitting an enemy with **Javelin Toss** or **Bushwhack**. It grants Nidalee bonus movement speed, primarily to **chase down** or **escape** enemies, and reveals them with **True Sight** after her abilities connect.
abilities.original_description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Move Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Move Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

abilities.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Human Form:** Javelin Toss is a linear skillshot that throws a javelin, dealing magic damage that scales with distance traveled. It's primarily used offensively to poke and deal burst damage from afar.

**Cougar Form:** Takedown is a targeted ability that empowers Nidalee's next basic attack, dealing bonus physical damage. This attack deals significantly more damage to targets with lower current health, making it a potent execution tool.
abilities.original_description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have. <keywordMajor>Human Form:</keywordMajor> Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing <magicDamage>{{ humanminimumdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>, increased up to <magicDamage>{{ humanmaximumdamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> based on distance flown.

abilities.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
abilities.mechanics_description: Aspect of the Cougar is a **transformational ability** that allows Nidalee to switch between her Human Form (ranged caster) and Cougar Form (melee diver). In Cougar Form, Nidalee gains enhanced mobility and melee attacks, making her a potent dive threat, while Human Form allows her to reposition and cast spells from a distance.
abilities.original_description:
Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities. Passive: While in Human Form, applying Hunted refreshes this Ability's Cooldown.

Human Form: Nidalee transforms into Cougar Form, gaining melee Attacks and replacing her Active Abilities.

Cougar Form: Nidalee transforms into Human Form, gaining ranged Attacks and replacing her Active Abilities.

abilities.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Bushwhack (Human Form):** This is a **skillshot** ability. Nidalee places an invisible **area-of-effect trap** on the ground that, when an enemy triggers it, deals **magic damage per second** and **reveals** them for a duration.

**Pounce (Cougar Form):** This is a **targetable dash** (or directed movement skillshot in an area). Nidalee leaps a fixed distance in a target direction, dealing **area-of-effect physical damage** upon landing. It is primarily used offensively for closing gaps and dealing damage.
abilities.original_description:
In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands. Human Form: Nidalee places an invisible trap for 2 minutes. When an enemy walks over it, they are dealt {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage per second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

{{ maxtraps }} traps may be active at once.

abilities.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
abilities.mechanics_description:
Primal Surge is a **skillshot** that Nidalee casts from her current location, healing an allied target hit and granting them bonus attack speed. As Cougar Nidalee, Swipe is a **linear skillshot** that deals damage to enemies in a straight line in front of her. 

**Mechanics & Usage:**

*   **Human Form (Primal Surge):** This is a **linear skillshot** that heals the first allied unit it hits, with the healing efficacy increased based on the target's missing health. It also provides a temporary attack speed buff to the healed ally. It's primarily used defensively for sustain and offensively to empower an ally's damage output.
*   **Cougar Form (Swipe):** This is a **linear skillshot** that deals damage to all enemies in a straight line in front of Nidalee. It's a core part of her melee damage rotation, used for wave clear and to deal burst damage in fights.
abilities.original_description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her. <keywordMajor>Human Form:</keywordMajor> Nidalee restores <healing>{{ totalhealing }} Health</healing> increased up to <healing>{{ maxhealing }}</healing> based on missing Health and grants them <attackSpeed>{{ bonusas*100 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for {{ asduration }} seconds.

abilities.name: Goes Where He Pleases
abilities.mechanics_description: **Goes Where He Pleases (Passive)** is a **perk** that grants Dr. Mundo a passive health regeneration bonus and the ability to **resist the first immobilizing crowd control effect** by consuming a portion of his health. Upon resisting, he drops a **chemical canister** that he can **walk over** to **restore health** and reduce the cooldown of this passive.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown.

Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.

abilities.name: Blunt Force Trauma
abilities.mechanics_description: **Blunt Force Trauma (E):** This is an auto-attack reset that, when activated, empowers Dr. Mundo's next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage. This damage scales with his missing health and can be further amplified if the target dies, causing them to be swatted through enemies to deal damage.
abilities.original_description:
Passive - Dr. Mundo gains bonus Attack Damage, increasing based on his max Health.

Active - Dr. Mundo slams his medical bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage based on his missing Health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through. Passive: Dr Mundo gains {{ passivebonusad }} Attack Damage.

Active: Dr Mundo violently swings his "medical" bag, causing his next Attack to deal an additional {{ additionaldamage }} physical damage, increased by up to {{ maxdamageamptooltip }} based on his missing Health. If the enemy is killed, Mundo swats them away, dealing {{ additionaldamage }} physical damage to enemies they pass through.

abilities.name: Infected Bonesaw
abilities.mechanics_description: Infected Bonesaw is a **linear skillshot** that Dr. Mundo throws. It deals damage based on the target's current health and slows them, while also restoring health to Mundo if it hits a champion, monster, or minion.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them. Dr. Mundo hurls his bonesaw, dealing {{ currenthealthdamage*100 }}% current Health magic damage to the first enemy hit and Slowing them by {{ slowamount*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds.

If the bonesaw hits a champion or monster, Dr. Mundo restores {{ healthrestoreonhitchampionmonster }} Health. If it hits a non-champion or non-monster, Dr. Mundo instead restores {{ healthrestoreonhitminion }} Health.

abilities.name: Heart Zapper
abilities.mechanics_description: **Heart Zapper (W)** is a **skillshot (circular AoE)** that Dr. Mundo activates for a duration, passively dealing damage to enemies around him and storing a portion of damage he *takes* as gray health. He can **recast** this ability at any time to detonate it, dealing a burst of damage; if this burst hits at least one enemy champion, Dr. Mundo **heals** a significant percentage of his stored gray health, otherwise he heals a smaller amount.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage. Dr. Mundo charges up a defibrilator, dealing {{ damagepertick*4 }} magic damage each second for up to {{ duration }} seconds to nearby enemies. Additionally he stores {{ grayhealthstorageinitial }} of damage taken for the first {{ grayhealthinitialduration }} seconds and {{ grayhealthstorage*100 }}% for the remaining duration as gray health and can Recast.

Recast: Detonate the defibrilator, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies. If this hits at least one champion, Dr. Mundo restores {{ grayhealthbigmod*100 }}% of gray health, otherwise he instead restores {{ grayhealthsmallmod*100 }}% of gray health.

abilities.name: Maximum Dosage
abilities.mechanics_description: **Maximum Dosage (R)** is an **auto-target** ability that Dr. Mundo uses to **both offensively and defensively**. It provides an **instant burst of healing** based on his missing health and then grants a significant **movement speed buff and a powerful health regeneration buff** over a duration, allowing him to chase down enemies or escape dangerous situations.
abilities.original_description:
Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration. Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, gaining {{ missinghealthheal*100 }}% of his missing Health as max Health, {{ speedboostamount*100 }}% Move Speed, and regenerating {{ maxhealthhot*100 }}% max Health over {{ duration }} seconds.

At Rank 3, both healing effects are increased by an additional {{ bonuspernearbychampion*100 }}% per nearby enemy champion.

abilities.name: Rewind
abilities.mechanics_description: Rewind is an **auto-target** ability that Zilean uses **defensively** and for **utility**. Upon activation, it instantly reduces the cooldowns of Zilean's other basic abilities by a set amount, allowing him to cast them more frequently for healing, slowing, or revival.
abilities.original_description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities. Zilean turns time, reducing his other basic Ability Cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Time In A Bottle
abilities.mechanics_description: Time in a Bottle is a passive ability that **automatically accumulates experience** for Zilean and his allies. Once Zilean has **gathered enough experience to level up an ally**, he can **right-click on them** to transfer this experience, leveling them up instantly while also gaining the same amount himself. This ability is primarily **utility-focused**, allowing Zilean to accelerate his allies' leveling curve and provide a significant advantage.
abilities.original_description: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

abilities.name: Time Warp
abilities.mechanics_description: **Time Warp (E)** is a **targeted skillshot** that Zilean uses to either **slow** an enemy or **speed up** an ally. This ability is primarily for **utility**, allowing Zilean to chase down opponents, escape danger, or facilitate his team's engagements and disengagements.
abilities.original_description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time. Zilean <status>Slows</status> an enemy champion by {{ e2 }}% or grants an allied champion <speed>{{ e2 }}% Move Speed</speed> for {{ e1 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Time Bomb
abilities.mechanics_description: **Time Bomb (Q)** is a targeted skillshot that Zilean tosses to a location. It adheres to the first unit (prioritizing champions) that gets close and detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area damage. If a second bomb is applied to the same target before the first detonates, both detonate instantly, dealing damage and stunning enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies. Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb that sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it. After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage.

Placing a second bomb on a unit that already has one detonates the first bomb immediately and Stuns enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.

abilities.name: Chronoshift
abilities.mechanics_description: Chronoshift is an **auto-targeting ability** that can be cast on any allied champion. It functions **defensively** by preventing a target's death by rewinding their health to a point before they took lethal damage, also putting them briefly into stasis.
abilities.original_description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage. Zilean grants a protective time rune to an allied champion for {{ rduration }} seconds. If the target would die, the rune rewinds their timeline, putting them into Stasis for {{ revivestateduration }} seconds, then reviving them and restoring <healing>{{ rtotalheal }} Health</healing>.

abilities.name: Royal Privilege
abilities.mechanics_description: Qiyana's "Royal Privilege" is an **auto-target** passive that grants bonus damage on her **first basic attack or ability** against each unique target. This passive is primarily used **offensively** to increase her burst damage output in trades and all-in situations.
abilities.original_description: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Terrashape
abilities.mechanics_description: **Terrashape (W)** is a **dash** ability that Qiyana uses to **teleport** to a nearby brush, terrain, or river brush, refreshing her elemental enchantment. When enchanted, her attacks and abilities deal bonus magic damage and she gains increased movement speed near her current terrain type, making it a tool for both **offensive burst** and **enhanced mobility**.
abilities.original_description:
Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted. Passive: While Qiyana's weapon is Enchanted, she gains {{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed and her Attacks deal an additional {{ onhitdamage }} magic damage. She also gains {{ passivems*100 }}% Move Speed while out of combat near the corresponding terrain type.

Active: Qiyana dashes towards a nearby brush, terrain, or river and Enchants her weapon with that particular terrain type. This refreshes Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal's Cooldown.

abilities.name: Audacity
abilities.mechanics_description: Audacity is a point-and-click dash that targets an enemy champion, dealing physical damage. It is primarily used offensively for burst damage and closing gaps, but can also be used defensively to disengage from targets or escape danger.
abilities.original_description: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them. Qiyana dashes through an enemy and deals <physicalDamage>{{ damage }} physical damage</physicalDamage> to them.

abilities.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
abilities.mechanics_description: **Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal (Q)** is a **linear skillshot** that deals physical damage. When empowered by her elemental **Enchantment**, the skillshot gains increased range and applies a bonus effect: a root and slow with Ice, bonus damage to low-Health targets with Rock, or a short period of invisibility and movement speed with Grass. It is primarily used offensively for damage and wave clear, but can also provide crowd control or evasive utility depending on the active element.
abilities.original_description:
Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element. If Qiyana does not have an Enchantment, she slashes, dealing {{ vanilladamage }} physical damage to enemies in a small area. If she does, this Ability gains extra range and an additional effect based on the type of Enchantment:
  • Ice Enchantment: Briefly Roots, then Slows by {{ slowpotency*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} second.
  • Rock Enchantment: Deals an additional {{ tremordamage }} physical damage to units below {{ critthreshold*100 }}% Health.
  • Wild Enchantment: Leaves a trail that turns Qiyana Invisible and grants {{ haste*100 }}% Move Speed.

abilities.name: Supreme Display of Talent
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Mechanics:** Qiyana's R, Supreme Display of Talent, is a **linear skillshot** that travels forward and knocks enemies back. It detonates upon hitting terrain, causing an explosion that **stuns** and damages enemies along the edge of that terrain. Additionally, the shockwave will explode after a delay if it passes through river or brush, applying the same effects.

**Usage:** This ability is primarily used **offensively** for its massive AoE damage and crowd control. Its unique interaction with terrain, river, and brush allows for powerful **ambushes and area denial**, especially in jungle chokepoints or during teamfights where terrain manipulation is key.
abilities.original_description:
Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies. Qiyana launches a shockwave that Knocks Back enemies and detonates when it hits terrain. The explosion follows the entire edge of the terrain, Stunning for between 0.5 and {{ stunduration }} seconds and dealing {{ damage }} plus {{ missinghealthdamagerock }} max Health physical damage. Stun duration scales down with distance the shockwave has travelled.

Any river or brush the shockwave passes through also explode after a delay for the same damage and Stun.

abilities.name: Blade Whirl
abilities.mechanics_description: Blade Whirl is a **circular AoE, channeled ability** that Samira activates. It is primarily used **offensively** for consistent damage and to **defensively nullify projectiles** (like skillshots and some ultimates) by destroying them as they enter its radius.
abilities.original_description: Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles. Samira slashes around her for {{ slashduration }} seconds, damaging enemies twice for {{ damagecalc }} physical damage each and destroying any enemy missiles that enter the area.

abilities.name: Flair
abilities.mechanics_description: **Flair (Q)** is a **point-and-click** ability that functions as either a **short-range projectile** dealing physical damage or a **melee sword slash** if an enemy is within range. It is primarily used **offensively** for consistent damage output and can be cast during her dash, Wild Rush, to hit multiple enemies.
abilities.original_description:
Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion. Samira fires a shot, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage to the first enemy hit.

If this Ability is cast towards an enemy in melee range, Samira will instead slash with her sword, dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage.

abilities.name: Wild Rush
abilities.mechanics_description: Wild Rush (E) is a **dash** that Samira uses to pass through a targeted enemy (or structure), dealing magic damage to all enemies she passes through and granting her bonus Attack Speed. This ability is highly offensive, used for **damage and engagement**, with the added utility of potentially resetting its cooldown on a champion kill, allowing for chained dashes.
abilities.original_description:
Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown. Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through dealing {{ dashdamage }} magic damage and gaining {{ bonusattackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed for {{ attackspeedduration }} seconds.

If an enemy champion is killed within 3 seconds of Samira damaging them, This Ability's Cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Daredevil Impulse
abilities.mechanics_description: Samira's passive, Daredevil Impulse, is a combo-building mechanic where sequential attacks and abilities of different types grant a Style rank. At melee range, her basic attacks also deal bonus magic damage and, against immobilized targets (especially Knocked Ups), she dashes in for the attack, extending the crowd control. This passive is used offensively to amplify her damage through bonus magic damage and to enable aggressive, close-range engagements by dashing to and extending the CC on enemies, further setting up her combos.
abilities.original_description: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by <status>Immobilizing</status> effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is <status>Knocked Up</status>, she also keeps them <status>Knocked Up</status> briefly.

abilities.name: Inferno Trigger
abilities.mechanics_description:
**Inferno Trigger (R)**

*   **How to hit/use:** Auto-targeting with a radius. Samira must have an S Style rating to activate it and consuming her entire Style meter.
*   **How it is used:** Purely offensive, dealing high, multi-hit physical damage to all enemies around Samira. It applies life steal and can critically strike, making it a powerful burst damage and sustain tool.

**Concise Description:** Samira's ultimate is an auto-targeting AoE barrage that unleashes a rapid series of high-damage, critical-strike-capable physical attacks on all nearby enemies, consuming her Style meter for significant burst potential and life steal.
abilities.original_description:
Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her. Samira can only use this Ability if her current Style rating is S. Using this Ability consumes all Style rating.

Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her 10 times over 2 seconds, each shot dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage and applying Life Steal at {{ lifestealmod*100 }}% effectiveness. Each shot can also critically strike.

abilities.name: A Thousand Cuts
abilities.mechanics_description: **A Thousand Cuts (Passive):** Gwen's basic attacks and *Hallowed Mist* deal bonus on-hit magic damage that scales with her attack damage and ability power, and heals her based on the damage dealt to champions. This passive is automatically applied to attacks, making it a consistent source of sustained damage, burst, and healing in extended fights.
abilities.original_description: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.

abilities.name: Snip Snip!
abilities.mechanics_description: Gwen's Snip Snip! is a **cone-shaped skillshot** that can be cast up to **six times** consecutively. Each cast deals magic damage, with the center of the cone dealing **true damage** and applying her passive, making it a primary tool for **offensive damage and sustained aggression**.
abilities.original_description:
Gwen snips her scissors in a cone up to 6 times dealing magic damage. Gwen deals true damage to units in the center and applies her passive to them on each snip. Passive: Gwen gains 1 stack when she hits an enemy with an attack (max 4, lasts {{ buffduration }} seconds).

Active: Consumes stacks. Gwen snips once for {{ miniswipedamage }} magic damage, snips again for each ammo consumed, and then snips a final time for {{ finalswipedamage }} magic damage.

The center of each strikes converts {{ truedamageconversion*100 }}% of the damage into true damage instead and applies A Thousand Cuts to enemies hit.

Deals {{ minionmod*100 }}% damage to minions.
Minions below {{ executethreshold*100 }}% health take {{ executebonus }}% bonus damage instead of reduced damage.

abilities.name: Skip 'n Slash
abilities.mechanics_description: "Skip 'n Slash" is a **dash** that Gwen uses to close distance or reposition. Immediately after dashing, she gains significant **on-hit bonus magic damage, attack speed, and range** for a few seconds, with the **first empowered attack refunding a portion of the dash's cooldown**, encouraging aggressive offense.
abilities.original_description:
Gwen dashes a short distance then gains Attack Speed, attack range, and magic damage On-Hit for a few seconds. If she hits an enemy during that time, this Ability's cooldown is partially refunded. Gwen dashes and empowers her Attacks for {{ buffduration }} seconds.
